descriptions.overview: Meet Nest Cam outdoor. It stands watch 24/7, rain or shine. Plugs into power so you never have to worry about dead batteries. And sends an alert to your phone when it detects activity. It even lets you talk back through the Nest app. This is what an outdoor security camera should be.
list: Plugs into power so you never have to worry about dead batteries and sends an alert to your phone when it detects activity
24/7 live video; 130 wide-angle view lets you look after home in 1080p HD, day and night, rain or shine
Get an alert on your phone when Nest Cam detects activity
Camera, cable and adapter are all weatherproof
Talk and listen; speak up to get someone’s attention, or tell the mailman to leave the package at the door
Night vision with 8 infrared LEDs; night vision evenly illuminates the scene
Install it yourself and point it anywhere with the unique magnetic mount

Don’t miss a thing with Nest Aware (purchased separately); Nest Aware gives you more intelligent alerts and up to 30 days of continuous cloud recording; each camera automatically comes with a free trial

reviews.title: "So far,the best camera I've owned"
reviews.text: Finally posting a review after using it fully for a few months and couldn't be happier. After trying a few other brands,they just do not ‘ring' true and suffered either poor feedback or complicted functioning. Out of the box,the Nest cam is packaged really beautiful and organized very nice especially for a neat manic like me. Even the screws,wire clips,and plastic drywall anchors are in a separate tiny box and are so cleverly and neatly packaged,it's almost and art form of organization.Set up was boom fast and the most time consuming part was the placement and concealment of the electric cord(tried the battery route and did not get good results and had to keep charging the battery pack ). All you do to mount the camera,is place the metal mounting bracket in your preferred location,do a test w camera pluggged in to insure a good view,screw bracket in place,attatch magnetic top cap and attatch camera! You download the app and connect your wifi and boom! it is done. Easy peasy and great video feed. Very clear,no circles of loading death, and notification on activity if you want. I purchased 2, one for the dog run and one for the front of house. If they go on sale again I def will get a few more. I also tested the video feed from @ 40 miles away and I could see and hear everything clear and non choppy with no interference.The only drawback is the low volume when you talk via the micro phone. You do hear a voice but not really loud enough for major attention.I tried to tell the dogs not to bark via the app on my cell,and they kinda did,kinda do not respond and when I tested it myself to hear it was kind of low but noticeable. Overall,this is by far the best security cam I have encountered. Also love the sleek design and simple ability to adjust the angle if needed using the magnetic base. This to me is just another layer of security that I can control and really use on a daily basis. Technology can be a bit overwhelming sometimes but if this 50 something can do it than anyone can.
reviews.author: BeachbearDad

reviews.title: "Impressive Unit!!!"
reviews.text: Housing is built solid. Image quality is sharp. Night vision is decent; I have a spot light to help with clarity. Love the wide angle. Alerting system is impressive; sends alerts via text or email or both. Picks up wireless very well. My unit is installed about 20 Ft away from the wireless router. Only down fall is the size of the end of the power cable. I had to drill a 3/4 hole to push the cable through the wall. Otherwise, this unti rocks!!
reviews.author: SonoMan

reviews.title: "Good value"
reviews.text: First make sure your WiFi is at least 2mbps download and upload. Google -Att signal test- and check your signal. Most people don't have good upload. This is better than Ring, Ring only records the actual motion at the time of incident. Nest records all day so if you get a alert you can scroll back a little and also zoom in the subject. It also let's you know if it's just motion or a person. The installation is not bad, the app wasn't as easy as ring though. But it's pretty straight forward. When you get it working it may go offline, if that happens just unplug it wait a bit then plug back in, that cured mine and it works perfect now.
reviews.author: Iwasiam

reviews.title: "Best home security cam"
reviews.text: After doing my research, the nest cam offered the easiest to use interface, fast setup, and storage on the cloud (if someone steals the cam, you still have access to the video).  The new Sightline interface is super easy to use, there are dots that appear on the timeline where it sensed activity, just tap on the image or dot and it will bring you right to the activity.  It works this easy on your smartphone or tablet as well.  I now have two of these and couldn't be happier.
reviews.author: DanO

reviews.title: "Terrible Product"
reviews.text: I have a fairly complex network of smarthome devices and know my way around the various products available very well. I just want any prospective Nest or other home security type device buyers to steer clear of Nest. The subscription service is relatively expensive and without it the devices is truly worthless. The app would have been a disappointment in 2010 and is an embarrassment today... and don't get me started on the constant false alarms that will fill your inbox and notifications. Is the video quality good? I guess, no better than any others. Bottom line - try something else first, Arlo or Samsungs system, anything. This one is just sad.
reviews.author: Will

reviews.title: "Amazing video"
reviews.text: Lowes shipping is very fast which surprised me. Got this camera just days after Nest released it to the public. The install was very quick and easy. The video is what really impressed me. During a heavy downpour the video is amazing. Night vision is great, I didn't think the night view would be as good as it is. At night you can see everything within 50 feet of camera and a pretty good view from 50 to 150+ feet.
reviews.author: AJ

reviews.title: "Wonderful"
reviews.text: This not only gives me piece of mind while I'm home and away, but has helped our neighbors out. Nest caught a drunk driver plowing into our neighbors car. CHP received my video and has been used to incriminate the drunk. Only time it is offline is when something is wrong with the internet. Feels incredibly well built, and is tough. I live in an area where 112 degrees isn't odd. I lost a piece of the mounting kit, and I spoke with Nest, and the sent out an entire kit free of charge in the next 2 days. Amazing customer service!
reviews.author: RickSanchez

reviews.title: "I'm satisfied"
reviews.text: So far I'm enjoying this camera.  Programming it was easy.  I plugged it into the USB on my desktop and followed the instructions.  It streams live video to my phone and it's easy to capture and email the clips.  Mounting it was easy as well.The main thing is that I don't feel like a slave to the security companies.  No monthly fees.  I own the camera and can monitor and control it myself.
reviews.author: Peaches

reviews.title: "Good outdoor cameras"
reviews.text: If you have an electric connection, the work really well and provide good image quality.  Clear daytime and nighttime image and video.  Only negative is not with the hardware but that if you want to save anything longer than a couple hours, you have to subscribe to Nest service! Expensive but could be worth it in an event where you need video evidence.
reviews.author: Rn

reviews.title: "TWO WEEKS AND THE CAMERA STOPPED WORKING"
reviews.text: I installed the camera, which was easily accomplished.  I set up Nest Aware to monitor the camera on my IPhone.  After one week the camera started shutting down and coming back up, which was annoying, then the two talk went.  Yesterday the camera went off line and the first thing I did was check the electrical connection, then the internet, all worked.  The camera just stopped working.  I will not recommend this device to anyone until the product is much more reliable.
reviews.author: ALB

reviews.title: "Easy install, good quality video"
reviews.text: It took me only 15 minutes to install since I ran the wire in the seams of my siding and didn't need to use the clips.  I also had an outlet on the front porch.  Video is good quality and the sound works fine.  I'm still a little concerned that someone could jump up and yank it down.  It's only connected to the base by a magnet.  Even if you use the wire clips, it still could be stolen.  Yes, you'd have them on video, but it seems like it would be a hassle.
reviews.author: ebbinns

reviews.title: "Well Built Unit"
reviews.text: I use these to monitor both side yards. In order to do so, I have a network extender to allow the signal strength to be sufficient to provide the bandwidth needed for 24/7 monitoring. Unlike the indoor version, these units should be left on all day. I suggest installation on the soffit of your roof and feeding the cable into the attic where you can provide electrical service. This provides a dry climate for the electrical portion of the camera. You may need to have an electrician install outlets in your attic which while not inexpensive is IMO the best way to install them. Video quality is equal to the indoor cameras and the mount is easy to install and position. It is best to have the camera out of reach so would be intruders can not reach it easily. I highly recommend the NEST product line their support service is nothing short of outstanding.
reviews.author: darbonne

reviews.title: "Outdoor cameras"
reviews.text: Images are much clearer than expected. The notifications have been awesome! Linking up to my phone was super easy & settings were pretty easy. I can hear clearly what's going on outside but the speaker volume on camera is low. That's not a big priority for us so that doesn't really factor into my rating being that our property is along a busy highway & rather noisy.
reviews.author: HTS

reviews.title: "hidden fee and bad support"
reviews.text: Purchased two cameras.  One indoors, it works fine, UNLESS the power goes out. I set this camera up and went out of town for two months.  Power flickered off then back on and the camera was off line for six weeks, until I got back home to scan the bar code and reinstall camera. support could not reset the camera without me being there.  Left me without a camera in my house.The out door camera worked for a couple of weeks, then it went off line more that it was on line.  I spent over 12 hour, with support and following their instructions.  I bought a new wifi system, then and extender. problem still existed  On line then off line!  I took it back after a fourth round of support wanting me to try this and that over and over.  Nest did not want to exchange the camera! I work on this for six weeks! camera would click then go dark the go off line over and over.  The inside camera never goes off line without power failure to my house.  THEN there is the $100 per year per camera to review recent camera activity.  THAT IS CORRECT $100 PER CAMERA, PER YEAR!
reviews.author: Ed

reviews.title: "Love Nest Cam"
reviews.text: We did not want to pay for a Security System but wanted cameras in the front of our house and on the driveway at the side of our house to see when people drove in since the garage blocks our view. The NEST CAM is exactly what we wanted and needed for this situation.  The video is clear and comes up quickly when you press the NEST app on our phones.  We get alerts from the camera to our phones to let us know any activity from both cameras.  We feel much more secure now.  The value of the 2 cameras was a much better fit for our budget than a security system and it completely fills the need.  I would, and have,  recommend them to anyone.
reviews.author: DSmall

reviews.title: "Great Product!"
reviews.text: On the higher pay range, these cameras are amazing. You get what you pay for. If you are in the market for security buy this product. Do not settle for cheaper products. You will not be disappointed with nest. App is easy to use and has many options for use. If u can afford it, buy it.
reviews.author: NightHawkUndead

reviews.title: "might be ok??"
reviews.text: First of all, you better like the look of a lot of exposed wire.  You can't cut it shorter as they have molded ends.  Maybe you could shove most of it into a hollow wall.  I personally wouldn't have a problem hiding wire but I know a lot of people that would.  Mostly the problem is it just didn't work for me.  I have DSL internet with about 25mb download and 3mb upload.  The picture was very herky-jerky and lagging.  The directions even mention it might not work with DSL.  If you try it remember how it was boxed as you just might be returning it.
reviews.author: Jack

reviews.title: "Neat to see what happens at home, while I'm away!"
reviews.text: This was a very easy camera to set up.  My husband did the install on the front and side of our home which is brick.  He has skills in this area, so super simple for him to install.  I appreciate having the activity zones set up to alert me to something happening in these zones while I'm away.  The cameras are helpful to alert me when my teenagers come home after school (because they often forget to text me that they are home :-)).  Also it alerts me when service company representatives come to do work at my home, packages are delivered, or when the occasional solicitor stops by.  It's really cool to see what happens when I'm away.
reviews.author: Mary Ann T

reviews.title: "Stop searching this is the one"
reviews.text: I researched many different cameras for my home. I finally decided to get the outdoor nest cam!  Let me tell you first off I'm not a technology person but this camera was bought, installed, and working within 2 hours of me buying it!  You won't regret anything buying this cam!  It's a nice clear picture with a wide angle. The microphone works great, just ask my dogs who keep getting yelled at for digging holes. They are not a fan of the cam! The alerts I receive on my phone is an added bonus! You can also easily share the camera with others in your home with minimal steps. Stop searching for the perfect cam because this is it!
reviews.author: Allison G.

reviews.title: "A great addition to the Nest Cam system."
reviews.text: I am assuming people who buy this are already familiar with the nest cam indoor. For those who don't, here is the breakdown of the nest cam indoor:-1080 Full HD recording, will scale down automatically based on signal to improve smoothness of video-microphone/speaker system, so you can hear what the camera hears and also talk through it-8 infrared LEDs, for night vision-external LED for status, can be turned on/off- 24/7 continuous recording so nothing is missedThe Nest Cam outdoor improves upon the indoor version by being both outdoor rated as well as having redesigned wifi antennas for greater range since it will most likely be placed outside the home where signal isn't too great.The install is like a regular nest cam except instead of having a standard USB wall plug charger, where you can just plug in a micro USB into the charger to power the nest, the Nest outdoor has a wire portion that is permanently attached to the camera (still a USB standard wire though) that attaches to a USB charger, but this time it is a puck that is attached to an equally long 120v wire that plugs into your home outlet. With this design, it is very unsightly to install indoors, although I "hack" all my nest cams by cutting the wire, feeding it through a hole I drill in the wall, and splicing it back into a normal USB end with small gauge wire nuts. The outdoor comes with a couple clips that you can use to screw the cable against the wall which I didn't use since I routed the wire into the wall.Quality is unsurpassed, although the white shell is plastic, it is a smooth matte that wont scuff easily. The rest: Glass lens, stainless steel hardware, etc. Seriously if you want proof of Nest's apple-esque attention to detail, just look at the stainless steel screws. Perfectly machined and polished. The app is great as well. Nest recently updated the Nest app so it is even better than before, you can scroll through the video timeline and you can basically fast forward all the footage in the past 10 days. Nest also debuted the "Person Aware" which is their algorithm for detecting humans to cut down on false alarms by car headlights etc. It works pretty well, but 1 out of ever 10-15 times, a bug flying by will still be mistaken as a person. Still, for a brand new algorithm, it's false positive rate is very impressive and will continue to get better with future updates.Some "criticism" that isn't really criticism: yes it has a wire, yes a wire can be cut, but if a thief really wanted to get into your house, whether you have a wire free, wired, waterproof camera, it really does not matter, they will disable/destroy it either by hitting it, cutting the wire, spray painting the lens, or wearing a mask. So the complainers who keep bashing on the "wire that's easy to cut" really need to focus on the important point which is: if a thief is going to destroy/disable your camera, a camera needs to be good enough to alert you to a person in it's view and also save all the footage for you to view anywhere in the world, which the nest does. If someone does cut your nest cam, you can easily view the last moments on the app and call the police. Wired or not, it makes no difference to a determined thief, but it does make a difference to you, because now you'll never have to replace the batteries and your nest will pretty much keep an eye out 24/7/365 without you having to do much maintenance.The nest cam system as a whole gets a lot of detractors who hate it because they cannot afford the monthly subscription fee. What do you think pays for the continual app updates, like the timeline update, or the "person aware" algorithm update? Or the storage fees for storing all the data on secure cloud so you can view it anywhere in the world? Is there a subscription? yes. Is it worth it? you bet it is, especially since having 4-5 top of the line cameras is still hundreds cheaper than getting a security system from a "professional" company.In the end, if you have the money and a sense that safety and security is always worth it, than the nest cam system is pretty much the standard for high end smart cams. The Outdoor Cam does not replace the indoor version, rather extends the family so the whole house can be covered.
reviews.author: JoeTheCustomer

reviews.title: "Perfect combination of quality and ease"
reviews.text: I was extremely skeptical that setting up this camera would be as easy as some reviews have stipulated. I could not have been any happier with the process- honestly the only info you need to know is your WiFi password and the software takes care of the rest. You cut the camera on, open the app, scan the code on the back of the camera, and you are on your way. Within 5 minutes you go from nothing to a fully functional security camera with remote viewing! And setting it up outside is also remarkably easy, if you have an available outdoor power outlet. Video quality and sound are excellent- I would give this 10 stars if I could!
reviews.author: Kevin W.

reviews.title: "Even Better than Expected!"
reviews.text: I already own several other nest products.  When it was time to decide what brand of outdoor security camera I wanted to install on my home, it was a no-brainer.  The cameras come expertly packaged with everything you need to install with just a few simple tools.  It took about an hour for me to install both cameras before they were up and running.  I couldn't believe the picture and sound clarity.  The cameras integrated into my existing Nest account and app very quickly.  I love the snapshot feature that it sends to my smarty phone and watch when it notices someone.  The bar was already set very high with Nest, but once again, they exceeded my expectations!
reviews.author: Daniel M.

reviews.title: "Satisfied Lowe's Employee Review"
reviews.text: I work for Lowe's and bought the outdoor cam about 6 months ago.  Hands down one of my favorite items at my house.  I have it at my back entry and it monitors my cars and back of house.  After buying this I am hooked on Nest and the idea of home automation!  I am in the process of getting another Nest cam for the front of my house as well as a Nest Thermostat and maybe the smoke detector as well.  The night vision and audio on this unit is great, it is very high quality.  I have become the spokesperson for the Nest line in my store.  I get my iPhone out and open the Nest App to show people how to use it; and have got several customers to buy it and employees as well just based on my rave review of it.  All thumbs up for this item
reviews.author: dislike

reviews.title: "Useless unless you keep sending them money!"
reviews.text: I am sorry that I purchased this... It is way to sensitive and there is no way to adjust it. I'm getting constant notifications that are false. Even during the trial nest aware, I was getting them but not as much. I can't justify spending $99 a year to make this work...
reviews.author: liteman

reviews.title: "Trev"
reviews.text: We bought a house in the last year and our son has special needs so when we moved I decided to slowly turn our new home into a smart home so he could control some things from his iPad.I had been looking at nest products and researching all of them to see what would work best and what I could afford at the time.So far I have the thermostat,smoke/ carbon monoxide alarm and this week I very easily installed an outdoor cam within 10 mins I actually bought 2 and the other one should be here tomorrow 1/26/18 looking forward to another easy install.I would highly recommend all of the nest products my next goal is to save for the security system and add some indoor cams.
reviews.author: Trevor

reviews.title: "Gotcha"
reviews.text: The first week the Nest was installed I had a home invasion.  We got great pics of his face as he approached the camera to flip it up to the ceiling and videos of his approach, clothing, and activities until he flipped the camera and great sound recording of what he did for next 30+ minutes until he saw the cat and realized there must be someone in the house and was scared off.  The Sherrif's office used our pics and video for Crime Stoppers and was able to use them for the neighbor who was robbed at the same time - they were not home and he got inside to rob and trash the place.  More than paid for itself week one!!!
reviews.author: Cheryl

reviews.title: "Mr. B'sNest Outdoor Camera Review"
reviews.text: Product installation only takes a few minutes with basic hand tools.  Extremely easy to connect with your wireless system. Very simple to operate from a smart phone, tablet or computer.The view field and clarity of the video produced by the camera is exceptional. I've own a few of these cameras for a few months and absolutely love them. I looked at the others and NEST seem to be simply the best product out there for the value.I highly recommend this product to anyone currently looking for some type of home security or someone who simply wants to know what goes on when your not there.I LOVE MY NEST CAMERA !!!!
reviews.author: Mr. B

reviews.title: "Great camera for the average user."
reviews.text: Overall the camera is great. I live in the country where internet access is scarce. I currently operate on a cellular LTE modem so bandwidth is always a concern for me. It's a bummer that there is no local recording option to keep the video traffic from using my internet bandwidth. It's also a bummer that you have to pay for nest aware to get the "extra" features that are already built into the camera. I do really like the camera but I will be hard-pressed to purchase another one as it would leave no badnwidth for the other devices on my network. If I had a larger connection I would be more likely to buy another one.
reviews.author: Zach

reviews.title: "Very pleased"
reviews.text: This was very easy to install as long as you have a plug to use.  Otherwise, you will have to have an electrician run you a line from inside. Everything was easy to set up, internet connection is strong and I get a message right away on my phone when something is recorded.  The recording isn't smooth but you can see what's going on easily. I do wish I could control the motion level it records, when it's windy it records waving bushes and trees. I did have to cover up the little green light, it attracted bugs at night and would set off the recording all the time.  Other than these little things, it is easy and works.
reviews.author: Sally

reviews.title: "Not the worst Nest product. But certainly not good"
reviews.text: My third review of their product as I have purchased their other home devices this at least hasn't been the worst. I wired this camera in to a separate breaker in my home as I wanted no interference electronically by wiring to anywhere else. Had a power outage which came back just a fed minutes later which for some reason left the security camera off. When I flipped the breaker I had to go about re-setup through the app of the WHOLE system again which is a huge inconvienence given the camera is set up so high outside and the barcode to scan to resetup is on the back of the device it's self. Making it not only dangerous rescanning alone but HUGELY inconvenient.Not my least favorite of the Nest products but I will still be replacing ALL of them with another product. Thermostat. Doorbell camera. Secruetoy camera. All being returned for their competing products. I regret these purchases very greatly.
reviews.author: Jesse

reviews.title: "Good camera for the price."
reviews.text: I bought 2. One for front and back of the house. Clear video. Love the night vision. Would be nice to have a battery back up for when power goes out. The indoor camera (bought one of those too) comes with a surveillance warning sticker but the outdoor cameras do not come with one.
reviews.author: K

reviews.title: "Nest Dual Pack Outdoor Wireless Cameras"
reviews.text: I had already owed 1 Nest outdoor camera, and decided on a sale to purchase the dual pack.  What awesome range, picture quality and playback.  Phone App and computer visual layout is perfect.  Nest just changed their billing, so with a 5 day retention and three cameras, I am paying a total of $11.  Let's be honest, the price of these cameras are high, but you pay for good quality.  Through a blizzard and 60+ mile an hour winds, this camera has stood up to the conditions and does what it claims to do.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Unhappy with night video and lack of security"
reviews.text: Well folks I initially thought this was best thing since sliced bread but I quickly found out these cameras are only good if your internet or power never go down. These cameras are easily hacked and the hackers can access your network and take down all security. I also found out they can manipulate your video quality and night vision. This is an unsafe system! The best security is a wired system as most things WiFi or Bluetooth can be hacked and disabled. They are high priced toys. As far as Nest support they refuse to talk in writing or leave a message. I own 4 of these cameras and would love my money back. I also own 3 nest protects and 2 nest thermostats I have also had problems with those turning temp to 50 in simmer and 90 in winter...they have been hacked or bad also....nest protect is only thing I haven't had a problem with yet...all this has happened in less than a year...had a camera replaced and a thermostat...if you need proof I have it and I'm very experienced with this product....
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Not worth the money"
reviews.text: Not worth the $300 to start first year and $100 a year afterwards. Camera is held up wth a magnet easy to steal and video quality at night is poor. Nest is already discounting after 60 days. Don't bother calling for refund if you purchased  in first 30 days. I did 45 minutes later I was told not our policy to give refunds. My last Nest product.
reviews.author: Virgin

reviews.title: "Bad purchase"
reviews.text: Camera was off line more than on line. Had to pay $100 a year to store data for review. If it goes off line due to power failure, you have to be there and completely reinstall the camera. I was out of town for two months and could not use it because of a brief power outage. I spent hour over 12, with support just hoping the camera would work! I took it back to the store when I met replacement from Nest! No more Nest cameras for me!
reviews.author: Ed

reviews.title: "Homeowner"
reviews.text: We purchased Nest outdoor cameras for our main residence. The ease of setting them up and using them has been fantastic.  The video quality is excellent. After being thoroughly satisfied with the cameras, we also purchased Nest thermostats for that home, as well as thermostats and outdoor cameras for our second home.It is very satisfying to know who is coming and going from our home, who is standing in the street looking at our home, and identify people who are delivering packages to our home.  We love the thermostats, and the ability to change a thermostat setting to Eco has great saved energy.
reviews.author: Happy California Customer

reviews.title: "Nest Digital Wired Outdoor 1 Security Camera with"
reviews.text: This is my 2nd outdoor Nest camera purchase along with 4 indoor Nest camera's. They work great and are affordable. Pictured below is my first outdoor camera purchased over 1 year ago. Works like the day installed. No problems with weather whatsoever. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Sebprn

reviews.title: "2 hours and Done"
reviews.text: I am a 44 year old single mom who decided at 1:30 on a Sunday that I needed to secure my home. I bought 2 outdoor cameras and 2 indoor cameras. I chose Nest because I have a Nest smoke detector and want a temperate controller at some point. I opened my first camera around 2:15 and completed installing all 4, including outdoor cameras, by 3:30. I could not believe how easy it was and how great the quality of the picture is on my iPhone.  I am super satisfied with my accomplishment and truly feel safer just knowing what's going on inside and outside of my home 24/7. Thanks Nest!
reviews.author: Jenn B

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: I was really suprised at the quality of this product.  Easy installation and great performance.
reviews.author: Rancher53

reviews.title: "Awesome and clear"
reviews.text: I did a lot of research between the Arlo's and the nest before making my decision, the reason I ended up choosing Nest was because of the continuous power versus having to replace batteries. This also was decided due to the wide range of Google products around my house including the Chromecast in which I can ask my Google Assistant to stream my front yard or backyard on my TV which I think is extremely useful, also the fact that it streams in 1080p HD is another Factor in my decision making. Keep up the good work nest and I'm really looking forward to the Nest Hello!
reviews.author: Google user

reviews.title: "So easy, even a caveman..."
reviews.text: Whats not to like about the nest? For my first experience with setting up an outdoor camera, it could not have gone easier. It installed, set up and work just as promised in the instructions. I am older and not tech savvy, so this was a real treat. I had preconceived thoughts of bringing this back to the store. The only reason I will go back will be to buy more cameras or security products from Nest. The picture quality, audio features, zoom and pan and scan, ease of use and all the apps work well. I should have gotten one of these years ago. Hoping the yearly fee is worth the cost, but for me its already paying for itself. Caught 2 people trespassing the first day. Easy to hide also.  Dont wait, guaranteed to satisfy.
reviews.author: Hwkmn

reviews.title: "Great deal from Lowe's"
reviews.text: Nice system for security, great prices at Lowe's. Easy to install and add to system!
reviews.author: Keith

reviews.title: "Awesome home protection!"
reviews.text: This camera is amazing. One down fall is our internet box isn't closed enough to camera so about one a day it goes off line. Also you have to make sure you have a strong enough internet. Not really cameras problem. Day and night time view is awesome even in our oregon rainy days. Notices are received on my phone about 30-60 seconds after seeing motion with a video clip. We showed our family over the holidays and they are investing into it. We also have the doorbell that we love. Can't wait for next black Friday to get a deal on other nest products for our home.
reviews.author: Kelsie

reviews.title: "Nest=Best"
reviews.text: We have had some shady characters stealing from our neighbors recently and these cameras are just what we needed to calm our fears.  The cameras were extremely easy to install and literally took minutes once connected to the WiFi.  The only issue we had was with the router, but once we relocated it from the room it was in, the devices have worked flawlessly.  I originally bought two and loved them so much, we jumped online and bought one more two days later.  Great, clear, easy to install, rapid alerts, and the ability to speak to those in frame is priceless.
reviews.author: SafeHome

reviews.title: "Great pic quality"
reviews.text: Horrible on connecting to internet. Great pic quality when camera works
reviews.author: Jason

reviews.title: "NEVER AGAIN A WIFI CAM !!!"
reviews.text: For security and knowledge of what is going on around your home, you surely do not need a loss of signals for no good reason all the time and or brief system log off. So with that being said, after purchasing this product for too much as it is. I would rather go with something that hooks directly into the home monitoring system with an app. that allows you to see what is going on while having the trial monitoring I put it to the test many of times to see how well the motion detector works and it failed. Not to mention all you received if you do not paid for their services, is flash pictures all day long that never seems to catch the things that are going on around your home including the owners activities outside their own home.
reviews.author: DRU

reviews.title: "Best peace of mind!"
reviews.text: I got the Nest camera and Nest home thermostat for Christmas this past year. Both were a breeze to set up. The camera's digital quality was much better than expected and the setup was very simple. Connecting it to my home's Wi-Fi was also easy and the phone app is very user friendly (both the camera and thermostat are connected to one app which is awesome). Additionally, the camera has a great night vision sensor and capability. The microphone and speaker work as advertised, however there is a slight delay in the voice transferring from your phone to the camera...but that's to be expected and, for me, does not downgrade it's capabilities at all. Overall I would recommend this camera and thermostat to my neighbors....I already have!
reviews.author: Over achieving dad

reviews.title: "Great Outdoor Cameras!"
reviews.text: Just what we needed to keep an eye on things while we are away. A little more pricey than some of the others but seem to be quality built and ready for the outdoors. Did have an issue with range. Be ready to buy a wifi extender if you plan to have the camera mounted at any long distance or more than two floors away. Phone app is handy, still on the trial portion, will see what features still available once the trial term is over.
reviews.author: ProjectT

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: Clear cameras but would benefit greatly by allowing user to adjust sensitivity.
reviews.author: Ruben

reviews.title: "Get this camera"
reviews.text: I got the nest Secure thought T-Mobile and I couldn't be more pleased with it. The alarm system works flawlessly and the quality of the cameras is great. I had the Arlo cameras from Netgear before, and they were good but since they were battery powered, they would only record when sensing movement. Now having 24/7 video recording is unbeatable, also I don't have to deal with changing batteries every now and then. Bottom line is you will not regret getting the nest cam or the nest Secure system. It's worth the money and peace of mind having my family a little bit more secure. Did I mention the quality of the camera is great? Can't stress that enough.Oh one more thing! The unboxing experience is awesome, kind of like apple products if not better.
reviews.author: Lanor

reviews.title: "So easy, even a caveman..."
reviews.text: Whats not to like about the nest? For my first experience with setting up an outdoor camera, it could not have gone easier. It installed, set up and work just as promised in the instructions. I am older and not tech savvy, so this was a real treat. I had preconceived thoughts of bringing this back to the store. The only reason I will go back will be to buy more cameras or security products from Nest. The picture quality, audio features, zoom and pan and scan, ease of use and all the apps work well. I should have gotten one of these years ago. Hoping the yearly fee is worth the cost, but for me its already paying for itself. Caught 2 people trespassing the first day. Easy to hide also.  Dont wait, guaranteed to satisfy.
reviews.author: Hwkmn

reviews.title: "Great deal from Lowe's"
reviews.text: Nice system for security, great prices at Lowe's. Easy to install and add to system!
reviews.author: Keith

reviews.title: "Awesome home protection!"
reviews.text: This camera is amazing. One down fall is our internet box isn't closed enough to camera so about one a day it goes off line. Also you have to make sure you have a strong enough internet. Not really cameras problem. Day and night time view is awesome even in our oregon rainy days. Notices are received on my phone about 30-60 seconds after seeing motion with a video clip. We showed our family over the holidays and they are investing into it. We also have the doorbell that we love. Can't wait for next black Friday to get a deal on other nest products for our home.
reviews.author: Kelsie

reviews.title: "Nest=Best"
reviews.text: We have had some shady characters stealing from our neighbors recently and these cameras are just what we needed to calm our fears.  The cameras were extremely easy to install and literally took minutes once connected to the WiFi.  The only issue we had was with the router, but once we relocated it from the room it was in, the devices have worked flawlessly.  I originally bought two and loved them so much, we jumped online and bought one more two days later.  Great, clear, easy to install, rapid alerts, and the ability to speak to those in frame is priceless.
reviews.author: SafeHome

reviews.title: "Great pic quality"
reviews.text: Horrible on connecting to internet. Great pic quality when camera works
reviews.author: Jason

reviews.title: "NEVER AGAIN A WIFI CAM !!!"
reviews.text: For security and knowledge of what is going on around your home, you surely do not need a loss of signals for no good reason all the time and or brief system log off. So with that being said, after purchasing this product for too much as it is. I would rather go with something that hooks directly into the home monitoring system with an app. that allows you to see what is going on while having the trial monitoring I put it to the test many of times to see how well the motion detector works and it failed. Not to mention all you received if you do not paid for their services, is flash pictures all day long that never seems to catch the things that are going on around your home including the owners activities outside their own home.

reviews.title: "Best peace of mind!"
reviews.text: I got the Nest camera and Nest home thermostat for Christmas this past year. Both were a breeze to set up. The camera's digital quality was much better than expected and the setup was very simple. Connecting it to my home's Wi-Fi was also easy and the phone app is very user friendly (both the camera and thermostat are connected to one app which is awesome). Additionally, the camera has a great night vision sensor and capability. The microphone and speaker work as advertised, however there is a slight delay in the voice transferring from your phone to the camera...but that's to be expected and, for me, does not downgrade it's capabilities at all. Overall I would recommend this camera and thermostat to my neighbors....I already have!

reviews.title: "Great Outdoor Cameras!"
reviews.text: Just what we needed to keep an eye on things while we are away. A little more pricey than some of the others but seem to be quality built and ready for the outdoors. Did have an issue with range. Be ready to buy a wifi extender if you plan to have the camera mounted at any long distance or more than two floors away. Phone app is handy, still on the trial portion, will see what features still available once the trial term is over.
reviews.author: ProjectT

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: Clear cameras but would benefit greatly by allowing user to adjust sensitivity.
reviews.author: Ruben

reviews.title: "Get this camera"
reviews.text: I got the nest Secure thought T-Mobile and I couldn't be more pleased with it. The alarm system works flawlessly and the quality of the cameras is great. I had the Arlo cameras from Netgear before, and they were good but since they were battery powered, they would only record when sensing movement. Now having 24/7 video recording is unbeatable, also I don't have to deal with changing batteries every now and then. Bottom line is you will not regret getting the nest cam or the nest Secure system. It's worth the money and peace of mind having my family a little bit more secure. Did I mention the quality of the camera is great? Can't stress that enough.Oh one more thing! The unboxing experience is awesome, kind of like apple products if not better.
reviews.author: Lanor

reviews.title: "Super Simple Setup"
reviews.text: The unboxing of a Nest product is like that of a Apple, I am always amazed at the thoughtfulness that goes into the package and all that they put in the box as well. Everything you need (except a couple of basic tools ) is in there. The magnetic mount is genius, two screws and a unlimited amount of angles to set your can to. If you need to go through a wall for power you will need to bore a sizable hole to get the usb barrel through, it not it is a 10 minute job. Image is crystal clear and the app sync is very easy.
reviews.author: Blewzman

reviews.title: "Quick, easy and excellent video quality"
reviews.text: From the moment I opened the box to having the Nest Cam Outdoor installed was less then 15 min! I am totally impressed with the video quality and image quality, both day and night.. I love the zoom feature and the ability to enhance the picture. I have already recommended this product to a few of my family and friends that have been in the market for home security.. You can't beat the price and having the ability to be notified on you smartphone instantly and see, hear and talk at a moments glance is ever better!
reviews.author: David D.

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: We bought 2 of these.  One for us and another for our daughter who just purchased her first house.  We recently moved to the country and have 5 acres that are fenced in.  We can easily see who is at the gate to come in.  I love being able to see what is going on when we aren't home. Our daughter loves hers as well!We have had for 2 months and are planning on adding more to cover the shop behind our house.I would recommend to anyone looking for inexpensive but great quality surveillance on their property.
reviews.author: Elaine F.

reviews.title: "Great little outdoor camera"
reviews.text: Easy to install, picture is crystal and the zoom-in works great. It's nice to scroll back and forth even if nothing triggered the cam to see if it's really working as its supposed to. The sound works great to.This is key- make sure you have at least 2mbps upload and download, most people have 3 or 4 download and only .45 upload and that won't cut it. Go and google att signal test, its free, and it will tell you what kind of mbps your getting. I had to upgrade to fiber and I'm getting 100s it's awesome.
reviews.author: Iwasiam

reviews.title: "Excellent DIY Security"
reviews.text: We love this camera.  We started out with the nest thermostat to regulate our heat in the winter.  We talked about getting a camera, but just never found the time or money.  My daughter has the nest and many of the options including cameras.  For Christmas she gave us a camera.  Once I installed it, we were hooked.  The ability to see who is coming and going around our house and vehicles when we are not home is priceless.  The picture is clear and the alerts on the phone are great.  We will be buying additional cameras as money allows.  We will also purchase a couple smoke detectors as well.  We will not need a security service as we will be able to monitor our house ourselves to determine when 911 needs to be called.  Love this system.  Can't wait for the Yale lock to come out too!!
reviews.author: Steve Kalamazoo

reviews.title: "Read this review before buying product"
reviews.text: READ THIS FIRST BEFORE BUYINGREAD THIS IF YOU THINKING ABOUT PURCHASING NEST. Imagine all your data accessible on the black web. Video of your young daughters, your wife for the last 5 days all saved for any criminal / the black web to view. Information of your daily habits when your house in vacant, any spoken words all document. Well this is what happened to me and when I called Nest for help they said they will get back to me in the next 3-5 business day to figure out what my next steps are. All while I am paying for services and my account has been hacked. Now that my information is out there I want spread the word so you know that this company doesn't have the security protocols in place to keep your information safe. Think about someone else watching videos of your daughter playing in the pool before you purchase this product. Think about 3-5 business days for someone to call you back after your information has been stolen
reviews.author: Dale2939

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: Some friends of mine recommended the Nest Cam products to me.  I was impressed with how easy the installation was, and that everything was included to make it a professional looking install. It was up and running in no time, but I had issues with my net provider. The cam kept going off-line and/or the cam would be turned off for hours if I didn't check it. All that seems to be fixed now though. I plan to subscribe to the Nest plan when the Nest door bell arrives. Looking forward to receiving it.
reviews.author: Thomas

reviews.title: "Exceptionally Easy to Install and Use"
reviews.text: From receiving my Nest Outdoor Camera to viewing a live feed of my front yard only took about 30 minutes, most of those spent adjusting to find the perfect mounting spot. My only extremely minor gripe is that I wish the cable was longer. I have a front porch with an external outlet but the included cables were just barely too short to reach my ideal location. Since it's easy to loop up any extra cable with the included velcro strap it would have been nice to receive much more than is necessary.
reviews.author: Stef S

reviews.title: "The best wifi camera in the market"
reviews.text: It took me a while to do my research for a wifi camera. I was flopping between the Ring and Nest. Ultimately I went with the Nest and I'm glad I did. For the start, I didn't have any problems setting it up. It was easy and fast! The interface or UI for Nest is also really easy to navigate to. My mom who isn't all that savvy with technology can navigate on it. The quality of the video is also unbelievable. And with the Nest Aware, I love the fact that you can create timelapse and of course keep video for in my case 5-days. In the case, in the future, if I need to provide evidence to the police of a home invader. I started with one camera and now I'm fully invested with the Nest Eco. I now have 5 cameras including the new Nest Hello. I'll be adding two more to complete the coverage of my house.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Very Impressed"
reviews.text: Based off of reviews I decided to purchase the outdoor cam to keeping an eye on our child. We are using it inside since the indoor wasn't available in our store. The app notifies me when someone enters my home or any movement. The camera is set to turn on when I leave my house, which is pretty convenient. The app runs perfect and send me notifications throughout the day just as I set it too. The option of having the whole days video recorded, makes it easy to skin through and see EVERYTHING!
reviews.author: Abbie

reviews.title: "An excellent security camera"
reviews.text: This is one of several Nest security cameras that I have purchased recently. The quality of the packaging, hardware and camera are second to none. The picture quality is excellent and the installation overall was a breeze. The only limitations that I see with the camera is the picture quality and the location of the camera is limited by your wifi signal. In addition, if you are going to run the cable from the camera to the USB junction box through a wall, it will require a 7/8” hole. I would recommend both this camera without hesitation.
reviews.author: ChrisG

reviews.title: "Nest Doesn't Disappoint! ... Excellent Product!"
reviews.text: This is my second Nest security camera. I have one indoor cameras that I got a year ago and a Nest Thermostat. I am also planing on getting Protect smoke/CO alarms. I enjoy those products and this one is no different.Yes, the camera's power cable is exposed, but if you follow Nest's recommendations and be smart about it, then this cable should be hard to located and cut. I don't want to have to worry about batteries. I need my camera to work 24/7 without fail.Setup was a breeze. A lot easier than I thought. I was able to mount the camera under an eve and route the power cable neatly to the power outlet thanks to the cable clips. The strong magnets hold everything in place and allow for easy adjustment of the camera as well. Adding the Nest Cam Outdoor to my account was just as easy. I was up and running in less than an hour.The video stream is clear. The night vision is spectacular, as it lights up my entire front yard, which is decent sized. I love the new eyesight feature, being able to scrub through the day very quickly. I also like how it detects people and shows you a thumbnail. Overall this is a great camera and adds a lot of value to my home automation system.Yes, it costs money for 10 or 30 days of video history. I'll gladly pay the $200/year for all three of my cameras if it means the safety and security of my home and family. If you want quality service, you need to pay for it. Bottom line: if you love Nest and their indoor cameras, you will love this as well. No more pointing an indoor camera out the windows for me.Also the Police loved the quality of the camera picture it was because of the quality of the picture along with the time of the day time line showing in the video that the police was able to catch a person whom took an item from my yard.
reviews.author: Ron

reviews.title: "Nest Cameras are excellent"
reviews.text: Just installed two new Nest outdoor cameras.  The video is amazingly clear.  Installation was easy, quick and problem free, though we did need to purchase a WiFi extender.  We've never had good WiFi on the patio, so expected to have a problem getting the camera to work in the back yard for the workshop.  With the extender, no problem.  Phones work out back on Wifi now too.  We wish we hadn't waited so long to purchase the Nest cameras.  We plan on getting two more, one for inside, and another view for outside.  Well worth the money.
reviews.author: Myrna

reviews.title: "Spectacular."
reviews.text: I've been trying and using other cameras. Some pan, some can be set up to record to a DVR or cloud service. This product does not pan but it has such a wide angle that it doesn't need to. The motion recognition and ability to exclude areas of the feed for detection are superb. Notifications are  immediate and clear. Detection of people vs other motion is accurate. The recording and playback are very intuitive and easy to use.  I am replacing several other brands and completely switching to Nest. I highly recommend the Nest products.
reviews.author: SuzanneP

reviews.title: "Would be without my Nest."
reviews.text: Living at two locations, 90 miles apart, I have an Outdoor Nest at both.  One at the rural site is primarily for security and secondary for seeing the weather conditions.  The other location is a 3rd-floor apartment with my daughters family downstairs.  That allows me to see who is at the door, when the mail arrives, and when the grandkids get home.  The Nest Outdoor has proved to be reliable, was easy to install and simple to make the WiFi connections to the router in both places.  All around it's been an excellent investment.
reviews.author: p. wiegman

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: Super happy with the quality of the camera and the recordings. Provides ease of mind when not at home. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Josh

reviews.title: "Poor quality"
reviews.text: I have purchased 6 Nest products over the last 3 years. In that time I have a 50% failure rate and counting. Customer service is ridiculously unhelpful. Vlad M.C. was the representative I spoke with for the last failure. It was/is a 1st Gen protect and after telling me it was out of warranty (2nd protect that I bought that has failed) says "considering it is a 1st Gen and is more than 2 years old (2 years and 3 months) I'd  I have to say you have a pretty good product"; I had to disagree. I have purchased my last Nest product.
reviews.author: Bryan

reviews.title: "Works as advertised"
reviews.text: I've own nest products, specially cameras, for years starting with the dropcams. Within the last month i've started to upgrade to the newer nest indoors, outdoors, and IQ's to cover all areas of my home, inside and out. The best thing about these cameras as that they just work. Once I get it set up I never have to mess with it. Wireless connectivity is extremely long compared to competitors and setup is extremely easy. I don't know how many other "smart" products that can't even get past app setup. So for the high price, you get quality, reliability, looks good, and just works. The only area of improvement would be the waterproof connector being permanent. This requires an extra large hole to be drilled if one would want to run wires inside instead of outside.
reviews.author: Bryant

reviews.title: "Nest app down"
reviews.text: Thought I had a good surveillance camera for my home but was I so wrong. It worked great for a few days and then started to crash and go offline. Moved it to new location, closer to my home wifi modem but nothing. This product has lots of issues. First it's app..keeps crashing often and as I write this review it's again down all over the USA. Also if you try to zoom in the video, it becomes blurry so what's the use of a camera when you can't zoom in something. I'm starting to hate my outdoor nest camera. Waste of 200 bucks.
reviews.author: Shane

reviews.title: "Camera works so far but shipping did not work"
reviews.text: So far I am happy with the cameras I had to go purchase at lowes as the set I ordered was not shipped next day as I requested. My order is still out there somewhere and I am no longer at the address to receive it as it was not sent overnight. Not sure what will happen as I have had no help canceling the order.   I usually have no problems with orders from lowes. But someone dropped the ball on this one.
reviews.author: T

reviews.title: "Wonderful Camera"
reviews.text: This camera has been a great addition to our home security. Things that you didn't know were going on can now be addressed. Last weekend it helped us catch our dog that kept getting out of the back yard. If you want to have the freedom of knowing what is going on while you are not at home this camera is for you. The down side is the fees you have to pay for video monitoring history. To me personally the fees are way to high. That is the only downside to this product.
reviews.author: Earl

reviews.title: "My first camera setup!"
reviews.text: The nest outdoor was my first outdoor camera that I bought for my home. The setup was easy to connect the camera to wi-fi and mount to the outside of my home. The picture clarity is awesome and the amount of features that the camera has with the "aware" subscription is surprising! The subscription price is reasonable too ( compared to alarm company prices). I'm very happy with my purchase so far and recommend the nest outdoor for anyone looking for an outdoor camera.
reviews.author: Michael A.

reviews.title: "Subscription req'd for full features"
reviews.text: This is a great little camera as far as day and night time image quality, it couldn't be easier to access through a smart phone. programming is super simple if you have a desktop or laptop. However, if you're looking for a camera that you can monitor without paying a for a monitoring subscription this camera may not be for you. You get a 30 day free trial with the full features of the camera, after that subscription  ends, it leaves much to be desired. Personally I've noticed that:-you can't access the full screen feature- if it detects motion it'll take a still photo rather than video, you'll still be notified however. This doesnt always capture the object that triggered the motionI'm sure there are other drawback I haven't found yet.  In short,Expect to pay the subscription or you might not be happy with this camera
reviews.author: Daniel

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: The setup is seriously fool proof. The best part of this product so far has been the crystal clear video! I've seen a lot of cool things already -like animals (cat, squirrel & a fox) in my driveway. Who knew we had so many visitors? :) I wish I had bought the indoor camera for a baby monitor (over the one I actually bought). The nest picture is so much more clear and easy to adjust because it's mounted on a magnet! Love it & highly recommended this product!!
reviews.author: MrM123

reviews.title: "Drill a big hole......"
reviews.text: Had to drill a much bigger hole through the wall than I liked to accommodate the USB plug that cannot be removed.  If the camera cable could be disconnected a hole a fraction of the size could be used.  Filled the oversize hole with some flexible caulking putty.  If it wasn't for this issue, my rating would be Five Stars, because camera works great and provides a fantastic remote picture/video and really does a great job helping me monitor my vacation home.
reviews.author: Caulk Needed

reviews.title: "100% Happy"
reviews.text: Just buy it. It may not be the cheapest option, but you get EXACTLY wha you pay for. The Nest products are manufactured extremely well using high quality components; their instructions are clear, concise and easy to follow; products can be set up DIY; and best of all they just work! Reliability and good company behind these items. We continue to add Nest products to our home. Just wish they made kitchen appliances (we haven't had as much luck with those).
reviews.author: EdP_NC

reviews.title: "Great Camera!"
reviews.text: I used to have an indoor camera pointed out a window to monitor the front of my home, but it wouldn't work at night due to the LEDs reflecting off the glass.  So I replaced it with this camera.  It works like a champ!  It has been subjected to the recent 9 degree (F) temperatures, including 10+ days of below freezing weather and has continued to work flawlessly!  It is a fantastic way to keep an eye on my front door for packages, visitors, and the kids.
reviews.author: Curtis

reviews.title: "Outdoor Camera to protect my "NEST!""
reviews.text: Easiest SMART device I ever set up. It was less than 10 minutes to video streaming--another 10 minutes to run the wiring and mount the camera--now have full protection for the front of my house! NEST covered all bases with installation kit provided and ease of mount magnetic base.The NEST site is great for viewing video and saving clips--still can't get the app to recognize my AWARE so I only see pic clips on phone app--Great product for the money!
reviews.author: Happy Nester!

reviews.title: "Secure in KY"
reviews.text: We love our new outdoor cameras. We put a front yard and backyard camera up that also helps us to cover our side yard and driveway. The ease of installation was more than we were expecting and very happy that the whole process took less than 30 minutes. Additionally, the crispness of the video, the recordings and the app are all cherries on top of our new purchase. We would definitely recommend adding this to your home if you're on the fence.
reviews.author: WB in KY

reviews.title: "Surprisingly Good with Slower Connection"
reviews.text: Bought these but anticipated trouble due to a slower internet connection.  My fears were unwarranted.   Got the first one installed easily and it worked fine so I installed the second.  Pictures are clear and the wide angle lens covers my front and back yards well enough.  Only criticism is that they are almost too sensitive.  Get repeated alerts for moving tree limbs, flying insects,  and birds.   Guess it's a good problem to have!!
reviews.author: Bob

reviews.title: "Great product and a great price"
reviews.text: When we purchased our new home I looked into several brands and tested quite a few others that friends owned. In the end, I bought two outdoor and one indoor Nest cams. Installation was a breeze, and even though it took me a couple of hours to mount the outdoor cams, it was still a relatively simple project. I chose to drill through my siding to plug in the outdoor cams indoors for security reasons, so I just wish they'd make a smaller middle power connector so I could've drilled a smaller hole. Really, that's my only "complaint." The app is so much better than any of the other cameras I tried, but most especially my old ATT Digital Life app for viewing my old security cameras. Not only is the app intuitive, but it's been very reliable so far. Then again, I'm only two weeks in, but no hiccups, yet. I'm happy so far and considering getting a fourth camera.
reviews.author: JAY P

reviews.title: "Don't do it"
reviews.text: Great Camera but if you're not going to prescribed to the online storage do not get this camera only thing it does is take still pictures
reviews.author: Pudding

reviews.title: "Mr"
reviews.text: Wife & kids purchased two cameras for me to install on my home for Christmas. Installation was relatively easy, hookup pretty easy & video is great. Enjoy being able to check on house very easily. Great to get an alert when packages arrive, mailman delivers or someone pulls into the driveway. Only problem was the addition of a WiFi booster for one of the cameras on the far side of the house. Once installed, works great.
reviews.author: Brent

reviews.title: "It really is this easy."
reviews.text: While I've already had some experience with surveillance systems, they were all hard-wired systems that I had to run cables and power to the cameras. With this system all I needed was power seeing that it was Wireless. I took my time and followed the instructions and within an hour I was up and running. It really is as easy as they make it sound. I'll probably be adding a second camera to my home system within a month.
reviews.author: Mike B.

reviews.title: "Great Camera!"
reviews.text: After having 2 packages stolen, a police officer recommended getting a camera with 2 way radio.  After researching what is available, I found this was the best option.  It has met all my expectations and now I want more cameras!  It has great video and audio.  I can't wait to fine tune the nest aware options.  1 downside is the monthly fee, but knowing it keeps the recording and is easily accessible, seems worth it!
reviews.author: Nest obsessed!

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: Just added a Nest outdoor camera to our current indoor camera.The two cameras enable us to monitor what is going on inside, as well as, outside our home.It gives us notifications on our cell phones and I-pads whenever there is motion in front of the cameras, plus they have a small light that discourages intruders.They are inexpensive means to protect your home...and  importantly, are easy for old guys to install!
reviews.author: Ham - Plymouth, MA

reviews.title: "Very happy with this outdoor camera!"
reviews.text: I was so happy with the first camera that I purchased a second for another location. Great quality even on zoom. 720 or 1080, wireless WiFi feature works on 2.4gz or 5gz. Easy set up, easy to use, we both receive real time notifications on our iPhones. Nice to know what goes on at night and when we're not home. 20 ft cord allows placement options and also different mount types. Excellent value for home security!
reviews.author: Happyfam

reviews.title: "First camera"
reviews.text: This was my first camera for security I read reviews on all kinds of cameras and systems, the only bad in any nest review was you pay for cloud video. I checked the rates and spent the extra money to get the nest so happy I did, I installed and set up myself, I'm not a tech person, I would suggest this camera to anyone the picture is awesome and clear not grainy. I feel safer now in my home, thank you nest.
reviews.author: Lana

reviews.title: "Outdoor"
reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift that I asked for. It has been one of the best gifts ever. I use it all day long to watch everything that is going on in my neighborhood. Now I want more for different areas around my home. This little device has been an eye opener for things that you would never expect to happen. I love the fact that if you miss something you can go back and see it in the real time it was recorded.
reviews.author: Wanza

reviews.title: "Outstanding Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: I found setting up and installing the Nest Outdoor Camera to be as easy as 123.  The Nest App provided easy instructions on the step by step setup process.  Once installed and positioned, the 1080p picture is clear and faces and objects are easy to discern.  I also have two Nest Thermostats and am impressed with Nest products.  The Nest App provides easy access to all Nest products and is easy to navigate.
reviews.author: Billy D

reviews.text: Tremendous product for home security. The video, audio and software are brilliant. HD picture with wide angle view and smooth motion. With an uptick in home security concerns, Nest Cam is the perfect deterrent and reliable solution.Installation is mostly easy but be aware that WIFI range may be an issue. That is usually an easy cure. Get a WIFI range extender ( not expensive) Software setup was a cinch.
reviews.author: BUSHMAN

reviews.title: "Happy Customer"
reviews.text: We live in a rural area and much of our driveway we cannot see from our front door. The Nest cam was the easiet fix to that problem.  We now know if someone is in our driveway prior to them knocking. We also have several dogs and the Nest lets us see where they go but doesn't go off constantly because of our dogs. Overall we're very happy with the purchase & will be adding more to our home in the future.
reviews.author: HR2010

reviews.title: "Good product"
reviews.text: Currently using all 3 home security device,lorex 720 4 camera 1tb hard drive,nest oudoor cam,and the ring doorbell 2, the nest comes in a very very close 2nd to lorex only because you can stop,pause record and share in app on smartphones, tablets.Nest video is great.sound is great also.hopefullynest will update app and it would be a home run.untill then love the product and would buy more nest products.
reviews.author: Tim A

reviews.title: "Simple, easy, effective"
reviews.text: I just purchased my 3rd outdoor camera from Nest. They work very well in day or night conditions and are a breeze to set up. The quality of the camera is excellent and the packaging is nothing short of perfect. Super easy to set up, super easy to use and gives my wife and I peace of mind, knowing we can see what;s happening now or a week ago and we can also see what's happening when we're out of town.
reviews.author: R. Smith

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: This is one of the best investments we have ever made. It gives us peace of mind knowing if someone is around our house, and attempting to destroy or rob us we will have the video to show the police to catch the criminal. Also one of the best features is if you do see someone in realtime you can speak thru the camera and frighten them away. I have already recommended this product to several people
reviews.author: Reenie

reviews.title: "Been using for several years & LOVE"
reviews.text: I have been using Nest Cams for several years. I originally purchased the first generation indoor camera when it was just called dropcam & currently own a total of 6 (3indoors & 3 outdoors). I live that I get notifications when there is anything the cameras see. I'm currently considering purchasing a couple more for the security it gives me knowing what's going on, both while I'm away & while Home
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Great Camera, minor issues."
reviews.text: The camera (like all Nest products I've used) is high quality, easy to setup, and connect to the Nest App.  Be aware that if you are planning on plugging in the camera inside, while having it outside, you will have to drill a rather large 20mm (>3/4") hole through your wall to get the USB connection through.  Also you will need an aftermarket bracket if you want the camera to look around a corner.
reviews.author: Jeff01

reviews.text: We bought 2 outdoor cameras and hey were very easy to set up. The video is clear and we were impressed with how well the night vision works without any lights on nearby. The night vision is excellent. We thought we may have to put a floodlight nearby before we set the cameras up. Once they were set up and night vision kicked on, we realized no lights need to be installed to see anyone or anything!
reviews.author: Deborah M

reviews.title: "excellent product well worth the cost"
reviews.text: We recently purchase a nest outdoor camera and we are extremely pleased with the product.  The installation was easy and the quality of the picture and sound are amazing and clear This produt gives us peace of mind in knowing our home is secure whether we are present or away.  We will be purchasing another camera to give additonal security in the back of our home.  We highly recommend this produ
reviews.author: Sjones6091

reviews.title: "As good as it gets."
reviews.text: The perfect addition to your alarm system. When the alarm sounds for the motion detector I can now just look to see why. If it is the dog (as usually is the case) I can now tell the alarm company to stop the police call and save the fee they charge for a false alarm. Pictures are clear and far better than those I see on TV when a robbery occurs etc. It simply offers an additional layer of protec
reviews.author: GaryG

reviews.title: "Perfect for residential homes"
reviews.text: We had numerous reports of people breaking into cars in our neighborhood.  Decided to research extensively and landed on this camera.Since getting it we have caught several instances and have been able to export the clips to provide to police.It also has brought peace of mind to my family, as they know that this camera will catch any activity and notify you via a push notification in realtime.
reviews.author: DanielOH

reviews.title: "Awesome cameras"
reviews.text: I've been using them for awhile and very impressed with the app to camera live feed.  Best video quality out there with continuos recording. Ability to get to recording without further setup like VPN server...all cloud.  Pretty good with person detect.  Little false positives.  2 way audio is "ok" at best. Wish subscription was cheaper.  Overall awesome camera for my security. Add face rec for me!
reviews.author: William1x

reviews.text: Setup is extremely easy.  Mounting the camera is simple, except for the hockey puck style power adapter in the middle of the cable.  If you are trying to hide the camera and wiring inside of siding or J-channel, this could be an issue.  Also the USB plug/connector will force you to cut a decent size hole in wall when dressing in cable.  Video quality is excellent.  Side-to-side range is excellent.
reviews.author: TheJohnny

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: This camera was easy to set up and install. I especially liked the powerful magnet for attaching the camera to the mounting. Made it easy to adjust what I wanted the camera to see.  My only issue was I wish they would include a few more wire clips but I just went to a hardware store and got more even if the color did not match   I plant stain the wire the color of the siding so it was not an issue
reviews.author: Larry berry

reviews.title: "Saved by Nest CAM"
reviews.text: So I was planning on installing Outdoor NEST cams before I leave for trip in which a friend is going to be staying at my place and taking care of my dog.  Thank God-Friday morning at 2:48 a.m. my roommates ex-boyfriend was stalking her and tried to break it.  IT'S ALL ON VIDEO!!!!  I can't tell you how good it felt after the traumatic event to have the video footage.  He was arrested that night!!!
reviews.author: Deez.

reviews.title: "Great camera with one fault"
reviews.text: I have been very pleased with the quality and workmanship of the Nest Cam Outdoor. Easy installation with a well designed App to support its operation. Notifications of motion and noises are as advertised and very timely. The one exception I find lacking is the communication/talk feature. People arriving at my front gate can rarely hear what I'm saying if there is any other outside noise going on.
reviews.author: Bruce R.

reviews.text: I have a total of 4 cameras  3 outdoor and 1 indoor.  One in my Print Shop and 3 at home.I would like to subscribe to be able to review history, but your monthly charge is not affordable. I wish you had a DVR so I can record up to 30 days without the monthly fees.I have 16 Cameras in my shop and they are all recording to a DVR, where the local Police have been very thankful for having the system
reviews.author: Colin g

reviews.text: We were deeply disappointed with a prior brand of camera, so when we switched to Nest, we were amazed at the superior quality.  Answers all our needs and would highly recommend installing this device to your home for peace of mind and security. We both access the view from our cell phones and are so happy to have it especially during this busy holiday season with packages on our door step all day!
reviews.author: mdixon

reviews.title: "Love my Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: We purchased two Nest Cam Outdoors because we heard they were good. I can confirm they are good. Quality is great, they were easy to install, and they are elegant. Some complaints I do have have less to do with the actual camera and more with the software. The Nest app drains my phone battery so I'm nervous to watch too much video from the camera if I'm not close to a charger. Overall, I like them
reviews.author: Smarthome enthusiast

reviews.title: "You get what you pay for"
reviews.text: I researched several outdoor cams. I settled on the Nest after reading many reviews. Setup was easy and installation was not a problem. I'm somewhat techy, but not an expert by any means. App user interface was straight forward and there are plenty of tutorials out there if you have any problems. Video quality is excellent day or night. I'm amazed at the quality of the audio. Sleek design, perfect
reviews.author: Steve Mc

reviews.title: "Best camera by far!"
reviews.text: The Nest outdoor camera is by far the easiest security camera I've ever installed. It took me more time to open the packaging than to complete the install. The box includes all the hardware you should need to mount the camera and route the cable. Once installed setup and viewing is a breeze with the app. It's ability to monitor motion and sounds is amazing! The video image is flawless. A must have
reviews.author: Baxter

reviews.text: I recently purchased the Nest outdoor camera and I am very pleased. The quality of this product exceeded my expectations. I have the Nest thermostats in both homes and now all are controlled in one app. So I can control temperature in two homes and see everything in my second home from camera. In fact it picked up a mouse running across driveway. This impressed me. Great purchase. Thanks to my son
reviews.author: Jo Ellen

reviews.title: "The Best Security"
reviews.text: Unless your network is public for barrage jamming your WIFI or your Internet Cable is easily cut before your camera captures the heinous act, then this is a solid Home Security solution that offers great facial recognition and the capability to open Jabba's Palace with a voice-over-smart-device capability much like Return of the Jedi.The Force is strong with Nest products -- secured and assured.
reviews.author: Kaajot Dunkel

reviews.text: So far my Nest cam has exceeded my expectations! The installation was easy for my son-in-law.  It was only a matter of minutes and it was up and running! The picture quality is excellent, including the night shots. The features on Nest Aware are incredible and give me peace of mind. The app is fairly easy for me to use. We have two outdoor cameras and I am considering one for inside. And it's fun!
reviews.author: Cathi W. in Ohio

reviews.title: "Piece of mind knowing home is secure."
reviews.text: This product is so easy to install by following the instructions and supplies are included as well. Easy to set up with App on phone and can monitor your home anytime. The app give you alerts when there is any motion activity or if someone is spotted and you can see and talk to whomever is there in real time. It gives me more piece of mind our family and hois a little more secure with this camera.
reviews.author: TrueOkie

reviews.title: "Nest review"
reviews.text: Next needs to do a better job of putting directions on understanding how to use the camera.  i have owned nest cameras for several  years now and love them,  But I still do not know what the different color dots mean when I look through the video from the  previous night.  I dont know why the previous video will sometimes highlight one  piece of the video for review.      Why dont you explain this
reviews.author: Steve Lincolnshire

reviews.title: "Best Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: Have an indoor camera looking out the window but with double glazed windows the clarity was poor and there was a lot of reflection.  I needed something to monitor the driveway.
