Pleasantly surprised at the clarity and focus range of this camera for the price. Easy to set up and GREAT alert features with a clip of the activity. Planning on buying the battery outdoor version next to pick up the back.
reviews.author: Chuck74

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: Eye in the sky for your home. I love getting the updates from the Camera. I can see when people are around that don't belong. I'm able to keep an eye on when my delivery's come and make sure the packages say till i get home. Pair this with Nest aware and your good to go. Tracks everything going on around your house. If you live in Ohio its good to know weather updates that you may have to Shovel.
reviews.author: Hand

reviews.title: "4K Quality Picture"
reviews.text: I've always been interested in puroNest outdoor cameras but the price usually turned me off and I was afraid of getting a low quality product. I purchased the two pack to cover the front entry as well as my driveway. The setup was very informative and easy. The hardest part was placing the wiring in areas where they can be hidden. This product wowed me with clear beautiful pictures and recording.
reviews.author: Enjoeneer

reviews.title: "Great camera with excellent features"
reviews.text: This camera was used to monitor an entrance to our home completely blocked from view.  It brought significant peace of mind to be able to see day and night.  The camera had to be adjusted for night vision a couple of times to eliminate some kind of light that resulted in extreme darkness in some of the places we really need to see but that was easily done.  We are very happy with the Nest cameras
reviews.author: Toby1

reviews.title: "Clean Video!"
reviews.text: Many times you see security video that is difficult to figure out what you're looking at.  The Nest Cam Outdoor is crisp, clear, colorful and could be the difference in catching an intruder and not catching them.  The video recording contains options for saving clips, will mark activity on your recording log that will help find any unusual movement and will notify you of what it recorded.  NICE!!
reviews.author: Rudi

reviews.title: "Unbelievably Clear"
reviews.text: This is our first security camera, we thought about getting one for the house inside and out but they seemed too confusing and costly. The Neat fit our budget and it's the best bang for the buck! The cameras are extremely clear and easily installed and activated. So far we are happy with the results.  January 30th the temperature dropped to below zero and it did not have an effect on the outdoor!
reviews.author: MARC48

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: After weeks of researching and reading the overall positive reviews, I  finally decided to purchase this camera. I have to admit, as small as it is, this camera has yet to disappoint. The video quality is pretty good and the voice features that come with it are also pretty cool. It's pretty much a modern day security camera connected via Wifi. It serves it's purpose and would recommend to others.
reviews.author: R RIVAS

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: Purchased this camera for home security and monitoring the comings/goings of our teenage children. Love the ease of installation and look of the camera. The app works well, although alerts us to every little movement including squirrels. Unfortunately, need nest aware subscription for most function but made back our investment using the video to help us in recovering money from poor tree service.
reviews.author: Hart

reviews.title: "Security made easy"
reviews.text: Recently installed the Nest Cam Outdoor as well as indoor nest security system. We did this subsequent to a home invasion. The installation has made me feel more secure in my home. I've lived in my home for more than fifteen years without ever thinking about a security system. After recent events, I felt it imperative. After researching several systems, I felt the Nest was by far the best system.
reviews.author: Evelyn

reviews.title: "Great cam for monitoring my home"
reviews.text: I have several indoor cams due to being security minded and on Black Friday decided to purchase an outdoor cam. The camera was easy to setup as all nest products are, came with a lengthy power cable and all mounting hardware, and was ready to go within minutes. The most difficult part for me was drilling into the brick. The camera has been flawless thus far and I'm already looking to buy another.
reviews.author: Hilary J

reviews.title: "The facts"
reviews.text: Having a piece of mind is priceless. The cameras were easy to set up,  easy to sync with our existing Nest devices in the Nest app, and they always show the facts.. the truth. When someone told a different story other then what really happened we didn't have to defend ourselves. The Nest cameras spoke for us, showing the facts of what really happened. We know we can rely on Nest to have our back.
reviews.author: Jacob JG

reviews.title: "Plug 'n' Play!"
reviews.text: Super easy to install; just run the power cable to a plug. Best to use under an outdoor overhang. My house has a 12 inch extension on the upper level, so I simply located a good mounting position under the overhang, secured the mount on the wall, then went upstairs to drill through the floor near the wall and down through the soffit below, using a 24 inch drill bit. Plug in, seal holes, and done!
reviews.author: Jacob JG

reviews.title: "Highly recommend this for anyone"
reviews.text: I can't express enough how much I love my outdoor nest cam.  Single mom of three and I work full-time,  being able to view my driveway and front porch is beyond helpful in my every day life.  Knowing my packages are on the porch or that my kids came home or even that someone stopped in front of my house is comforting knowledge to have from far away or even while I'm in the house. Highly recommend
reviews.author: Steve From Parker, CO

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor does a lot of things right"
reviews.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor is a good product. I bought one and enjoyed it so much I bought more cameras for my home. They record 24/7 unlike some of the other cameras on the market. It is nice that Nest stores the feeds in their cloud if you subscribe to Nest Aware. I did research on all the options, Nest won for ease of use. The app just needs improvement. I have seen updates and problems being fixed.
reviews.author: Taylor43

reviews.title: "Still learning"
reviews.text: I installed two outdoor cams and a doorbell on my new home.  I had electrical outlets placed so the power was easy to reach for the cameras.  The clarity of the image is excellent and the magnetic mounting pad allows for adjusting the angle of view.  I have had some problems with the doorbell.  It faces the street and will alert when a car passes the house.  Adjusting the alert zone doesn't help.
reviews.author: Vassago0

reviews.title: "Great Video, Cost-effective, Easy to Install"
reviews.text: We bought four of these cameras, and were delightfully surprised with several factors. We were going to hire a Nest Pro to do the install, until we opened the box and saw how easy it was. So we did it ourselves, and saved hundreds in the process. The performance and picture on these babies are fantastic, and work seemlessly with the Nest App. We also paired them with a 3-piece Google WiFi. Great!
reviews.author: walshdw

reviews.title: "Perfect security solution"
reviews.text: We decided to add a security camera and after reading reviews and researching decided to try Nest.  I love the ease of installation.  The picture and sound quality are great, and it has several different options for notifications.  I was amazed that the it actually picked up the sound of the neighbor kids playing outside, well away from our camera.  We're feeling much more secure now.  LOVE this!
reviews.author: Stevie17

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor cam"
reviews.text: This camera is ok. Is worthless with out the subscription to nest alert. If you don't plan on getting it then get something else. Mo booklet or instructions come with the camera telling you what all the features can do. I'm sure I don't have the skills & knowledge to figure all its features out. Camera maybe better than my review but if there is not information on all the bells & whistles then ??
reviews.author: Confused

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor Cameras"
reviews.text: These cameras could not be easier to set up. The instructions are very clear and from the time I un-boxed the cameras to the time they were both online was about 5 minutes. Downloading the app, finding the location where i wanted to mount the cameras,  and then finding a power source to plug them into took the longest but the setup and getting them online took merely minutes. Great video quality.
reviews.author: doublea

reviews.text: Awhile back I first saw a Nest smoke detector being installed on “Ask This Old House”. Our house was approaching 20 years old and the original smoke detectors were failing. Liked the features of the Nest units. I replaced all of our devices with Nest units. Then replaced our doorbell with a Nest unit.  Really impressed with camera quality of pictures. Decided to install outside cameras, naturally
reviews.author: Hazel

reviews.title: "Gets the job done"
reviews.text: I own three outdoor and two indoor Nest cams. They're great to monitor my home and pets while we're gone for the day or out of town.  Super reliable and they look awesome. I love the fact that I can talk and listen through them and they have very smart features that alert me when needed. The app and website are also super easy to use to monitor all of my cameras as well as my other Nest products.
reviews.author: Shane C.

reviews.title: "Better than the (many) other cameras I've had"
reviews.text: The build quality, ease of use, reliability, image quality, and features all exceed those of previous cameras I've owned from too many manufacturers to list, but including Arlo and Wyze. Wired installation is definitely a consideration, but the benefits of a powered camera outweigh the installation drawbacks for me. Integration into the Google ecosystem was a huge part of my decision to purchase.
reviews.author: Stefanovich

reviews.title: "Very good but could be a little better"
reviews.text: The nest outdoor is very easy to install, super easy to set up and use. You have to subscribe to their service to get full features but it's not very expensive.  The video quality is pretty good, not excellent. The 2 way audio works but due to delay in processing, it's a little awkward. The app is simple but limited. It is however, excellent at the basic task of keeping an eye on the front door.
reviews.author: P in NM

reviews.title: "Works great indoors"
reviews.text: I didn't think about how I might run the wire when I bought the camera, and ended up placing it inside an indoor window frame. Not the best set up, but it works.I also set up an outdoor camera in my home office. Very easy to install and connect to the WIFI.I love the image and sound quality, and the app is wonderful. In general, a big improvement over the last camera (another company) I owned.
reviews.author: I.H.

reviews.title: "Great Home Monitoring System"
reviews.text: I did not want to deal with the hassle of recharging batteries on a wireless system.And I'm sure lots of others feel the same way.  So this system solves that problem! Setup is relatively easy.  But there will be some extra steps involved for those wanting to plug the power supply indoors. Which is the way I preferred it....  You need to make1-1/4 inch hole to pass plug end of power supply .
reviews.author: Eric R.

reviews.title: "Exactly what I wanted"
reviews.text: Great camera. Easy to set up.  Watched a couple of videos before it arrived to figure installation out. Really only need a ladder and cordless drill. Installed to an outdoor outlet.  I have a Nest tstat, protect, hello, and google home. Everything just works.  Would like to see the wires a bit more tamper proof. Otherwise, a great product. The magnetic connecting is genius. Super easy to adjust.
reviews.author: JasonR

reviews.title: "Love my Nest"
reviews.text: My Nest outdoor camera was simple to install and set up. It does a great job and has a broad coverage area. It blends in well and most people never notice it. The night vison is amazing. The quality of the image is very good, but you will need the HQ model to zoom in on a license plate.I'm totally happy with the capability's this camera gives me for the price.I plan to invest in a HQ model too
reviews.author: Michael from NJ

reviews.title: "Works as expected"
reviews.text: The camera itself along with the app work together farily well. The only reason for not giving 5 stars is the installation. If you are going to use an outdoor electrical outlet; installation will be very easy.If you plan on using an internal electrical outlet (as I did) be prepared to drill a 1" hole in order to pass the USB plug thru the hole. USB should be detachable, then a 3/8" would work.
reviews.author: Hatz1

reviews.title: "Just perfect"
reviews.text: I had the original Drop Cam in a 3rd party exterior housing for outdoor security.  Performance was fine, but nightvision was lacking.  Upgraded to the NestCam Outdoor and WOW!  Great performance, super easy to install, and the app is easy to learn and master.  I have 3, but will be relocating in the next year or so.  Plan is to purchase enough to cover all 4 corners of the house in a POE config.
reviews.author: Trace

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor...By Far The Best!"
reviews.text: I have setup and installed a few different security and monitoring camera systems in the past. Most have been spotty at best (buggy application, poor video and streaming quality, difficult to set up). Nest has done its homework! The Nest Cam Outdoor is easy to install, configure and setup...even my mother could do it!  If your on the fence just go buy one and install it...you can thank me later!
reviews.author: Joe Giz

reviews.title: "Who Knew Adding Home Security Was So Easy"
reviews.text: The physical installation of Nest Cam Outdoor is about as easy as it can get as long as you have a nearby electrical outlet.  If you do not have a nearby electrical outlet then you can always have an electrician install one.  Establishing a Nest account is painless and adding the camera to the account is as easy as one, two, three.  Also, be aware of the increased network bandwidth requirements.
reviews.author: Ticobird

reviews.title: "Easy setup, clear video."
reviews.text: I purchased 2 outdoor cameras to monitor the garages and entry doors on my home. I have the Nest thermostat so I had the app installed already. The cameras were up and running on the app in a matter of minutes after arriving. Very easy to set up. We decided where we wanted to place them and they were installed in about an hour. We did have electric outlets in our attic area which made it easier.
reviews.author: Brenda J

reviews.title: "See what's happening when away from home"
reviews.text: Originally we installed a Nest smoke-carbon dioxide alarm and then added a camera in the main living area. While away I could watch what the dogs were doing and had fun watching my husband take care of himself while on a 'girl road trip'. Next, I added a camera to the back patio area for security and to watch the wild animals think about eating my flowers. Just added one to the front porch area.
reviews.author: SiskiyouMtnrider

reviews.title: "Wish it was able to be more securely installed"
reviews.text: The quality of the picture is great, the ease to install is simple, perfect for someone with limited technological skills to install. I do wish that the camera had a cage of some sort so that it couldn't be simply yanked from its installation hardware and removed, I worry about this the most. Also, the cord is not removable which makes installing a bit difficult if you don't have exterior plugs.
reviews.author: Grandmother

reviews.title: "Fantastic!"
reviews.text: Love my Nest cams!I have one on the Fireplace mantle to keep tabs on our young & crazy 120lb Labrador Retriever and two outside, one front, one rear and soon to have one looking up our side driveway. We have several high end vehicles on the property and a full service shop in back.  I feel we have a lot to lose if there was major damage/theft. The cameras are a great way to keep tabs on things.
reviews.author: Arkansas Home Owner

reviews.title: "Staying  Secure"
reviews.text: Purchased a Nest outdoor camera 2 pack after much research. Also had received a Nest e thermostat months ago as a gift and am very pleased with its operation. Installation of thermostat was fairly simple and ease of operation a big plus.Camera was a little more complicated to install but electrical outlet at camera location eased installation. Very satisfied with available features and quality.
reviews.author: Colin g

reviews.title: "Easy Installation"
reviews.text: Extremely easy to setup.  Download the app and plug in the camera is about all that there is to it as long as you have a wireless signal.  Mounting the camera can be anything from easy to hard.  If the location is readily accessible with a convenient power receptacle, then mounting the camera is easy.  The color day picture is excellent quality.  The black & white night picture quality is good.
reviews.author: Larry

reviews.title: "Amazing Home Security - Easy to Install"
reviews.text: Installed this in the garage, looking through a side window at the front entrance. This secured the camera and provides excellent video coverage of the entranceway. We can see delivery drivers and the packages they leave. We have a small view of the street in front of the home, as well. The video quality is excellent, day or night. I disabled the infrared night vision to eliminate a reflection.
reviews.author: DMW-

reviews.title: "Amazing"
reviews.text: Absolutely love the camera, I bought the combo with the best guard, I was concerned about stream quality, where I live I only have access to dsl internet that averages about 2mbs, I have had zero stream issues with the camera and have not had to lower the stream quality, nest aware is a service that is not required however I highly recommened, I love going back thru the day and seeing the clips
reviews.author: Caleb

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: We just installed our first nest outdoor camera and it works great.  We made the decision to stick with Google with Nest thermostat 6 years ago.  We now have several Nest thermostats and smoke detectors plus Google.  The good news is that Nest's products continue to get great reviews - including the doorbell.  the clunky part of the camera is the cord. If you need that much cord you're in luck.
reviews.author: Robert R

reviews.title: "This is a great product"
reviews.text: Super easy to install  and set up the App on my iphone.  I did it all by myself, wich is saying something because I am tech challenged! We have several indoor and several outdoor cameras and have been super happy with the investment. My one an only complaint is that the cameras must be plugged into an outlet and cannot be hardwired. I dislike the unsightly cords  and possibity to unplug them.
reviews.author: RHBJ

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Cam"
reviews.text: I bought the Nest learning thermostat a few years ago and use the Nest app. Setup for the Nest cam was very easy right out of the box, found my home network and now have it connected to my computer and the app on my phone. The mic on it picks up sounds pretty good and you can talk to people through the cam. I used that feature twice so far to tell the UPS guy to put my packages behind the bush.
reviews.author: The Angry Jockey

reviews.title: "Review of Two Outdoor Nest Cameras"
reviews.text: These two security  cameras were installed about a week ago to keep track of what was happening outside my front door and in the adjacent patio area.  Pictures are excellent, and video is useful. When motion is detected, a signal “ping” is sent to my cell phone, enabling me to observe even when I am somewhere else.There are no written instructions, so one just has to experiment, but so far OK.
reviews.author: Oakland Cat

reviews.title: "Mr"
reviews.text: Nest cam outdoor is an excellent camera   It was very easy to install like 1 2 3.  Very easy to set up the area to be monitored or covered It is a very good communication tool. We use cam to communicate within family members when the phone is left inside and when we are out in the yard I am extremely satisfied with its installation  it took less than a day from drilling a hole in the concrete
reviews.author: Cieb

reviews.title: "Nest indoor/outdoor cameras"
reviews.text: I purchased 2 cameras , they were bought to monitor the outside of my home n garage.... unfortunately the signal cant penetrate plaster walls n a brick house.  The good news is I set one up in the window n the other watching the animals n the basement door n they work perfect! I strongly suggest after your free trial you buy a subscription.... that way if someone does break in u have the video!
reviews.author: S. V.

reviews.title: "Great Quality Video"
reviews.text: I love my Nest outdoor camera. The video quality is outstanding. It is very sensitive and picks up any movements and any sounds within camera range. The only complaint I have is the camera drops offline for a few seconds on a regular basis. But that could be a WiFi issue. Also wished they made a battery powered version for those of us with no power outlets outside. Otherwise highly recommended.
reviews.author: Hogrider

reviews.title: "Excellent Cameras"
reviews.text: I purchased two Nest Outdoor Cams so I could remotely monitor parking and noise at two vacation rental properties I own. The quality of the cameras, range, resolution and online interface are all top-notch. I also own a few Ring cams at Home and they don't line up very well compared to the Nest cams, and I pay more each month for Lesser quality video clips at Ring.I'm very satisfied thus far!
reviews.author: Happy Customer22

reviews.title: "The best surveillance camera available"
reviews.text: This is by far the one of the best, if not THE BEST surveillance camera out there. The video resolution will  exceed your expectations. I recommend this camera to everyone! The set up process is simple and easy,- just about anyone can install it in no time! The app that accompanies this camera is also very simple to maneuver. Remember, you get what you pay for! This camera is worth every penny!
reviews.author: Sjdkj

reviews.title: "Great Security Camera"
reviews.text: Using this as a security camera in my driveway to pick up any cars that drive my my house as well as any other activity that may occur. Superb video quality. Only negatives are the way to operate the two way talk feature which would be far better if it worked like the Nest indoor cameras and the slight distortion of video in night vision (difficult to make out what kind of cars are driving by).
reviews.author: Saad

reviews.title: "Just what was expected"
reviews.text: Already having the NEST Thermostat and indoor camera, we wanted to add the outdoor camera.  Luckily, we already have some outside plugs in our overhangs, so was a matter of determining where we wanted to mount and making sure the cables reached the plugs.  And high enough it will be a challenge for someone to try and unplug or get to it. Hardest part of install was laying out and ladder moving.
reviews.author: Chuck74

reviews.title: "Great for outdoor camera"
reviews.text: Very easy to get up and running and attach to house. Very clean picture both day and night. Very sensitive to any movement so make sure it doesn't get the road in you picture or you will be alerted constantly for motion! Love the ability to notice a person as well as just movement. Highly recommend this product for people who are tech savvy and those not so comfortable with anything electronic.
reviews.author: Luis M

reviews.title: "Outdoor camera from Nest"
reviews.text: overall this is a great camera, I do suggest that it is out of reach as the only thing keeping the camera up is a magnet. I would suggest more than 8 feet up. If the person is over 6 feet apparently the fact that its a magnet makes it a grab and run.I love the quality of the video and it has a wide range to where I only needed 2 cameras for the front of my home.I will buy another for outside.
reviews.author: TraciB

reviews.text: Product works great! Easy to set up and use, if you can read you can set up all their products. Its that easy, I have 2 outdoor cameras, nest guard, and the nest doorbell for about a month which I installed by myself. It has already captured and scared off a would be thief looking for easy car burglary. He walked up my driveway tried to open my car door but saw the camera and took off running.
reviews.author: Jamaine

reviews.title: "Just wow is all is needed"
reviews.text: First off let me just say I was hesitant about buying one also because of price point plus the monthly or yearly fee.After doing some research on a lot of others that wanted couple hundred more big deal more cameras but the video quality is no where near on par with the nest not to mention all those cables to run just to hook up to dvr box.I wanted to go this route for ease of use and install.
reviews.author: Jcks

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor camera"
reviews.text: I've had my nest camera for some time now and I must say I'm very happy I decided to get this camera. Installation was very easy and straight forward. The directions and the app take you step by step during the installation process. The image quality from the camera is very good. The peace of mind knowing who comes and goes in front of my house is priceless. I'm very happy with my nest camera.
reviews.author: Mac9325

reviews.title: "Great Camera, great features."
reviews.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor is a great little camera. The unit is well built, and feels solid - I have no immediate concerns around the longevity. It was super easy to add to the Nest app and started recording right away. I have the camera record 24/7, and so far has not lost connection a single time. Hardwiring the camera to a 110v source would be a nice feature, but plugging into an outlet is easy.
reviews.author: Taylor43

reviews.title: "excellent product"
reviews.text: These cameras are much simpler to set up and use than my previous Amcrest cameras.  I spent hundreds of dollars to have someone set up 4 Amcrest cameras that worked for a matter of months.  I think part of my issue is a weak WiFi signal.  However these cameras were simple for me to install and set up.  I just need to find a way to have a stronger WiFi signal in this old house with thick walls.
reviews.author: Bwana

reviews.text: Purchased the two pack of Nest Outdoor cams for our vacation home in the south. The price for a two pack was really quite good. The cameras installed in just minutes and are working flawlessly. The connections and cords are very attractive and the connections were very easy. All in all, it is a very attractive unit and the end product (video) is very good. Nest delivers an exceptional product.
reviews.author: Tractor

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: I bought the two pack of outdoor cameras from my local Lowes. They work excellent!! The images are clear, they are way to install. The only negative I have is that anytime you change WIFI routers you have to climb up to where the camera is to scan the QR code or make sure you take a picture of that area and you can input the 6 digit code. Nest products are superior to anything else I've tried.
reviews.author: JJRuss

reviews.title: "Outdoor/indoor cameras"
reviews.text: This is for the standard Nest cameras. Cameras are reliable, look great and are very easy to install and get working.The zoom ability is lacking, using the indoor camera it is difficult to distinguish facial features of someone in a room (zooming in). The software will not allow you to zoom in the video and save (if you would want to), there is no way to take a still shot within the software.
reviews.author: Cruiser

reviews.title: "Great outdoor camera"
reviews.text: As always, if you have other Nest products, this is a no-brainer.  I have everything else Nest offers, so the decision to get this particular Nest cam wasn't ever a question.  The question for me was whether or not I needed to see what was going on outside my home?  After using it for 3 weeks, I can definitely say it provides additional peace of mind and visibility into my homes' surroundings.
reviews.author: DD-Nest

reviews.title: "review"
reviews.text: I installed the cameras, including the doorbell version. The step by step was easy to install , especially for a non tech guy like myself. The app works well on my apple I phone 6s. I also can monitor it from my computer. You'll need good internet speed for these cameras. My internet package has not changed. I was able to install 2 nest outdoor, and a doorbell with my current internet package.
reviews.author: Jason L R

reviews.title: "Outdoor security camera"
reviews.text: Now I can keep an eye on my backyard while I am away.   Really great technology.  I like being able to define specific zones/areas to be monitored.  I specified a door and an area in front on an entryway.   On a windy day it caught the motion of a ceiling fan.  I have since repositioned the camera so the fan is out of sight.  I was happy that nest added a 5 day plan to it's aware subscription.
reviews.author: Harvey

reviews.title: "It just works....always"
reviews.text: As a tech early adopter and enthusiast I generally temper my expectations of equipment I buy. Usually it slightly to routinely under performs the marketing. My Nest products, including the Nest Cam Outdoor, have done everything they say they do. They just work. I expect to reconfigure, adjust, update or replace equipment pretty routinely, but I don't have to with this product. Highly recommend
reviews.author: Alvin21

reviews.title: "Easy"
reviews.text: We started with 1 indoor nest camera and found it great.  Since then we have added 3 outdoor cameras, a doorbell and 1 more indoor camera.  They are super easy to set up!  The app is easy to use.  It provides us reassurance that our place is safe both when we are away, and when we are home.  We are able to see when packages are delivered, who is at the door and communicate through the devices.
reviews.author: Dmgk

reviews.title: "Absolutely gets the job done!"
reviews.text: I bought2outdoor Nest Cams&have the5days of recorded viewing. I had 1issue when installing&I needed to go purchase an extender for my router. Upon the initial set up@$30this extender completely eliminated that issue. For reference I do live where we get plenty of very cold&wet weather&the outdoor Nest Cam has been able to weather it all. No problems even in sub zero temps&negative wind chills!
reviews.author: Aurora V.

reviews.title: "Nest Secure set up experience"
reviews.text: After installing the nest thermostat and smoke detectors, I wanted to add the nest security system with the outdoor camera, so all my security and home automation worked together as one system. Setting up the system was easy and intuitive. The only difficulty was wiring my attic to accommodate the wired outdoor camera. The camera quality is superb. Definitely the easiest system to use. 5 star!
reviews.author: Tech lover2

reviews.title: "Crystal Clear"
reviews.text: Where do I start with this fantastic device that we have here. The Nest Outdoor Camera is literally everything that you could want in a camera. It hears all, sees all and reports all. What is there not to love about it. If you are interested in being home even when your not physically home, then search no more. You have found your solution. Now you can stay in touch, even when your not there.
reviews.author: X Man

reviews.text: The camera comes complete with everything you need to install it right. It was easy to set up with my WiFi, and use with my iPad, iPhone, and both Apple and Windows computers. It works surprisingly well, day or night. Very good resolution. It not only notifies us when it sees movement or hears sounds, but it characterizes what moved or what it heard. Not cheap, but a good value for the money.
reviews.author: Retired Guy

reviews.text: Excellent home security and connected home products.  I own several at a rental listed on Airbnb as well as my personal home.  These products offer exceptional peace of mind at both homes, especially the rental.  The incidence of irresponsible guests abusing my home has gone down significantly, and when they do occur I have Nest Aware to help boost my credibility so I can recover from losses.
reviews.author: Taylor43

reviews.title: "Great looking, great app, excellent video quality"
reviews.text: I installed 4 Nest Cam Outdoors around my house to replace an old PoE system that kept burning out its old hard drive. Since the Ethernet was already run, and power outlets for where I wanted them was a no-go, I did have to purchase PoE to USB adapters to power the Nest Cams, as Nest does not make a PoE version for no good reason at all. Once set up and running, everything has been perfect.
reviews.author: Jonathan H.

reviews.title: "Simple and Safe Security!"
reviews.text: Such a sleek product and very simple to set up with instructions and the Nest App. Camera was up and running in less the 30 minutes and am pleased to get alerts on my phone when anyone (or thing comes into view.   Love that it can allow you to speak through camera to whomever comes by and picture (day ot night) is crystal clear. It adds that extra layer of having a secure home for my family!
reviews.author: John C-D

reviews.title: "The New Apple"
reviews.text: Ladies and Gentlemen, I present to you the New Apple. Nest products have revived that feeling that I once had opening a new Apple product. Everything from their packaging to the quality of their products makes you feel like it was money well spent. This Nest Cam Outdoor was so simple to install and provides the highest quality picture, both day and night. Highly highly recommend this product!
reviews.author: J Blodgett

reviews.title: "Saved My Grandma!"
reviews.text: I have been debating on getting a camera for years and I researched the Arlo cameras, but I decided in the end to go with Nest and I am glad I did. The Nest Outdoor camera alerted me that my Grandmother was locked outside in the heat and I wouldn't have known this! This was day two! you saved the day THANK YOU NEST!+ Installation is easy+ low subscription fee+ Best video quality and sound
reviews.author: Xprowin

reviews.title: "Thank you! Feeling secure!!"
reviews.text: I am a tech wanna be! I have two Nest thermostats and seven Nest smoke and carbondioxied detectors.  So what was next the Nest camera.  This camera which I have in the front of my house has made me feel secure and has kept our property safe. You get a self set notifications when anyone is near your home. The lens is large enough to give you a large area to pick up the whole front of my house.
reviews.author: RichardW

reviews.title: "This is "The One""
reviews.text: Hook these guys up literally in minutes. Comes with everything you need and is easy. The quality of the video is excellent (day and night) and the functionality around notifications, etc. is great. The camera gives you a wide deep range of vision and the zoom feature works real well. Requires a regular outlet for power which could be great/awful depending on if you are near an indoor outlet.
reviews.author: LCBrevard

reviews.title: "Love this product!"
reviews.text: We bought this camera for the added security of living off a commuter road. We did our research and found this was the best camera but we had no idea how happy we were going to be. The microphone on this camera is amazing; the visibility from videos is exceptional and spot on; the look of it is sleek and sets up very easily. We loved the first one so much that we already bought a second one.
reviews.author: Enjoeneer

reviews.title: "This is "The One""
reviews.text: Hook these guys up literally in minutes. Comes with everything you need and is easy. The quality of the video is excellent (day and night) and the functionality around notifications, etc. is great. The camera gives you a wide deep range of vision and the zoom feature works real well. Requires a regular outlet for power which could be great/awful depending on if you are near an indoor outlet.
reviews.author: LCBrevard

reviews.title: "Highly recommend!"
reviews.text: Nest cameras are a great product. I have one inside my home and one outside my home. My residence is in one of the highest crime rate areas in the US, so these were a great investment. I can watch my home from inside and out while at work. My pit bull dog also helps and I can watch how she is while I'm away. I have even helped my neighbors with issues. I plan to add a third camera this year.
reviews.author: Rowland55

reviews.title: "Went like a charm"
reviews.text: After extensive review of countless postings and online reviews, I went with two Nest cameras to monitor my home. The included instructions were very detailed and easy to understand. The product quality is outstanding and the camera resolution is excellent. My only glitch was the Internet signal needed a boost with a range extender. Love the product and several neighbors also now interested!
reviews.author: TedC

reviews.text: Have had 3 cameras for 3 days.  I used extension cords for 2 of them.  The harder work will be to get a neat install of the other 2, but I think the battery powered competition is not a good option. I'm a cop, so I see plenty of security systems, mostly commercial.  I have never come across cloud based and like it much more than DVR.  Interface is much easier to use than systems I have seen.
reviews.author: kjmaximus

reviews.title: "GREAT nest product design and support"
reviews.text: I started out one nest cam indoor to test out how well it work but then to multiple nest outdoor cam outside my home to monitor my properties and surrounding (driveway, garden, koi pond, package delivery, the weather, etc).  I recently had a long trip outside of USA with a matter a few touch of buttons from my smartphone on NEST app, within a few seconds Nest taking me home w/o traveling.
reviews.author: ThomasT-Texas

reviews.title: "Great outdoor camera"
reviews.text: I researched a lot of other cameras before purchasing the Nest Cam Outdoor and feel I've made a very good purchase and will more than likely purchase other Nest products to go with this. Setup was very simple and installation was a breeze thanks to all of the included hardware. Video quality is second to none and the ability to make time lapse videos, and video snippets is very convenience.
reviews.author: Nicholas R

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: This camera is great and works well, the camera quality is great. If you want multiple cameras I would recommend an internet connection that has at least a 10Mbps upload speed, this will allow for a better quality of recording up in the cloud. I have 3 cameras running at the middle quality (720p) on a 5Mbps connection and it's ok. I know I could have better quality if I had better internet.
reviews.author: Mr. Technology

reviews.title: "Nest cam outdoor"
reviews.text: This is a product I shopped and compared and asked many people in order to make my decision to buy it ... then when I received it ... it was simple... easy and fun to get it up and running and I was very happy with the picture clarity; the wide view the sound in both talking and listening I never regret buying the camera nor save a chance to recommande it to other perfect from A TO Z...LOL.
reviews.author: Mido

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Cam"
reviews.text: Very easy to use no matter your "technical" level - could not be easier to set up or install.  You can see a picture within seconds of opening the box.  Exactly what we wanted - corded power so it didn't need to be recharged if we were on vacation - but wifi for connection.  App for reviewing and alerts is also ease of use.  Works perfect!!!  I would highly recommend this product to anyone.
reviews.author: Jackie J

reviews.title: "Simple Set-Up / Awesome App / Great Camera!"
reviews.text: The Nest Camera was so simple to set-up and use especially how easy it was using the Nest App with my other Nest devices.  The mounting looks extremely professional and the camera works fantastic!  I love getting notifications of things/people moving in the cameras view.  The zoom feature works very clearly and I also like how the app throttles the video quality based on your network speed.
reviews.author: C-Fisch

reviews.title: "So glad I chose Nest"
reviews.text: The nest outdoor cameras are more than what I expected them to be. I am very happy with my purchase. They work great, clear sound, I can hear other family members through the cameras speaker clearly, the night vision is a lot more clear than I expected and the wide angle is amazing. The cameras cover a lot more area than I thought. I think the motion detected feature is a bit too sensitive.
reviews.author: Hannah Alexandra

reviews.title: "GreatWon't disappoint!!"
reviews.text: This camera has been a great addition to our home.  With the magnetic base it is easy to adjust and move to view different locations.The ease of setup helps relieve any frustration when first beginning with a nest product.Obviously the product is beautiful and  integrates nicely with all other nest products on the nest app.Would highly recommend this camera and all other nest products!!!
reviews.author: PI Youngs

reviews.title: "My Nest cam outdoor"
reviews.text: I love me nestcam outdoor! I already have an original drop cam that I use inside my home for monitoring my kids and my dogs. This new camera is for monitoring my driveway and front entrance to my home. It is very easy to install if you are handy and easy to set up, almost too easy. The video quality is perfect and sound is clear. I just wish there were more color choices to match the house.
reviews.author: D Johnson

reviews.title: "Nest Cam- Video Good enough to put on YouTube"
reviews.text: The only reason you should have  a camera is so you can recognize what your looking at. Nest Cam is that and more. I have owned the outdoor Nest Cam for over a year, maybe two. I find it meets all my expectations. Video quality is better then anything else I have seen, night cam including. Fun to have audio, except my poor neighbor who nicely picked up package, he heard voices-my daughter.
reviews.author: John- Colorado

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: Our Outdoor Nest Cam has been wonderful! We live on a dead end street, and there is only one way in and out of our neighborhood. I like to see who is driving past my house, driving into my driveway, who is knocking on my door, etc. The quality of the camera is great and I really like the feature of telling you when it sees a person versus motion. We plan to get a 2nd Outdoor Nest Cam soon.
reviews.author: McKenzie

reviews.title: "WOW.. just WOW"
reviews.text: I cannot tell you how impressed I am in the Nest Outdoor Camera. Installation is easy, picture and sound quality is phenomenal, notifications are spot on, and the app is easy to use! I promoted it so much my 50+ year old mother asked me to install one for her and she loves it. I use my camera mainly for porch pickups. I would highly recommend getting this camera and possibly as a two pack.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Coach K"
reviews.text: I purchased two outdoor cameras on a whim when I was shopping at a big box store.  I had video cameras before but the App I was working with no longer supported my equipment ... I watched a short you tube video on installing nest cameras .... easy-peasy to install .... everything comes in the box to completely install and I might say high quality fasteners .  Now I'm in complete control
reviews.author: Urban 7, UM 0

reviews.title: "Good to feel secure"
reviews.text: Someone broke into an out building shortly after my husband died. While I am fully proficient in the handguns that I carry, I wanted to keep an eye out. By looking on my smart devices from anywhere in the country, I can check the area outside my front door and my entire backyard and garage.  I have also been able to shoo cats and dogs off my porch if they decide to make themselves at home!
reviews.author: Suesewnew

reviews.title: "Great camera and technology"
reviews.text: Very easy to connect and install, app works great, love the notifications and video history that I can easily view on the cloud, I used to have a DVR system but this one is a lot easier to review, video quality and wide angle lense capture a very large area with good clarity, only reason can't give 5 stars is the cord and camera mount could've been built better for the price you are paying
reviews.author: Slob

reviews.title: "Find out more than you ever wanted to know"
reviews.text: So, this camera is the best. The installation is plug and play (once you have the app); just attach the base, stick the camera on, run your cord, and plug it in. Oh yeah, connect it to wifi. Once your camera is going you will so way more than you ever wanted to see. You will hear every idiotic thing your ding-dong of a neighbor says about you. It's like getting a wish granted from a genie.
reviews.author: Dogwood House

reviews.title: "Easy to use, does what it's supposed to"
reviews.text: I had the Nest Outdoor Cam professionally installed due to having to go through brick and being both mechanically and technologically challenged. I live in a city rowhouse, so my issues are different - people and cars go by constantly, so I don't want alerts or a camera that is motion activated. I wanted this camera to both deter crime and to provide video evidence should something happen.
reviews.author: JJD2

reviews.title: "Stop Looking And Just Buy"
reviews.text: Forget all the others out there and just buy the Nest camera !  Video quality is amazing ! Setup is VERY EASY start to finish is less than 30 min. Everything you need is in the box including screws for mounting ! Everything is waterproof and very well made. Camera is about the size of a orange. Very strong magnetic mount to base. Fast alerts sent to email & phone. Video can pinch zoom in.
reviews.author: Videoman

reviews.title: "Happy customer"
reviews.text: A friend of mine told me about the Nest camera.  Her sister uses it for her cabin when they are not there.  I bought two of these and just love the quality of the picture and ease of setting them up.  I am a senior female and put it up with a little help from my disabled husband.  Had them running in about an hour.  I put one outside and one inside.  Watch from phone or computer. Love it!
reviews.author: AKAK

reviews.title: "Love this security camera!"
reviews.text: I love the security camera, it is good quality video. I like the way it tells you if it is just motion detected or an actual person. Was on vacation driving home when we got the notification that there was a person in the driveway. Well, it was the city dog catcher and our dogs busted one of the slats of the fence and escaped.  Was lucky enough to see on video and talk to the dog catcher.
reviews.author: dreaaaaa

reviews.title: "MR"
reviews.text: Great product that I have used for several years!Recently we were out of town for a few days and had stopped the mail delivery. I received a notification of person in area, I looked and it was the relief postman delivering mail. I call one of my neighbors and asked them to pick up pick up my mail which they did.We all know what a bunch of mail left in a mail box for several days means.
reviews.author: MR MR

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: I purchased these cameras to help keep an eye on my disabled husband when I was at work. I wanted the outdoor cameras for additional security. I have been extremely pleased with my purchase. The video quality is really good and I am able to move the cameras to see what I need to see. I like to be able to talk to someone through the cameras as well. It has worked very well for my purposes.
reviews.author: Toby1

reviews.title: "Help see around corners"
reviews.text: This camera has a premium feel and appearance. The software on the phone makes it easy to use and control what alerts you want to be notified of. Our driveway comes along the side of the house and is a giant blind spot. This camera was perfect to mount on our external garage thanks to the great WiFi connectivity this device has.  Perfectly tucks under the eve to protect from the elements.
reviews.author: J.J.Ridgway

reviews.title: "Fantastic Home Security Monitor!!"
reviews.text: My shed was recently broken into and the thieves made off with my Road Bike. I am most upset with myself because this could have been avoided had I just installed these cameras sooner. It was so easy to do. I order 4 cameras. They arrived two days later and I installed them the same day. Now everything is monitored as it should have been prior to the burglary!! Don't wait order them now!!
reviews.author: Dan from california

reviews.title: "Best most Extra set of eyes you can buy"
reviews.text: Best most cost efficient extra set of eyes you can buyThis product is very easy to use. Plug-and-play right out of the box. Fun to learn about and set up.I have owned for about two months and I had no problemsGives me a good sense of security when I'm not home and when I am at home. I also subscribe to the five day history on an annual contractI researched other cameras this is A+
reviews.author: Capt Brad

reviews.title: "Well worth it"
reviews.text: I purchased this Nest camera after someone broke into my car in my alleyway. Fast forward 2 months, I get into an argument with my neighbor in the alleyway over something trivial and the guy pulls a gun out on me! Totally a crazy situation, but having it caught on camera makes it really easy to press charges for felony menacing. I couldn't be happier that I purchased this. Well worth it.
reviews.author: Christopher M

reviews.title: "It's so easy to set up and use"
reviews.text: I was blown away how brainlessly simple the whole setup was. I had more difficulty setting up my cablebox! The app walks you through every step and clearly explains every piece of the process. And honestly, I don't think I've ever seen a better packaged product in my life. I almost felt bad taking it out of the box! The clarity of the picture is terrific.A++, Nest. I am very impressed!
reviews.author: Sean L

reviews.title: "I love this!"
reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my nest outdoor cam!  i find myself checking it every morning and sporadically throughout the day.  I LOVE knowing when packages are delivered, when the landscape guy is there, when Terminex & TruGreen are there -- and when a herd of deer and walking across my yard.  I bought it because there had been a string of car break-ins in my neighborhood - i feel much safer now!
reviews.author: lmd416

reviews.title: "Security, reliability and unexpected capability."
reviews.text: I'm extremely glad I purchased my best outdoor camera. After months of researching and comparing, my final decision was rewarded with an easy-to-set-up outdoor camera that comes with surprising capabilities. For example, you are able to creat the exact area, within your cameras view, that will send you motion notifications. I look forward to growing my smart home with more nest products.
reviews.author: CJC4TH

reviews.title: "Works perfectly for me and my family"
reviews.text: Have one in the front yard / Driveway, One in the Back Yard and one in our Patio. Can keep track of the Gardener, Kids, Dogs, Cats, Neighbors Strays, all the above. Clear daytime and Night time resolution. Zoom is helpful and can be taken off center. Can take a clip of an activity and keep it or send to someone to review. Has a magnetic connection that allows any camera angle to be held.
reviews.author: iclark3

reviews.title: "Corner House"
reviews.text: A must for a busy corner house.  Easy to set up.  I can view and monitor my house from anywhere my travels take me.  With camera on each corner I no longer miss my Amazon packages.Also, I can thank certain neighbors for the thoughtful gifts they leave under my window :-)I own 4 outdoor, 4 indoor cameras, 2 thermostats and Nest Aware in my house and I am very happy with the performance.
reviews.author: RJS474

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: My outdoor Nest camera is awesome. I was using another brand camera but it broke. I received the Nest camera as a gift so I'm not sure on the price. As far as clearity it takes great videos and pics. It was very easy to install, took about 10 min to install. The app used is very easy to use. The camera has a very wide angle so living in a cul-de-sac it get the whole circle plus my house.
reviews.author: Windy Gause

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: We have three Nest Cams of which one is a Nest outdoor Cam, all work well and were very easy to set up. We travel a lot and like the ability to check on the house when out of town. We also have a Nest thermostat looped into the system, which gives us the ability to check the temperature inside and out. Our Nest outdoor cam covers the front door and a large area of the front of the house.
reviews.author: Vaughn & Carol

reviews.title: "Great product..."
reviews.text: I love the cam but the price is somewhat steep if trying to have entire property needing surveillanced. Also, I had a criminal pull out the power line from camera and only had camera for less than a month. It was disappointing. I had it installed where it was nearly impossible, unless you had a ladder.Just wish there way a repair department I could have sent it to rather than trash it!
reviews.author: Gma15174-1

reviews.title: "Easy to Install and Excellent Quality Video"
reviews.text: After a lot of research and recommendations from friends and family members, I decided to purchase a Nest camera for home security. I wanted to start small so I only purchased one camera and installed it at the front door where it can also monitor the driveway, front steps and part of the front yard. Installation was easy, the app is easy to use and the quality of the video is excellent.
reviews.author: Enjoeneer

reviews.title: "Great camera system, highly recommend!"
reviews.text: The cameras were easy to install and allow a very wide angle view, we use them for our front and back doors. They record audio as well as video, which is a great feature, plus you can talk through them as well, in case you need to talk to someone outside, but can't or don't want to be there physically. The app is easy to use, but there is a slight lag in the video, probably due to WiFi.
reviews.author: Browndogs

reviews.title: "Excellent Product - Video is Supurb"
reviews.text: I now have a "fleet" of Nest cameras including this outdoor camera and a Nest Hello doorbell.  All of them have excellent video, and provided wi-fi speeds are adequate, translate well to the application and the website.  Note that it is necessary to connect all of the cameras to a 110v outlet (except the doorbell, which runs on 16v), so and electrician is required.  Nest Aware is pricy.
reviews.author: Coto Pete

reviews.title: "Great useful camera"
reviews.text: I have 2 cams covering my property. Super easy install very reliable. They are worth the money I have had others cams in the past and this is by far the best option.  They are great when traveling or when packages arrive.  Also you would be surprised how much goes on around your home when you are inside/at work/away and you had no idea who is outside! Highly recommend these to everyone!
reviews.author: iclark3

reviews.title: "Backyard Nest"
reviews.text: I'm using the Outdoor Nest to monitor the back of my home.  I have a pool and this is an easy way to see if I need to let someone know that I need water in my pool.    I got it also in the hopes, in case of a storm (and I don't lose network or power) that I can assess damage.  And, sometimes, when I'm not at home, I just like to look and enjoy viewing the back of my home - which I love.
reviews.author: Beach Blonde

reviews.title: "Get it!"
reviews.text: This is a really good outdoor camera. I had an issue with a man I hired to repair my roof. The camera's audio picked up him talking about “losing another customer” and about me reporting to the “BBB” (he was right). Had it not been for my Nest Cam with my Nest Aware subscription, I would never have known. I had to hire another person to do the job! I'd say the Nest did its job! Thanks!
reviews.author: Melanie458

reviews.title: "Effective, no nonsense product."
reviews.text: We installed 5 Nest Cam Outdoors about two months ago and one Nest doorbell.  So far we are satisfied with their performance and the ability to retrieve the activity history.  It was very easy to physically set them up and connect to our home network using the user friendly Nest app.  We hope they will have significant longevity.  We are in Southern CA so the weather is not too extreme.
reviews.author: Dave14

reviews.title: "HOMEOWNER"
reviews.text: THE NEST OUTDOOR CAMERA IS AWESOME. IT FOLLOWS THE SUBJECT AROUND THE AREA IN THE VIEW OF THE CAMERA. CLOSE UP VIEWS ARE AMAZING. IT EVEN FOLLOWED BIRDS ON THE GROUND, NOTIFIED ME ON MY PHONE WHEN A DOG WAS BARKING. HAVING THE NEST PRODUCTS IN GENERAL  IS AWESOME BECAUSE THEY ALL WORK TOGETHER WHEN MORE THAN 1 PRODUCT IS ACTIVATED. I RECOMMEND THIS OUTDOOR CAMERA AND ALL NEST PRODUCTS.
reviews.author: RHONDA AND JEFF

reviews.title: "High quality, Robust Design and Easy to Use"
reviews.text: If your looking for a simple install, great price for a high quality, robust built, and a device that works all the time.  Then the nest products are for you.  I live in the midwest and my cams last in all the up and down temps.  The field of view is wide, the nest aware account gives me 10 days of 24/7 video dvr with high resolution for a great price.  Not to mention the app is great!
reviews.author: LCBrevard

reviews.text: Watch a lot of camera reviews. Decided on nest for two main reason their products good quality  and are easy to install. The second thing is what sold me on nest , it's the network. I like the fact I can add more cameras and they have other product like the doorbell and thermostat. I do have the doorbell too,  Keep in mind the more cameras you add the more bandwidth your going to need.
reviews.author: Travis Tyler

reviews.title: "Keeping an Eye on Your Home"
reviews.text: The front of my house, facing the street, is an area that I particularly want to have my eyes on. The Nest Outdoor Camera, along with my Nest Door Camera, does that with almost 100% view. And the cost is incredibly low, the app is easy to use, and notifications are not bothersome. I intend to add to the system with back and side views so as to make for a complete view of our perimeter.
reviews.author: Matthews

reviews.title: "New Nester"
reviews.text: Just purchased and installed my first two Nest outdoor cameras. First impression is very good. Installation was quick and painless. My only gripe would be that the cord from the camera to the circular connector could be longer. When installing at a high level the box is difficult to hide. Video quality is excellent. Not sold on the Nest Aware subscription value yet. To be continued....
reviews.author: S Scott

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: 4th nest cam i have purchased, others are all indoor. Adding to the nest app was a breeze, installing to my stucco wall could have been better. The anchors were ok as 4 of the 5 anchors i used  were a secure/tight fit but i might end up getting better ones from lowes or home depot. I used an indoor outlet and had to make a good size hole to get the usb power connection through the wall
reviews.author: Trace

reviews.title: "Great quality camera for home/residential use."
reviews.text: We purchased a set of two Nest Outdoor cameras for our home and have overall been very happy with the investment. They were very easy to setup via App on our iPhone, and connected to our Wi-Fi quickly and without issue. The cameras come with great mounting hardware and grommets to keep your wiring tidy when mounting outside. Audio and video quality are great, and so it the app. Go buy!
reviews.author: QWERTY

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: 4th nest cam i have purchased, others are all indoor. Adding to the nest app was a breeze, installing to my stucco wall could have been better. The anchors were ok as 4 of the 5 anchors i used  were a secure/tight fit but i might end up getting better ones from lowes or home depot. I used an indoor outlet and had to make a good size hole to get the usb power connection through the wall
reviews.author: Trace

reviews.title: "Amazing Camera That's Easy To Use"
reviews.text: Set up was super-fast, connected to my phone via the Nest app in about 5 minutes total. Easy to use, monitor and find clips.   Video and audio quality are superb. I can watch our vacation home from 2500 miles away and monitor when my sprinklers come on, who's in the driveway or at the door and listen to the birds singing in the backyard. Great product that over-delivers for the price.
reviews.author: napageneral

reviews.title: "Great picture quality."
reviews.text: Just installed my new nest outdoor camera over my back patio. Picture quality is amazing! I also have a nest indoor camera along with two nest protects and a thermostat. I love that they all work on one app and the user experience is great! The picture easily on the nest cameras are so much better than the Arlo wireless cameras. Now nest just needs to come out with s wireless version!
reviews.author: Eliteman24

reviews.title: "Extremely pleased"
reviews.text: I'm truly not sure how I would get by without my outdoor Nest Cam now that I've relied on it for a year.  It has eased my mind and has helped me during suspicious activities.  It's reliable and easy to use.   I lost my connection for a while due to wireless issues and I learned how I grew dependent on it.   It's a great thing to have.   I also have an indoor nest cam.  I love them!!!!
reviews.author: RJ Vic

reviews.title: "Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: The outdoor camera is easy to install. The video is very clear and the motion detection is great.  I recommend making a box to house your wires it to prevent easy access to them. It's best to mount you outdoor camera up high on a beam or eve to make it difficult to access.  Also, if your camera is far away from your wifi router, get a router booster to boost your signal to the camera.
reviews.author: Handyman Guy

reviews.title: "Great addition to our second home vacation rental"
reviews.text: The cam was easy to install other than the nervousness about drilling through the exterior wall, but that went well.  It works great!  We use it to confirm the arrival/ departure of guests, cleaning crew, maintenance crew at our vacation rental 2nd home.  We also like to keep an eye on our front driveway area.  It is especially fun to listen to guests first impressions as they arrive.
reviews.author: Happy cabin owners

reviews.text: The camera was easy to install and has ample cord for most situations. There is a USB cord that connects to a DC transformer, which in turns plugs into an outlet. In my case, I stripped the wiring off the power cord and connected to a junction box.On the app you can indicate whether you want alerts for when a person is detected, or any motion. I suggest the former if you have a cat.
reviews.author: Derrick R

reviews.title: "Multiple Independent Locations"
reviews.text: It was easy to install.  The only issue I had was setting up different independent locations.  The help desk helped me but there seems to be a time delay in viewing the independent locations once they are set up on the app.  I thought it wasn't working..then I looked a week later (not doing anything) and it is working.  Not sure what happened between when I was working on it and now.
reviews.author: AKAK

reviews.title: ""What camera?""
reviews.text: "What Camera?  I don't see a camera."  The reason for having a camera outside of the home or business is for security.  Nest Cam Outdoors is just that camera.  I bought the white camera, because my home is white.  It is more than ten feet off the ground and not in a place where one would often look.  Even I forget it's out there, because of it's stealthiness.  "I don't see a Camera."
reviews.author: Rev. Guy

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor"
reviews.text: Have had for a couple of years and LOVE it. The videos and notifications are great. Have to pay to save videos, which is not bad. The only downside is if you add another camera, which I'd love to, you have to pay separate fee for each camera. If not for that I'd have three. For that reason I will get another system for the rest of my property, but I won't replace the Nest I have now.
reviews.author: arusso00

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor"
reviews.text: I'm not a techno person and so I delayed setting up my gift for months until I could have many hours. Well that's not necessary at all!!  It was so well designed and instructions were super easy, I think I was done, totally done in an hour and it was completely mounted and plugged in and working! The video quality is amazing and using the app is great. I feel relaxed when we're away.
reviews.author: Jen A.

reviews.title: "I own two of these"
reviews.text: First off, very easy to install. Put two screws in and that's it. Camera is magnetic and stays on securely   Second they look and feel really professional.  The quality of the video is awesome and in the app I can see both cameras at the same time. When I look back at recorded video, seeing what took place is as simple as sliding my finger up and down the timeline.  I highly recomend
reviews.author: Rudi

reviews.title: ""What camera?""
reviews.text: "What Camera?  I don't see a camera."  The reason for having a camera outside of the home or business is for security.  Nest Cam Outdoors is just that camera.  I bought the white camera, because my home is white.  It is more than ten feet off the ground and not in a place where one would often look.  Even I forget it's out there, because of it's stealthiness.  "I don't see a Camera."
reviews.author: Rev. Guy

reviews.title: "Easy peasy"
reviews.text: Just purchased my nest cam outdoor security camera.Using it to monitor my driveway to protect my car,tractor,and monitor comings and goings.The camera was extremely simple to install,as was the internet connection.The hardest part was deciding where to put it.Installed on a shed 40 feet from my router through two walls and internet connection works fine on a 5ghz wireless connection.
reviews.author: iclark3

reviews.title: "nice cam"
reviews.text: Nice Cam but.... The quality of range for Wi-Fi needs to be upgraded.  If this cam had better range for Wi-Fi capabilities. It would be near perfect.  I have both 5g network and 2.4 ghz network on current router... And still get poor Wi-Fi statement from nest Cam app. Both ping and download speeds are good as well as upload.  So it has to be the range with in the device itself......
reviews.author: camera

reviews.title: "Smile!"
reviews.text: I own two Nest indoor cameras and could not wait for the outdoor to become available. These out door cameras are awesome! Clear picture, love the fact I can hear everything, being able to talk to the person is a great feature! The modern design is beautiful, and people don't even know it's a camera which I love!  Install was a breeze and set the up of camera on the app took seconds.
reviews.author: Benita

reviews.title: "Watching the front yard for years"
reviews.text: I've had a Drop Cam for years and recently purchased the Nest Outdoor to add to the system. The quality is exactly what I expected, very, very good.  I have other cameras (another brand) but trying to find when something happened is really hard because it doesn't make clips of activity. The Nest Cam motion clips are so simple to go through and saving a particular clip is easy-peasy.
reviews.author: Purple

reviews.title: "Excellent Product!"
reviews.text: The camera was SUPER easy to set up and install.  The quality of the video is very clear.  There is a bit of a delay, but that may be due to my internet connection.One suggestion for Nest would be to make the USB connection to the extension cord smaller.  In order to fit the USB connection through a hole in your house, I had to drill a 7/8" diameter hole.This is a great product.
reviews.author: Pleased New Owner

reviews.title: "My Nest outdoor camera"
reviews.text: I purchased the Nest outdoor camera. The video quality is amazing. Crisp clear video helps me to monitor the back yard and pool at the same time.. adults move when someone is spotted,  or motion is detected.. Has the capability of alerting me when someone is heard talking but I don't use this feature..I highly recommend the purchase of this camera in addition to otherNest products.
reviews.author: Natasdrol

reviews.title: "! AWESOME !"
reviews.text: Simply Awesome, pricing but worth it and bloody additive !Superb quality, App works seamless.You don't know you need it until you have it.On day two after installation my wife and I were at breakfast in a local diner when I received and alert telling me it had picked up movement. I open the app to find my neighbour looking through our mail!!Before I didn't know, but now I do.
reviews.author: Russ.

reviews.title: "I own 4 cams - these things are awesome"
reviews.text: Beware, these things can get addictive!  I have 4 exterior cams monitoring the perimeter of my home.  These things are very simple to setup and install/mount.  It's imperative, in today's world, to have video.  It's amazing the sense of security these cams provide and also acts as a fantastic deterrent to would-be malicious activity.  It's great to see who/what is coming and going.
reviews.author: MyrtleBeachBoy

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: I was using a Night Owl setup before I finally made the switch to the Nest. I have their thermostat and wanted to make the switch to their other products. I'm super happy that I did. I had some fears such as night vision quality and the monthly cost for Nest Aware. I'm still on the trial for Nest Aware so I don't know yet if I'll continue it. The night vision is really really good.
reviews.author: Duane

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: Very easy config/setup. The hardest part is just figuring out where you want to mount it to have power available. I setup mine above a garage door and used one of the available outlets that the garage door opener wasn't using. Having a smaller plug/connector coming off the camera would be nice so the hole through the wall could be smaller (3/4" for this model) but not a major deal.
reviews.author: GaryRS

reviews.title: "Ease of Use and Setup"
reviews.text: After purchasing the Nest doorbell and its ease of setup, my wife and I purchased 2 indoor cameras for our 2 birds and 2 brand new puppies...so far so excellent....Now that he puppies have grown and learned to use the doggy doors, we have a hard time keeping them inside. (Bundles of joy and constantly being curious and adventurous) Easy Setup and now we can keep an eye on our Nest!
reviews.author: Steve Watson McQueen

reviews.title: "Peace of mind"
reviews.text: For the holidays my soon bought a double pack of these cameras. We have 8 grandkids and liked the idea of being able to see them when outside. We put one at the front entrance to our home and the other is on the side of the house where the children play. It took around 30 minutes to install and set up both cameras. The picture quality is great, not fuzzy, and the mic is very clear.
reviews.author: AL D.

reviews.title: "Couldn't be easier !"
reviews.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor camera is super easy to install, especially if you have an outlet near by.  The package comes with every possible piece of hardware you would need to install this outdoors.  I installed mine on my garage and I did drill a hole through the exterior to access an outlet inside.  Well under an hour to install from opening the box to monitoring the video in my home.
reviews.author: CTTraveler

reviews.title: "Eagle eyes on our lake house"
reviews.text: We have two outdoor cams at our lake house at Lake of the Ozarks in Missouri. One watches the driveway and backside of the house. The other watches the lakeside of the house, the boat dock and the boat on the hoist. The panoramic view is awesome and it sees pretty good at night. The listening part of the audio is great. The speaking side has no projection or volume to it at all.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Works great!"
reviews.text: Overall I am very happy with the outdoor cam.  It has great field of view and the picture is very high quality.  Installation was a breeze and getting it connected to my WiFi was simple.  I'm very happy.My only complaint... I'm not excited about drilling a hole in my house to run the power cord inside so I just ran an extension cord to an exterior outlet.  Not exactly Fort Knox.
reviews.author: Matt P

reviews.text: This is my first security camets purchase and I love my Nest Outdoor Camera! The quality of the recordings is excellent. You can zoom in  and it does not distort the picture quality. We use it to monitor who is coming and going, how our dogsitters interact with our pets, yell at the neighbor dogs to "get outta here" and so much more. We strongly recommend the Nest outdoor camera.
reviews.author: Jay T.

reviews.title: "Love Nest products"
reviews.text: I have been a DropCam (now Nest) customer for many years. I have several cameras, both indoor and outdoor, and have only had one camera die on me and it was quickly replaced for free with a refurbished one that is still in use.I highly recommend Nest products to everyone who ask. I currently have three outdoor cameras, one indoor camera, and two Nest thermostats. Great products.
reviews.author: JohnATX

reviews.text: We initially received our Next products as a gift.  Being a bit technology challenged, we found these products super easy to use and install.  I particularly love that I can expand the view or draw it in closer.  Faces and voices come through very clear -- even my dogs barking!  We are particularly thrilled that even with the monsoons in Arizona, our cameras never missed anything.
reviews.author: Sherry R.

reviews.title: "Way better than expected"
reviews.text: We purchased 4 outdoor cams due to some unwanted trespassing in our back yard every morning around 2 am. Once we call them installed (literally in 10 minutes per camera, amazingly easy) we felt so much safer. Getting a notification to your phone at the sign of movement/noise is too knotch. It was the key component to getting our unwanted visitor taken care of. Nesters for life!
reviews.author: Moki D.

reviews.text: My son had bought this a year ago and when we moved into our new neighborhood we wanted some sort of security camera so since my son really liked this we decided to buy it too.  We only have had it set up for a few days but loving how it alerts us when someone walks around the front yard and backyard.  I would highly recommend this as it is easy to set up and easy to use the app.
reviews.author: Amy Hall

reviews.title: "Great Camera.  Easy to set up.  High quality video"
reviews.text: First let me say that I took the time to upgrade my wifi before I even considered buying these cameras.   These cameras can make a bad wifi signal any better.  Having said that I was suprised that once I set them up they rarely are off line.  The video quality is very good, you can invite other people to be able to view the cameras and manage their access (I own a 3 family home).
reviews.author: Kostandino

reviews.title: "Best Security camera on the Market"
reviews.text: I purchased my 2 pack of outdoor cameras on Amazon during Prime week, I have to say they have lived up to the hype. the major selling point is the reliable alerts combined with performance & durability made to last against the elements. the cameras are so easy to set up and install. it took me & my dad 40 mins to set up both cameras 1 front above the garage 10-12 feet 1 backyard.
reviews.author: djmannyfaces

reviews.title: "Excellent Camera"
reviews.text: I purchased the Nest Outdoor Camera to be able to monitor my home when I'm home and away. The picture quality is awesome. The microphone picks up sound very good. The notifications are excellent. Always on point. The install was very easy. Setting up the camera to my wifi using the app was quick and smooth. This camera is exactly what I was looking for. You won't be disappointed.
reviews.author: Omac

reviews.title: "Peace of Mind!"
reviews.text: The Nest outdoor camera is super easy to install and has great quality. However, a product is only as good as the app that supports it. The Nest App gives you the ability to view all your cameras at a glance and detects people, motion and or sound. Through the Nest Outdoor Cameras we have been able to detect strange behavior at night occurring at our business property. Thank you!
reviews.author: A. Scheffel

reviews.title: "Awesome reliable"
reviews.text: awesome camera have witnessed and seen things I would have missed if not for the Nest cam and Nest Aware and alerts  my neighbors even appreciate me having them and keeping an eye on the neighborhood. nice to be able to monitor home when I am away. love the ability to review past and present days. going to purchase a nest Hello. I have an Ring doorbell and can only review events.
reviews.author: Hm1234

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: I was browsing and browsing for weeks for a wireless setup, I strolled across this device and to my surprise it was an easy set up, great picture quality, covers a lot within it's little lense. I can hear audio amazing, not so much for the receiving end of the camera. I love the notifications, I wasn't aware that the set up allows you to see "motion" vs. "people" awesome feature.
reviews.author: Ashley603

reviews.title: "Love this product. First of many."
reviews.text: I bought the two pack bundle and plan to buy a few more in the future. The Nest Aware app is awesome and allows me to get notifications and monitor my house when I'm away. I get alerts from when packages being delivered, when my dog barks and when I have visitors. The two way audio is perfect as well. I highly recommend and am very satisfied with my decision to get this product.
reviews.author: PhilTheNerve

reviews.title: "Great camera, easy to setup"
reviews.text: This is the third Nest category of products I have purchased. All have been easy to setup and use on the app. They are intuitive and give me and my family peace of mind knowing that our house is being looked after all day. The Nest Cam has been another great addition and one that we use every day. If it weren't for the Nest Cam, I wouldn't know what is going on when we are away.
reviews.author: B. Bell

reviews.title: "Excellent outdoor camera"
