reviews.text: I personally installed this camera in the front door porch of my home as a means of securing when I am traveling.   It was easy to install and works very well.  The picture quality is excellent.   It is part of the Nest security system that I installed myself throughout the house.  I highly recommend the whole system over having one of the expensive commercial systems installed.
reviews.author: Duane

reviews.text: I decided on a two pack of exterior cameras and installed then for home security on the front and side of our house. Literally day one, a package was stolen of the front steps, and the thief stuck around to see what else he could steal. The cameras captured the whole thing, and my wife scared him off with the speaker. Videos were easy to share with the police and  great quality.
reviews.author: not my full name

reviews.title: "Great great great"
reviews.text: This camera was a complete unexpected surprise! It has incredible clarity, speakers and sound that are as clear as a bell, and exceeded my expectations! It was simple and easy to set up and connected to my Nest app with a single barcode scan. Now I have multiple NEST devices and everyone Is a high-quality device. I would highly recommend this product. I will be getting anorher.
reviews.author: Vicki S

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: I have installed the doorbell and the outdoor cameras. I install camera's and security lighting in my professional business and the easy of the installation is great the picture is wonderful and the wide view and the fact it zooms on faces is supper cool. I do recommend using the 2 stage security for signing in and if you have a pro installation change your password afterwards.
reviews.author: The Setup Guy

reviews.title: "Art that works!"
reviews.text: Extremely happy with my Outdoor Cam purchase.   Amazing design and build quality.  A beautiful piece of funtional art.  The set up process was fast and fun. The custom mounting handware provided was well designed and made installation a breeze.   And best of all, the whole system works great!   Video and sound performance is excellent.  The app is easy to use.   Very happy!
reviews.author: mdixon

reviews.title: "Customer since dropcam"
reviews.text: I recently added 2 nest outdoor camera to my house. Works flawlessly. The integration with home hub is excellent. If you have the google eco system or not, it works perfectly with just your phone. That said if you have home hub, or android TV or chromcast, you can ask google to stream video from camera and it does stream seamlessly. Audio and picture quality is top notch.
reviews.author: Hatz1

reviews.title: "Really good product"
reviews.text: The Nest camera is quality . The setup is easy and the product is reliable. The mobile app is good but could use a freeze frame capability.  The wiring is not really designed to be fished through walls but I was to work around it. The camera is powered on 120v AC and uses WiFi.  I consider that the best option. Batteries in cameras are often inaccessible to replace or charge.
reviews.author: Ken M

reviews.title: "Pool Camera"
reviews.text: Love the camera. Main reason we got our camera is to watch our pool. We have a pool fence but we wanted extra safety since we have small children around (my kids and neighbors). Anytime someone or something goes around our pool we will get alerts on our phones and we can check it out. Camera works great, I will probably buy another one for other parts of our yard in the future.
reviews.author: Kaleb

reviews.title: "Excellent Security"
reviews.text: I purchased five Nest cameras after seeing the Nest app on a friends cell phone. I was impressed with his video quality and ease of use. The purchase was worth every cent and everything from ease of use with the app to installion was better and easier than expected. I will purchase additional Nest items in the near future. I highly recommend Nest indoor and outdoor cameras.
reviews.author: Robert165

reviews.title: "Love it"
reviews.text: We bought this product to replace a Lorex system.  Like the Nest so much better. Easy to set up, easy to install. Pics are super clear and have a wide angle. Stays connected to our wifi, where the Lorex system was constantly dropping and showing disconnected. Like being able to talk on this Nest system to others outside when we see them on camera. The tech support was awesome!!
reviews.author: The Setup Guy

reviews.title: "Extremely easy set up, excellent video"
reviews.text: All you need is WiFi and a electrical outlet. Never change a battery, 24 hour video recording so you never miss anything. Adjustable zones for notification, yes there is a fee but what true service dosen't charge a fee and I really feel you get what you pay for with this service. I am extremely satisfied with the cameras I installed and plan on incorporating more nest products.
reviews.author: Wald

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: Easy magnet setup makes install and moving easy. Quality day and night is impressive. Ability to keep history hasn't been needed but it is nice to have. It would be beneficial to have a cordless camera as getting through window to inside plug was difficult especially when having to move it back inside due to freezing weather. Not real complaints though, just wishes for future!
reviews.author: Bri B

reviews.title: "Fantastic camera!"
reviews.text: The nest outdoor camera has been a fantastic outdoor camera to own. Not only does it look really good but it delivers great image quality. The best part of the camera is the microphone which is able to pick up the smallest sound outside!  Although I prefer the Neat IQ outdoor camera, this is an excellent choice if you're not able to budget for the IQ.  Nest is the best!
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Happy Customer"
reviews.text: I have had my outside cameras for about a month and a half now.  My friend told me about them and said they work great.  She was right. It was very easy to install them and the view is great.  We are seniors so the ease of putting them up was fantastic.  I can go back and look up anything that might have looked suspicious and the picture quality is wonderful.  I just love it!
reviews.author: Toby1

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor Review"
reviews.text: My nest cam was very simple to install, though I did have professional install it. My Nest cam watches over my home and my neighbors. It has already recorded one robbery where the thief was caught. It also records when my dog walker(s) show up and leave. Even while on vacation, I could notify one of my neighbors that they forgot to close their garage door. I love my Nest Cam!
reviews.author: Lorri

reviews.text: My family and I are extremely pleased with our nest outdoor cameras.  We initially bought one to simply try it out and was sold immediately after the installation.  We immediately proceeded to purchasing two more due the layout of our home and are very satisfied.  Having the capability of viewing our surroundings not only deters porch bandits but provides a sense of security.
reviews.author: Colin g

reviews.title: "Father, husband and Educator"
reviews.text: Every family home needs this. Nest is the go to security system of choice hands down. Truth be told,  not tech savvy and  i am a father and husband but installing the Nest system indoor and outdoor proved to be easy quick and very rewarding. If you are looking for something that can give you peace of mind while still affordable a huge bang for your buck get Nest. Def. 10/10.
reviews.author: EdwinL

reviews.title: "The Nest Cam is my outdoor eyes"
reviews.text: The outdoor Nest Cam has provided such as sense of security for me. I cannot see out the front door to see who is there without opening it - and now I can see the entire porch, driveway, and road, w/o any problem, on my iphone Nest Cam. I can zoom in to check out what I am unsure I am seeing too. My vision is poor, so this is a spectacular feature for me! Love this camera!!!
reviews.author: RubénB

reviews.title: "I've recommended this!"
reviews.text: This has super clear audio and video. I was pretty amazed.  The view is perfect. Reaches everywhere I need it to. I have 2 now and it's perfect for living out in the middle of nowhere. Helps me keep an eye on the dogs as well as seeing the delivery guys leave packages. The only draw back is having to purchase a subscription for viewing your history.  Still pretty good camera
reviews.author: Rob305

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: I purchased 2 outdoor Nest Cams and they have worked great. The quality of the picture is fantastic, the ease of set up and use, both online and mobile, is great. I watched a video that showed how to set them up and use them and within an hour both cameras were installed and working.  You can set up zones that the cameras can notify you of any activity.  Definitely worth it.
reviews.author: rws1

reviews.title: "Highly Recommend"
reviews.text: So far in the years I've had Next outdoor cameras I've had zero problems.   The image is sharp (until you zoom in using the digital zoom) and gives me views of areas around my house that I otherwise wouldn't have unless I physically walked to a window.   It's especially good to have the cameras when you're away.  It's a comfort to be able to see what's going on at your home.
reviews.author: Dave1

reviews.title: "So much more"
reviews.text: Having the ability to scroll through days of video with Nest Aware is a key feature when considering purchase.  Other cams only send you a brief video of detected motion, which doesn't help you to find out where that car came from, which way the person went when leaving your property, which way your dog ran, or abnormal activity across the street or in s neighbors driveway.
reviews.author: Saad

reviews.title: "Out Door Nest Camera"
reviews.text: To give this a 5   - had I known that I could use the Smart Phone APP the first time I set this up, it would of most likely been much easier.  The product is an excellent choice if you are in the market for a security camera that is not connected to your local police department. The ability to clip and save portions of video and the ease of being able to share is excellent!
reviews.author: LeviSue

reviews.title: "Easy installation, easy use"
reviews.text: From the time I took the cameras out of the box to the point of finished installation it was an easy process. Instructions were very easy to follow. Once I had determined where to mount the cameras it took less than an hour to have them operational. The app was easy to set up and navigating the app is again, easy. We've had them installed for a month and are very satisfied.
reviews.author: RPShoe

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor Review"
reviews.text: My nest cam was very simple to install, though I did have professional install it. My Nest cam watches over my home and my neighbors. It has already recorded one robbery where the thief was caught. It also records when my dog walker(s) show up and leave. Even while on vacation, I could notify one of my neighbors that they forgot to close their garage door. I love my Nest Cam!
reviews.author: Lorri

reviews.text: My family and I are extremely pleased with our nest outdoor cameras.  We initially bought one to simply try it out and was sold immediately after the installation.  We immediately proceeded to purchasing two more due the layout of our home and are very satisfied.  Having the capability of viewing our surroundings not only deters porch bandits but provides a sense of security.

Truth be told,  not tech savvy and  i am a father and husband but installing the Nest system indoor and outdoor proved to be easy quick and very rewarding. If you are looking for something that can give you peace of mind while still affordable a huge bang for your buck get Nest. Def. 10/10.

Helps me keep an eye on the dogs as well as seeing the delivery guys leave packages. The only draw back is having to purchase a subscription for viewing your history.  Still pretty good camera

I watched a video that showed how to set them up and use them and within an hour both cameras were installed and working.  You can set up zones that the cameras can notify you of any activity.  Definitely worth it.

The image is sharp (until you zoom in using the digital zoom) and gives me views of areas around my house that I otherwise wouldn't have unless I physically walked to a window.   It's especially good to have the cameras when you're away.  It's a comfort to be able to see what's going on at your home.

reviews.text: Having the ability to scroll through days of video with Nest Aware is a key feature when considering purchase.  Other cams only send you a brief video of detected motion, which doesn't help you to find out where that car came from, which way the person went when leaving your property, which way your dog ran, or abnormal activity across the street or in s neighbors driveway.
reviews.author: Saad

reviews.title: "Out Door Nest Camera"
reviews.text: To give this a 5   - had I known that I could use the Smart Phone APP the first time I set this up, it would of most likely been much easier.  The product is an excellent choice if you are in the market for a security camera that is not connected to your local police department. The ability to clip and save portions of video and the ease of being able to share is excellent!
reviews.author: LeviSue

reviews.title: "Easy installation, easy use"
reviews.text: From the time I took the cameras out of the box to the point of finished installation it was an easy process. Instructions were very easy to follow. Once I had determined where to mount the cameras it took less than an hour to have them operational. The app was easy to set up and navigating the app is again, easy. We've had them installed for a month and are very satisfied.
reviews.author: RPShoe

reviews.title: "Excellent Product"
reviews.text: I bought a Nest outdoor cam as a home security device. It's functionality, ease of use, and look all exceeded my expectations. The installation process is very easy, it took me 30 minutes at the most. Its abilities have blown me away, I am now constantly looking at other areas of my home where I can install another. The piece of mind it provides is worth the price alone.
reviews.author: Rob R

reviews.title: "Great cameras for home security monitiring"
reviews.text: We love Nest cameras both inside and outside our residence and a vacation home.  It is easy to set up, and get on the I ternet.  It also has a wide view and the identification setup help notify if a person or other motion occurs.  The recording service is very reasonable.  We monitor our pets as well when we are away for several hours.  Overall this  is a great service.
reviews.author: PaulaBurnett

reviews.title: "Excellent Build Quality"
reviews.text: I chose these due to my familiarity with their products that I already have implemented in my home.  I purchased a two pack of the Nest Cam Outdoor to cover the front and back doors and surrounding areas within its viewing area. I have been extremely pleased with the view that I get during daylight hours & at night. Notifications can be as heavy or as light as you wish.
reviews.author: Glstrak

reviews.title: "Easy install, great view"
reviews.text: Although I consider myself a relatively capable person when it comes to technology, being a millennial, setting up a Nest camera is so easy I suspect my dogs could even do it (if only they had thumbs). Finding the best location to mount the camera did take us a couple tries both in daylight and evening hours to ensure the ideal spot. Mounting it was a breeze after that!
reviews.author: Chris T

reviews.title: "Great Outdoor cam"
reviews.text: It has only been 24hrs and I can tell you this product is far superior to any of the 2 other brands of cameras I have owned.  It has a great design and can easily adjust the camera to face it where you want it by way of it's unique magnetic base.The quality of the video is amazing in night and day.  The alerts I receive differentiate between people, things and sounds.
reviews.author: Steve F

reviews.text: I really like this camera.  The setup was easy, if you just follow the instructions.  The camera and the computer do all the work for you in the setup.  You simply power it up after that and it's working, supplying video.  All of the hardware needed for the installation is included; mounts for the camera and the USB connector, straps for the wires and stainless screws.
reviews.author: Brill Street

reviews.title: "Great Camera."
reviews.text: Overall the Nest Cam is great, however I really like the Nest Cam IQ that does so much more.  If you're simply watching the back yard or some general area, this camera is fine.  But consider if you're watching your garage entrance or door way entrance you may want to consider the Nest Cam IQ due to the way it zooms in on the subject.  A great feature you can't ignore!
reviews.author: JamesM from Carlisle, KY

reviews.title: "Great thus far"
reviews.text: I've had this several days after my neighborhood had a break-in and attempted break-ins to monitor my backyard. My house has siding so it is relatively easy to screw the components into the wall and I was able to mount the camera above my back door.  Using IFTTT I have my Hue liguts turn on when this camera detects motion which will hopefully deter would be criminals.
reviews.author: Mr. Technology

reviews.title: "Best camera ever!"
reviews.text: I had  a security camera by a security company that did not work properly and was on the phone constantly getting it to work. It never did work so I canceled the security company and got a nest camera for the front and back of my house and they worked perfectly the very first time they were installed. They were actually very easy to install. I'm very happy I got them.
reviews.author: Nena

reviews.title: "Nest cam outdoors"
reviews.text: We recently purchased three nestcam outdoor cameras to keep an eye on our driveway at home and the entrance to a small campground on our farm. We love being able to see who is coming and going when we are not outside. It's great to to be able to know what we wouldn't know without these cameras. I would recommend them to anyone wanting to keep an eye on their property.
reviews.author: Mollybr

reviews.title: "Nest Home"
reviews.text: This is the 4th & 5th Nest cameras that I've purchased for my home. I have cameras in my common areas and it only made sense to add additional security outside my home to monitor parking and my door. The app works great with all indoor and outdoor cameras as well as our Nest Thermostats. It makes it easy to monitor and control the house while I'm home or on the road.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor"
reviews.text: Purchased July 2018, set up was very easy. Installation was fairly easy as long  as you have an electrical outlet near by. (Would like the option for a longer connection cable).  The night vision portion of the camera has been a tad difficult, I currently have a halo effect and in the process of trying different ways to resolve the issue. Overall HD video is awesome!
reviews.author: Chuy

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: I wanted to be able to keep track of my home while I was at work, and out of town. This camera was very easy to set up, is able to connect to my router even in a weak signal area above my garage, and has great resolution and picture. Night vision on this camera also works very well. I have been using this camera for about a month-and-a-half, and have zero complaints.
reviews.author: Shawn_S

reviews.title: "Really enjoying this technology"
reviews.text: I'm a single mom of two kids, one of whom is a latchkey. It's important to me to know that there is no one hanging around my property that should not be there, and to watch my child come home after getting off the bus every day. The quality of the camera is EXCELLENT, it has a microphone and person alerts. I'm never in the dark of what is going on when I'm not home.
reviews.author: LaineyS

reviews.title: "Excellent Self Monitoring"
reviews.text: Very easy to install / put up.  The magnet bracket affords more options for where you can put it.We put it on our metal railing and it blends nicely to where most folks never notice it.Great picture quality, zoom in and out on your mobile device. Only negative comment is that the playback feature on the app can be confusing for some users.Overall a great product
reviews.author: C.A. Johnson

reviews.title: "Quality Product!"
reviews.text: I have three outdoor Nest cameras and have been extremely pleased with everything about them. They are well designed, easy to install, easy to maintain and easy to use. I had a prior system that was marginal and have been very, very happy since installing the Nest cameras several years ago. Even the packaging and installation materials are engineered! Great product!
reviews.author: Tony60Jr

reviews.text: I have had a nest for about over a year. It was for the front door. (before the nest doorcam). It works so well for that purpose, I had to get one for the driveway. I can cover not only my yard, but all of my immediate neighbors yards as well. It has caugh several incidents that could have ended badly had I not known about them in time. Highly recommend these units.
reviews.author: Stdugno

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Cam/Nest Aware"
reviews.text: We absolutely love our outdoor Nest cam. It's a great product with reliable results. I haven't seen any other camera or app that sends you person alerts. It also zooms in when it sees a person Incase it's someone who's not supposed to be there. The app is super easy and convenient. The camera quality is also great. We love ours and can't wait to add on more cameras.
reviews.author: Jesslong

reviews.title: "Works great"
reviews.text: Installed the camera outside to keep an eye on packages and people ringing the doorbell.  As adults, works great when seeing someone we don't want to answer the door for BUT the child goes to the window to talk to them.  It has a feature to talk to the people outside BUT our internet doesn't work that well and so the feature doesn't work so well.  There is a delay.
reviews.author: Windy Gause

reviews.title: "What took me so long?"
reviews.text: This, Nest Outdoor Camera works as described.  Actually, a lot more than I expected!  The ease of installation, locations to select as well as sleek design, was installed in less than 30 mins.  When I changed internet providers, the ease to re-install the camera was a breeze!  I've owned this camera for over a year and the video quality is still, top-shelf, like!!
reviews.author: CJC4TH

reviews.title: "Great Camera!"
reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of video and reliability of my Nest Outdoor Cameras. They were pretty straightforward to install and have worked flawlessly. We get a few alerts that turn out to be false, but i'd rather have that than the alternative. It is well-integrated into the Nest app. Overall, this is a great product and I am happy to recommend it to others,
reviews.author: Derrick R

reviews.title: "Great Cameras!"
reviews.text: I bought two cameras to cover my backyard.  (I already have a Nest doorbell to cover the front.)  The instructions were easy to follow and within minutes I had the cameras installed and working.  In two days I FINALLY found out what was activating my motion detector lights in the middle of the night...a stray cat.I love my Nest cameras and highly recommend them!
reviews.author: Rudi

reviews.title: "Definitely recommend Nest"
reviews.text: After researching several brands, I decided to purchase the Nest Cam Outdoor 2 pack.  In addition to its solid construction, it was a breeze to setup and install as well.  The video and audio exceeds my expectations.  I'm just getting familiar with Nest Aware, but so far it's very intuitive and informational.  I'm very happy and pleased with my purchase decision.
reviews.author: Scott W

reviews.title: "Steve"
reviews.text: I live on a dead end street in a quiet neighborhood and could not believe how many cars would pull into my driveway,without the nest outdoor cam I would have never known of all this activity and love the fact that the camera notifies me when my son gets home from school he actually intentionally walks by the camera and gives me a wave knowing that I get the alert
reviews.author: Stevemako

reviews.title: "Great quality video and easy to use app"
reviews.text: The video quality from these cameras is much better than I expected. We subscribe to the nest aware and I would not own a camera without it. We've had neighbors that were broken into and were able to go back and review our footage to provide helpful information. The app is super easy to use and convenient. I love being able to keep an eye on things from anywhere!
reviews.author: Rowland55

reviews.title: "Safety and Security"
reviews.text: I bought these cameras a while ago, but it took a while for me to actually put them up.  Now that they are up, I can't believe I waited this long.  I love having the feeling of my family being safe and secure - I can see who comes to the doors, I know when the family is getting home, and I can talk through the cameras.  I'm exceptionally happy with this product.
reviews.author: atuck

reviews.title: "Easy to install, simple to use"
reviews.text: The outdoor Nest Cam was incredibly easy to install. I read the directions, tested the units (I bought a two pack) and performed the physical installation. All-in-all, it took about 30 minutes to do the install for each unit. They provide great coverage and the imagery is pretty sharp. I will definitely be adding more Nest products to my home in the near future.
reviews.author: PandJ

reviews.title: "Great product - easy to set up and use"
reviews.text: This was my first security camera purchase and I decided to go with a nest product since I have a thermostat already. I wanted to be able to control everything from one app! The box includes the camera, an instruction pamphlet and some useful hardware that makes the installation process easy. I just finished the free trial and already purchased the Nest Aware.
reviews.author: Jay T.

reviews.text: I installed the nest outdoor camera, everything went smoothly. The only complaint I really have his Ness needs to come up with a smaller wiring diameter to insert through the wall when you install it instead of drilling such a large hole for the connector to fit through.  The quality of the video is excellent, specially the night vision!  Would recommend to buy.
reviews.author: Jonn S

reviews.title: "Great Camera for Monitoring"
reviews.text: Nest is our second set of cameras. The difference between these and our prior setup is Night & Day. Video quality is excellent! I was concerned about the magnets ability to hold the camera during strong storms but I was pleasantly surprised the cameras did not even shake a little.I have and would recommend these. Nest Aware storage prices are a bit high though.
reviews.author: Your Neighbor

reviews.title: "Peace of Mind"
reviews.text: Love my new Nest outdoor cameras and indoor motion detectors and door alarms.  It has given me peace of mind in so many ways.  I have the ability to turn my security system off from my phone to allow family into my house when I'm not there and still be able to see them on camera when they pull into my driveway.  The entire system is very user friendly.  Love it!
reviews.author: AL D.

reviews.title: "Great for deterring creepers"
reviews.text: Installed these in our front and back yards. Setup was quick except for running/hiding the cords to a power source. Great picture clarity and like the fact that there is a speaker feature. Only suggestions would be to offer a camera/floodlight combination and improve the playback high speed scrubbing since as it is now it is easy to skip over the person/motion.
reviews.author: Sean

reviews.text: Love the camera.  The picture quality is great and it is nice to have a piece of mind while away to see if anyone is coming to my home.   The only issue I have is the camera is a bit sensitive and picks up some passing vehicles from the road in front of my house, so I get to many alerts (I guess better then not sensitive enough thoug and missing some activity).
reviews.author: Wild Bear

reviews.title: "Best in the market"
reviews.text: The camera it self is the best in the market, the picture quality and audio quality is great. Setting up was very simple and fast. The only issue i had was setting up nest aware, the subscription service for the 24/7 continues recording. For some reason my trial didnt start and my cameras ended up taking pictures every time there was movement, which is no help.
reviews.author: Derrick R

reviews.title: "Best outdoor cam"
reviews.text: Just installed my second outdoor nest cam. Easy to connect to WiFi out of the box and installation was a breeze. Everything you need is in the box, minus the tools. The notifications help keep my home safe when we're not there. It's a little over priced IMO, but the quality is there. Saving up for my indoor cameras next. The app and using Alexa make it a breeze
reviews.author: Nestcamfan

reviews.title: "Absolute Best Camera There Is!!"
reviews.text: We have 2 outdoor cameras in our front yard and this summer 24 cars on our street were broken into. Windows smashed and items stolen.  While sadly I was asleep and ignored my alerts (which I'll never do again) the entire crime was caught on our Nest Cam. I'm happy to report that they caught the guys and thanks to our Nest Cam footage they are being prosecuted!
reviews.author: Liz S

reviews.title: "Great Video Quality"
reviews.text: Having a Ring doorbell, and the Nest outdoor camera allows me to capture people from multiple angles.  In one instance I had someone approach the door and the Ring video quality made it hard to identify the person in the video I captured.  The Nest video was much clearer even though the camera was several feet further than the doorbell camera.  I love my Nest!
reviews.author: PunchyDClown

reviews.title: "Great Product with a few Flaws (IMHO)"
reviews.text: Great Camera, easy to set up, at a moderate price (could be a little more affordable). If there was an additional mounting bracket for awkward views, and If I could get the activity monitor to behave, this product would by far gotten a 5 Star review from me, other than my issues, it's a great product, and the video management system application is very decent.
reviews.author: Edwin C.

reviews.title: "Amazing cameras"
reviews.text: I started off but purchasing one nest cam outdoor and that's all it took. I had 3 more before I even bought our house me and my wife live in now. Super easy to set up. Have all mine on the exterior of my home and ran the cords into the attic where they are all plugged up. The only thing is if you have horrible WiFi it may be a problem for more than 2 cameras.
reviews.author: DamonCM

reviews.title: "Good cameras"
reviews.text: Very easy to set up.  Just be sure to have a good strong wifi router if using the wireless cameras.  I have an ATT router and it's good but I would have issues with connection strength from time to time and connection to the camer and i would have to reset the camera by unplugging from time to time.  So I got a netgear dual band router, not one problem since!
reviews.author: Marshall

reviews.title: "EASY!"
reviews.text: Installation, and setup were very easy. I did upgrade my wireless network so the signal was strong enough to connect to the camera. This is something you might need to take into consideration before purchasing the camera. The app is easy to use. It was great fun watching snow falling in April while we were sitting on the beach in Florida. Great video quality!
reviews.author: Swag

reviews.title: "Awesome product"
reviews.text: I love this system....clear images even at night and it's worth the price....I have tried other cameras and these are the best - you won't be disappointed!  It's easy to install and be ready to say "wow" love it!  You also have sound activation which is awesome when you have pets....you can also program alerts on certain areas as well......best on the market!
reviews.author: Colin g

reviews.title: "Nest Newbies"
reviews.text: We just joined the Nest family and couldn't be happier. Picture quality it's superb definitely recommend to anybody.
reviews.author: James

reviews.title: "The apex of security cameras"
reviews.text: I have these cameras throughout the interior and exterior of my home.  The piece of mind it provides is worth the expenditures.  It provides  other side benefits, like did I turn on/off a particular light.  Is/was there storm damage was I am away.  The ability to talk to people, through the camera speaker is great.  No more guessing if the mail has come yet.
reviews.author: Engineer

reviews.title: "Clear night vision"
reviews.text: Bought the Nest outdoor camera to monitor our driveway and garage. My son in law set it up in less than 30 minutes. It has great day and night vision. Set it up for all motions and got to many alerts for cars going by. Changes to people and voices. Got an alert at 4 am that voices were heard. Watched camera and say neighbors coming home. Great camera so far
reviews.author: Pops45

reviews.title: "Rest Assure"
reviews.text: Having the NEST CAM will give you peace of mind when you are sleeping and when you are at work, at play or out of town.  The wide view, the video quality, the sound are top notch!  Being able to communicate with the microphone is very handy especially when someone is on your property and you announce,"May I help you?" Protect your for home&family with Nest.
reviews.author: SouthFL.Family

reviews.title: "Very easy to install and use with very good video"
reviews.text: I'm very handy, so not deterred by involved installs, but this was so easy, just about anyone could do it. The setup and launch were done in minutes. i already have nest thermostats and a doorbell, so the addition to my account was a breeze. the video quality is quite good.  Notifications have been very good. Overall an easy way to add security to your home
reviews.author: ChrisE

reviews.text: We are using to nest cameras on our building site where we are rebuilding our home after the California wildfires. They are tremendous asset to see how work is progressing to see who is visiting the job site to see who is visiting the job site on off hours to help us feel secure. We feel like we are there in real time and have security when we are not there
reviews.author: Sarafran

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: Easy install and great video. Only issues that I've had is loss of video from poor Wifi signal, usually correcting itself within a half an hour or sooner, (I've found that a Wifi booster or Pod can correct this issue). Suggestions for NEST; 1. More secure power plug in, (Tamper proof). 2. Ability to adjust/personalize more to Alerts to your phone in Zones.
reviews.author: Nest Cam Owner

reviews.title: "Lifesaver"
reviews.text: We recently had a break in at our neighbor's house and it prompted us to immediately invest in some sort of security system. We looked over the features and prices of the different brands of security cameras and right away chose the Nest twin pack because of the capability and value of the product. This is a fantastic product that gives you peace of mind.
reviews.author: Alvin

reviews.title: "Good Product - long term cost is a concern"
reviews.text: I love the product, easy to install, video quality is good especially on sunny days - the capture and notification features are great - however it is disappointing that this functionality goes away without a subscription which really adds much more cost to the original purchase. I would like to see a free 3-day service offering with all the functionality.
reviews.author: New User

reviews.title: "Great security camera"
reviews.text: Wasn't sure about security cameras, but I own a Nest Thermostat and it works great so I thought I would stay with nest. Unfortunately I had to have a computer stolen off my front porch with 15 minutes of it being dropped off on my front porch to realize how badly I needed this. The computer company sent the computer with NO signature required (weird huh?)
reviews.author: Gopher Man

reviews.title: "Easy to set up, easy to use."
reviews.text: We've been very pleased with the cameras. The cameras are great. Our only issue is they drop connection multiple times a week but that might be due to the strength of our signal. Hard to say as my phone shows a good connection out there. You really need the Nest Aware subscription for these to be worth it as many of the features aren't enabled without it.
reviews.author: Brian in Texas

reviews.title: "Solid Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: I decided to upgrade my system from 2nd gen Arlo cameras. While I still use an Arlo camera in my basement, for the base alarm, I replaced my front door camera with a Nest Outdoor Cam. My main reasons we're the following:- continuous recording so I no actions are missed- no more having to charge the cameras battery. - Android TV app! This is a big one!
reviews.author: Aliaba

reviews.title: "It works as easily as it installs"
reviews.text: Installation is a breeze once you find your outlet and location.  Best to set up using your computer before installing.  Adjusting the functions and reviewing the footage is very simple on a smartphone.  It is easy to find activity using the scrolling, although moving shadows can be mistaken for people.  Once you know this, it is simple to get past them.
reviews.author: Myrtle Beach Dan

reviews.title: "Easy to install and use"
reviews.text: The product was easy to install and use. All of my cameras are connected to external power outlets. Hence, I did not have to drill large holes in the house. After buying the first one to watch the front door and the driveway, I quickly added another two in other areas. They have been reliable and definitely give a piece of mind while we're away. Thanks!
reviews.author: YKYK

reviews.title: "Excellent product!"
reviews.text: It may seem a little pricey, but what price would you pay for peace of mind? It is easy to setup and use, and the area the camera covers is substantial. The length of outlet cable is more than long enough. We have a long driveway, and I really like that I can easily identify the vehicles pulling off the road into our driveway. You won't be disappointed.
reviews.author: Fignewt66

reviews.title: "Security done right."
reviews.text: This product makes a lot of promises, but unlike a lot of other devices, it delivers. It has become an essential part of our hole since we out it in and I couldn't be happier. One thing that would be nice though, is if Nest products could be made compatible with Homekit. Most of my smart home products are used through my Home app and this would be nice.
reviews.author: Eric F in TX

reviews.title: "Very Happy With Nest Camera"
reviews.text: Easy setup & use, with a more intuitive software interface than other similar products. Camera image quality, design & feel is a touch better than their competitors. Nest's magnetic mounting design is wonderful. Additionally, if you're into the Google eco-system, like we are, Nest integrates very well with our other products like Sony Flat Screen TV's.
reviews.author: Jacob JG

reviews.title: "Flawless execution"
reviews.text: With great looks and solid performance, you don't have to look any further for your remote viewing solutions. Easy to install and looks great on any surface. Solid 24/7 performance, fire and forget. I usually don't bother with a review, but after coming from Vivints absolutely atrocious performance, this is a welcomed breath of fresh technological air.
reviews.author: jay-cee

reviews.title: "Outstanding clarity and reliability"
reviews.text: Easy to install and set up and we are seniors. Excellent coverage, video is crystal clear and never misses a person or thing. We have this camera on outback patio to watch the slider plus we are able to monitor the grand kids in the back yard and our big old yellow Lab. We leave this camera on 24/7 to monitor from inside the house and when we are away.
reviews.author: Lvmaryvis

reviews.title: "Quimby"
reviews.text: Installed this about a month ago. Fairly easy to install if you have an outlet available.  Does everything it said it does.  Was even more impressed with clarity of the video and the quality of the sound. Camera has a wider range than I thought.  I can see more of my yard and neighbors than I expected.  And to me not requiring batteries was a big plus.
reviews.author: Wendell B.

reviews.title: "Excellent product and easy to install"
reviews.text: If you want to install an outdoor camera on your house or property, you will love this device.The installation materials are incredibly well designed and thought out.  Right down to the cable clips and the included screws, this device is high-quality, easy to install and a breeze to use.  Video quality and viewing range is excellent.  Well done Nest.
reviews.author: Mark68

reviews.title: "Easy setup and use"
reviews.text: The easiest camera setup/ installation I have ever done. I have recently added the Nest door bell and a neat outdoor cameras each took approximately 10 minutes to do and the app is extremely helpful. I would highly recommend it even if you aren't experienced installer since the Nest tutorials are very helpful ( so I have been told)by other installers.
reviews.author: Hector R

reviews.title: "Nest Home Security"
reviews.text: I had been looking for quite some time for a Security Camera system for the specific use of monitoring my home with visible cameras.  After looking at several reviews I decided to purchase 5 cameras.  From the well informed initial order and timely receipt of extremely well packaged products to the step by step installation, it was a seamless process.
reviews.author: Patriot

reviews.title: "One Problem"
reviews.text: I may just have a bad apple but one of my 3 outdoor cameras goes offline a few times a day for a few hours at a time. It is the same distance from my wireless router as my other two and those NEVER go offline. Other than that I love the camera viewing angle, resolution and alert features. Definitely a great product for your home and/or vacation home.
reviews.author: Mike G

reviews.title: "Great!"
reviews.text: Just mounted nest can IQ and work great!  Easy follow directions included and easy to use app...one of our 2-set box of cameras did not work at all (wouldn't even turn on), but the ones that worked right out of box were very high quality & we will be adding more to replace old cameras around out property!  Hoping Nest replaces the defective camera...
reviews.author: Mk13

reviews.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor gives wide angled viewing and is especially useful for monitoring your home from anywhere. I have mine connected to a battery backup. My NestAware subscription provides me with video clips of motion and sounds and retains 5 days of these. It's very important to have this so you can monitor activity at your home when  travelling.
reviews.author: CherylN

reviews.title: "DIY peace of mind!"
reviews.text: I am so happy with my Nest Outdoor camera. I thought I would need assistance or a professional to install it, but it was so easy I did it myself. The video is crystal clear and looks great, even at night. I'm super pleased and plan to get more cameras for other sides of the house. You can do this yourself! Don't let anyone make you think you can't.
reviews.author: Stevie17

reviews.title: "Nest Cam outdoor"
reviews.text: I wanted a simple, easy to use app and camera (outside for both front and backyards) to keep an eye on my property and packages that are delivered to my house.It's easy to use, the camera's video is really clear and so are voices heard on the camera. It was easy to install and I like that you can control it from your cell phone when you are away.
reviews.author: The Angry Jockey

reviews.title: "Peace of Mind"
reviews.text: I was given a Nest Thermostat and began using it and understanding the usefulness of it. I've since installed cameras in the living room aimed at the back door, the laundry room monitoring the furnace, water heater and water meter, Garage aimed at the house exterior and House aimed at the Front yard and door.  The Smoke Detectors are great as well.
reviews.author: Snow Bird

reviews.text: We've been very happy with our outdoor cameras. They're able to differentiate between motion (our small dogs or curtains blowing) and people. They have great pic quality, and the app is easy to set up and use.  We haven't used the audio much yet. It probably works well live but there's a bit of a delay using it from a notification, as you'd expect
reviews.author: Sandra H

reviews.title: "Wonderful camera!"
reviews.text: I use my nest cameras to keep an eye on my dogs.  I absolutely love it! It was so easy to set up, and I can check up on them easily when they are playing outside. It works great watching through the nest app on my iPad, my Echo Show, and through my Apple TV.   I have 4 set up in my backyard and I don't experience any lagging or poor video quality.
reviews.author: Mindyury

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: Great camera.  I wanted a camera to monitor my driveway and front yard area.  At first i had issues with the camera losing Wi-Fi connectivity, but that issue has passed.  I would like to see the price of the camera come down, before I purchased another camera (or doorbell camera).  Overall this is an excellent product with a great picture quality.
reviews.author: Jen A.

reviews.title: "Sleek and Easy to Use/Install"
reviews.text: I have had nest thermostats for years and enjoy how easy to install and easy to use they are. We live in the country and my wife has wanted an outdoor camera since we moved in. The picture quality is excellent and the camera works easily with my thermostats. Best of all it is interesting to see the local wildlife come and go throughout the day.
reviews.author: Jeff Ste.

reviews.title: "Nestcam"
reviews.text: The camera is easy to set up and has a good quality picture.  The weather does not bother it (I have had it through 2 Ohio winters).  The only issue is that shadows from changing weather conditions (clouds to bright sunshine) can trigger a movement alert.  This might be true of all motion sensing cameras, but I am only familiar with this product.
reviews.author: GSB4243

reviews.title: "Best DIY I ever decided to do!"
reviews.text: After my dog was attacked by neighborhood children, I had enough! I went to the hardware store bought these cameras hung them and have had piece of mind ever since! Super easy ,not a bad price , and just a small amount of tech aggravation as with anything =) I am very happy! Would so recommend spending the time and $ to have extra eyes on things!
reviews.author: Hey Google!

reviews.text: Nice easy setup, video is very good, and the detection of motion and people is really cool. I love the alerts it sends to your phone instantly and and allows you to see in real time any activity that is going on. Being able to hold the video on the cloud is a nice feature with several options for an inexpensive way to go back and retrieve video.
reviews.author: Werner

reviews.text: I love these cameras, they are simple to install and manage.   I have to admit that I went with Nest because my parents use the outdoor cams on their home, so I had an idea how they work plus I'm the one who setup them up.  The huge selling point is I can monitor the cams of both my home and my parent's house from the nest app.  Great product!!!
reviews.author: CJC4TH

reviews.title: "Just Better"
reviews.text: I also have another smart camera outside, but it only records video when it senses motion, which if that's what you want, but I much prefer to go back and watch the time lapse of the day. I also love the phone, desktop and tablet app, extremely easy and self explanatory. Set up was extremely easy, my only regret is not buying the pack of three!
reviews.author: Drue

reviews.title: "Easy set up, and peace of mind"
reviews.text: After our place was broken into we needed a solution to monitor our home, and give us peace-of-mind. We use other nest products, and decided this would be a good (and integrated) solution. We weren't disappointing. Installation was super simple, and the push notifications to our phones let us know when someone is coming or going from our place.
reviews.author: Kacie

reviews.title: "Solid performance for price"
reviews.text: The Nest Outdoor Camera performed well above my expectations. I was torn between the IQ but the pricing of the Nest Cam Outdoor was more in my range. The video quality is excellent, for both night and day modes. Resolution could be better, but that is a trade off for the lower price. Easy setup and easy to navigate UI. Would highly recommend!
reviews.author: AlexH

reviews.text: I like the nest cam. I tryed arlo firest and it was a waste of time. Luckily I was able to return it and got the nest cams. I like the 24/7 recording, no battery's and two way talk and listen. 1080 video quality is great also. Still need to get one more outdoor cam. I got this to monitor my elderly father when I have to be away from the house .
reviews.author: J.J.Ridgway

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Cam"
reviews.text: This is a very easy security camera to setup. There aren't any complicated instructions to follow or any linking to be done other than with your wifi router which just involves typing in your router password when required.It is a very attractive piece of equipment and blends well with any decor. The video quality is way better than I expected.
reviews.author: Skyhawk

reviews.title: "A breeze"
reviews.text: After a failed experience with another brand,and a nightmare with their tech support. I removed the hard wired system and returned it.Was a little skeptical of Nest(fear of being twice bitten). Could not believe the ease of set up and operation .Only time will tell if I made the right choice.But at present,I am very happy with my Nest system.
reviews.author: T J Green

reviews.title: "Plug and play"
reviews.text: I picked up a few of these cameras after our vehicles were broken into a few months back. I hated the idea that someone had taken from my family and we had no idea until the nest morning. Now I get instant notifications all day long and see what I want to see. The night vision is excellent and 24H video recording puts this camera over the top.
reviews.author: Aliaba

reviews.title: "Home security is what you'll get."
reviews.text: Most security is theater. High quality security cameras reduce crime and deter thieves. they see the cameras, they keep moving. The nest camera can be invaluable for securing your property. installation is simple, and the video quality is high fidelity. Knowing you can always see your home, even from another continent, provides peace of mind.
reviews.author: Parrotshelm

reviews.title: "Caught Newspaper Thief"
reviews.text: We bought our nest camera after someone started stealing our newspapers. I installed the camera on our porch, got a screen grab of the culprit and uploaded it to our NextDoor message board. He was identified by a neighbor and shamed into behaving himself.I also love seeing footage of the critters that walk across our porch during the night.
reviews.author: Eddierod001

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: This is a breeze to set up and control from your phone and other devices.Drawbacks to me are the power conversion hub. Let's just build it into or make it closer to the plug. Offer in black as well as white so it is less visible against darker siding.But I would and already have bought more because I'm hooked on how the overall system works
reviews.author: Matt M (OH)

reviews.title: "Wow"
reviews.text: Since we've been using Nest smoke detectors for years and liked them ever since, we decided to get the Nest system with the outdoor cams. Straight out of the box, it was easy to add to the nest app, and get it mounted properly. My wife instantly noticed how well these cams picked things up day or night. This is hands down the best we've seen
reviews.author: Warm and toasty

reviews.title: "Nest"
reviews.text: This camera is the best and  easiest camera there is on the market to install and operate. It is also the best camera on the market for Picture and voice clarity. I have tried many cameras in the Nest set up is so easy that you can have a fully protected House up and running within 15 minutes from the time you receive  and unbox your camera.
reviews.author: Marc315

reviews.title: "Overview"
reviews.text: I started my Nest experience with a Thermostat. The I bought a bunch of the smoke detectors and then cameras. I really like the ease of setup of all the Nest products. The Outdoor cameras are very easy to setup. The only concern you need to consider is how you will power the units. If you have a little know how you can complete the install.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Great camera!"
reviews.text: After much research on outdoor security cameras, I decided to purchase the Nest outdoor camera. It was a good decision. The camera and install and phone app are all top of the line. I have owned several outdoor cameras and this one is by far the best and most reliable. While the Nest Aware service is an investment it is well worth the cost.
reviews.author: Greg AG

reviews.title: "Awesome Camera"
reviews.text: I purchased one for my backyard. I've been using a Swann wireless system, which works fine, but setting up for viewing on your phone took some time. The Nest Outdoor Cam was quick and easy and took a total of about 20 minutes to setup and install. The wide angle covers my entire backyard. I purchased a second one for my front yard as well.
reviews.author: RenT

reviews.title: "Nest Cam"
reviews.text: I was looking for an outdoor camera I could access from my phone. My home is somewhat hidden and never know who is at the door. I already had the Nest thermostats and they exceeded my expectations.  They also look really cool. So Nest made sense. The camera was extremely easy to install, as well as the app.  Very happy with  the product.
reviews.author: Kostandino

reviews.title: "Very good camera"
reviews.text: There camera itself is excellent, the problem is the price without cloud storage and Home/Away assist is not dependable. I did not deduct a star due to the storage issue because I knew about it when I bought it due to the camera quality. I did deduct a star for the Home/Away Assist since that is a core feature of the entire Nest ecosystem.
reviews.author: Vassago0

reviews.title: "Easy set and and go"
reviews.text: This camera is easy to set up and use. I had my grandson help but we did it in a short amount of time. The app is convenient, picture quality great! Love the zoom in feature. I was surprised at the audio sound as well, its very clear.  The only thing I recommend is getting hardware to secure it once its mounted, it would be easy to remove.
reviews.author: Grandmother

reviews.title: "Great camera and very reliable!"
reviews.text: We love our nest camera. It blends in so well you wouldn't even know it was there. Image is way better then expected and zooming in I can read license plats and see faces clearly. Paired with Nest alert I always know whats going on outside my home! Our wifi and internet is not great but with a wifi booster this camera hasn't missed a beat!
reviews.author: Sharlene

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor at home"
reviews.text: I have 3 of these setup at my house.  I find the zone setup and alerting to be very convenient to know when someone comes onto the property.  We have wildlife that we track with the cameras and get alot of enjoyment out of seeing the Fox with kits, skunks, deer etc.  Overall the product is very good for the price, and quite easy to setup.
reviews.author: Dan H

reviews.title: "Tom B."
reviews.text: You will not be disappointed with the clarity; it is excellent!The outdoor camera was so good that I bought the NEST HELLO DOORBELL.With these two items, I have a completely clear view of my walkway, sidewalk, driveway, front yard, street, and the corner stop sign.AND, I can carry on a conversation with anyone at or near my front door.
reviews.author: Tom B

reviews.title: "easy to use"
reviews.text: I have trouble with technology, but no problem with my camera.  My son in law set it up for me and I have been able to use it.  No problems, can view at home or away from home.  The picture is good and I like the notifications.  I plan on moving it to the driveway for protection and get real time save feature, but for now I am enjoying it
reviews.author: Cheril

reviews.title: "Peace of mind."
reviews.text: Thanks Nest we have 2 dogs that we can now watch in the fenced back yard and inside our home this gives us peace of mind when we leave for work.  We also feel more secure knowing we will see anyone that may come by.  The camera was easy to set up and the app on my phone gives me alerts when anything moves past the camera.  We love ❤️ it.
reviews.author: TrueOkie

reviews.title: "Excellent product."
reviews.text: I have owned and used the nest outdoor camera for about a year and a half. It has been on the entire time except for brief periods when the power is off. Video was excellent, the app gives a lot of flexibility and how you want to set it up, get notified of motion etc  I find the cloud service to be useful and worth the $10 a month also.
reviews.author: HowardB

reviews.title: "Best Camers at Price Point"
reviews.text: I did a lot a research in my search for a home security camera system and I am %1000 satisfied with my choice in these cameras. 1080p looks Great through a glass lens. I have indoor outlets near my windows so did not need to make any major installation. Everything from start to finish was a breeze. Pricing is excellent for the 2 pack!!
reviews.author: no_3

reviews.title: "My Back Yard"
reviews.text: I have a grage I built a couple of years ago in my back yard and it has had the side door kicked in. It is located about 100 feet behind my hours. I can see it clearly and with my neighbor using it, with my permission, the camera response to activity at that range all the time. I am very happy.It took me 15 to 30 minutes to set it up.
reviews.author: BackyardBandits

reviews.title: "My Nest Cams"
reviews.text: I love my Nest Cams and the Nest App.  I have one camera in front of my house and one camera in the back of my house.  My wife and I both have the Nest app on our iphones.  Make sure you have enough internet upload speed for the the cameras to work best. The cameras pick up every sound, but trying to talk/listen with someone is a pain.
reviews.author: Gilby

reviews.title: "Amazing product"
reviews.text: This product is amazing!  We went the ‘cheaper' route by getting a Night Owl wireless service.  Worst cameras and WORST customer service.  Stop wasting your time and get the Nest security cameras.  They are easy to install, the app always works, the quality is out of this world and the customer service is truly great!  Get the Nest!!
reviews.author: PI Youngs

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: Excellent camera but the cabling management system is horrible.  It would be nice to have an option to have a shorter cable.  Also, it would be nice to have an option for colored cords, as white stands out so much.  Overall, the software is excellent and very dependable but as with any technology there is always room for improvement.
reviews.author: Iceman

reviews.title: "Nest is Best"
reviews.text: Exceptional design and build quality with outstanding picture clarity and responsiveness.  Intuitive mobile app and desktop tools.  Recognizes familiar faces and identities sounds - "think I heard a dog bark"Whether you use the Nest Cam for security, awareness and care for a loved one or pet... the Nest Cam is simply the very best.
reviews.author: AL D.

reviews.title: "Best camera ever"
reviews.text: The set up and installation is super easy. The quality of the camera while using the nest app is awesome. Definitely better then sercurity systems that require a separate monitor and a bunch of wires. Night vision and sound is cool also. You can talk through the camera as well. You can view your camera on your phone anytime anywhere
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: It took me 2 years of research to decide which security cameras to buy. After a friend recommend the Nest Cameras. I'm so glad I did after all. These camera are very easy to install and set up. i was just a matter of minutes. I highly recommend the Nest camera for someone to wants a very reliable ,easy to install security camera.
reviews.author: Night Watch

reviews.title: "Perfect"
reviews.text: Kicked around purchasing one since early fall to replace a current security system camera. Finally purchased one on Black Friday and I wish I would have bought more. Easy to use, easy to install, and easy to navigate through the app. Great sound, amazing video, and great customization through the app. I will be purchasing more soon.
reviews.author: Eric F in TX

reviews.title: "Best camera on the market"
reviews.text: Let me start off by saying this camera does cost a lot of money. But you can not beat the quality of nest. I highly recommend this camera for anybody that would like to monitor their home and/or their pets. I love to check in on my puppy and make sure he is doing all right, and it's nice to be able to talk to him through the camera.
reviews.author: Jeff Palmquist

reviews.text: We love Nest Cam we have the indoor and outdoor cameras. We have them at our parents house and when we travel on the road! We feel safe and we also have them when we are on job sites!! We love them!! Wouldn't live without them!!!  We feel like we can monitor them anywhere!! Theives are everywhere I promise you!!! Thanks nest cam!!!!
reviews.author: Taylor43

reviews.title: "Exceeded Expectations"
reviews.text: Replaced an Insteon camera with the Nest Outdoor.  Night and day difference.  Quality of picture, field of view, zoom quality, monitoring service, microphone - Looking to buy another one of these.  Not sure how I lived so long without the nest cam.  I missed the bear walking across my driveway last year.  I'm waiting for you bruno!
reviews.author: Jersey Nester

reviews.title: "Better than expected"
reviews.text: The Nest outdoor cam is great. It plugs into a power outlet and sets up with ease. All of the hardware needed for mounting is included.  Ours is paired with a nest thermostat and nest doorbell. It is great to be able to do everything in one app. The video quality on the camera is better than expected. Highly recommend this product.
reviews.author: Julie H

reviews.title: "Great outdoor cam"
reviews.text: This nest camera is the best. It was very easy to set up to my Wi-Fi system and install. It looks good. The definition of the picture and how you can zoom and move it are perfect. It's a great investment for your home security. Plus you can see video clips and either save them locally or send them to people which is an added plus.
reviews.author: Kathy F

reviews.title: "Digital Wireless Security Camera"
reviews.text: I've only had it for about a week but it's working great!
reviews.author: Marv

reviews.title: "Great product!"
reviews.text: I've owned four (4) Nest Outdoor cameras for two (2) years now.  Setup was great.  Easy to follow directions.  Having a preview of the setup before purchasing, I had an idea what it would be like.  It did not disappoint.  Setup was spot on.  Everything went well.  Cameras have functioned great for these two (2) years.  Thank you!
reviews.author: The Setup Guy

reviews.title: "Outdoor camera"
reviews.text: I recommend this product the only thing to remember when purchasing this is to make sure you have a mesh system for outdoor use.  That way you will not be disappointed when setting it up for the first time And not having a good connection.  I also have the nest thermostat and the nest doorbell I recommend these products as well.
reviews.author: Jonn S

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: Just installed the first nest and it was easy to do so. Directions a pretty thorough except the part to remove the paper from the mounting bracket. Should describe it as paper/rubber.Thought the rubber was a gasket but the paper wouldn't separate.Installation was quick and set up even quicker. Looking forward to seeing up more.
reviews.author: Captain Jim

reviews.title: "Our nest makes our cul-du-sac feel safe"
reviews.text: We were having problems with theft and vandalism in our neighborhood, the police told us there's not much they could do unless we catch someone breaking the law...and recommended we secure our home.We installed a nest camera array where is was easily seen and have not had any problems since.Our home feels safe again.Thank you.
reviews.author: Jeff and Beth Powell

reviews.title: "Outdoor video anywhere on my phone"
reviews.text: When I'm away from my office I worry about security because I've had burglary in the past which is why I bought the nest outdoor camera. It provides excellent video quality that I can watch anytime whether I'm at the shop or away and it also records and alerts me when there's movement plus I can hear as well as see in real time.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Easy set-up"
reviews.text: The quality of the video from this outdoor camera is amazing.  It covers a lot of area as well. The set-up was about as easy as it gets. Viewing the camera via the app is also really simple. Great product.  We had originally planned to have an alarm company install cameras and pay for monitoring, but this saved us so much money.
reviews.author: Luis M

reviews.title: "Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: I bought this when there were a rash of home burglaries happening in my area. I obviously cannot protect myself with a camera alone, but the notifications made me feel more safe as they would help me be better prepared. I have caught quite a few mischievous and criminal activities with my camera, so it was well worth the money.
reviews.author: Nester_EyeInTheSky

reviews.title: "Easy to use and great quality."
reviews.text: I have several Nest products now and I am very happy with all of them. The outdoor camera's are very easy to install, great instructions and packaging. The app works flawlessly and I love getting notifications on my phone. The quality of video stream is excellent and Nest Aware makes the product even better. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Michael C.

reviews.title: "Ourdoor Camera"
reviews.text: We have been very pleased with our outdoor camera, it has been great to see who comes and goes from our home.  We watch our driveway and will be adding a second camera to watch the other side of our home.  We have been impressed with the reliability of the device and the quality of image (closer image is better than distance).
reviews.author: SaintPaulDwellers

reviews.title: "On Alert"
reviews.text: I bought both a Nest Indoor and Outdoor camera to augment my existing security system.  I have found the Nest Camera App functionality and availability better than my other system.  The camera picture, sound, and video history is also so much better.  I wish Nest was around five+ years ago when I installed my security system.
reviews.author: Bryan

reviews.title: "Perfect for monitoring your home"
reviews.text: The outdoor cams have great night vision and video clarity during the day. The entire Nest ecosystem is excellent to cover your entire home's needs. I have the Nest Doorbell, Thermostat, smoke/CO2 alarm, along with the indoor and outdoor cams. Everything is easily monitored and controlled via the Nest app. Luv Nest products.
reviews.author: AL D.

reviews.text: Impressive packaging for starters. Easy to set up on computer and easy to mount on house. The magnetic mount makes aiming a breeze. Picture quality and the nest website is very nice. You will need a good wi-fi signal, so you can't mount the camera just any where. So far I'm very pleased with this camera and the nest website.
reviews.author: Dave14

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: Love this camera and company.The products and software this company provides are both great.The only issue is the monthly/yearly cost of nest aware.  If you buy more than a couple products from nest the fees add up quickly.Other than that this camera and all other products this company makes is highly recommended...... :)
reviews.author: Ciaran R

reviews.title: "Super easy to install and use"
reviews.text: Just added Nest Cam Outdoor to our Nest indoor camera system and smoke detectors. These were super easy to physically install and add to the app. Just like the other Nest products, they work great, and the super strong magnets made the easy to install. They have already made it through very strong wind storms. Very pleased!
reviews.author: Rowland55

reviews.title: "Best outdoor cam"
reviews.text: Works well but often slows video when object or motion comes into camera range. Not sure it is router related since indoor nestcam does not have that issue. I have an router extender to provider better range for router so not sure why this occurs. Overall good can and otherwise reliable. Would highly recommend subscription
reviews.author: Gjm1

reviews.title: "Easy installation and set up!"
reviews.text: I am not what you would call a handy person, when it comes to DIY home improvements.  The nest outdoor camera was my 3rd product from nest. I have installed the doorbell, the smoke/co2 detector and now the outdoor camera. Each was very easy! The directions were easy to follow and the app helps walk you through the process.
reviews.author: C Mark

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: I am very pleased with this camera and the quality of the picture.  The camera was simple to mount and get up and running with the app.  I am able to pull up my app and see/hear everything around the area which I have mounted the Outdoor Cam. It's comforting to know I can keep an eye out while my kids are home and I'm not.
reviews.author: Jong

reviews.title: "Best camera in the market at reasonable price!"
reviews.text: Have been using "Nest" products for over 4-5yrs and love how easy they communicate with each other. I just added the outside camera to my long list of "NEST" product and I can't be any happier with the easiness of installation and connectivity!Can't wait to add the "Nest" security alarm to the family of "Nest" equipment!
reviews.author: OBEYtheONE

reviews.title: "Great camera!"
reviews.text: We purchased this camera to keep an eye on a second home. It's great!  We've had contractors stop by for different projects and each time Nest has provided a person notification. It's pretty awesome. We have also been able to see some wildlife at night which is an added bonus!  I love the streaming ability of this camera.
reviews.author: Jenn H

reviews.text: Nest outdoor allows us to monitor our home from home or away. It is simple to use and has been helpful more than once with issues relating to our property. Highly recommend Nest if you are looking for a home security system that you can maneuver yourself. It sends alerts based on your preferences. It's worth every dollar.
reviews.author: C.A. Johnson

reviews.title: "Great Tool!"
reviews.text: The alerts are particularly useful.  It's great that it will tell you if movement is a person or just shrubs blowing for instance.  The sound notification is excellent also.  It has performed through bad weather without a hitch.  I would like it to have farther range, but we will likely purchase another for that purpose.
reviews.author: withheld

reviews.title: "Nest Cam outdoor"
reviews.text: I purchased my first nest cam with the purchase of my new home. Due to the ease of use and how simple set up and install was we have since upgraded to the Nest Doorbell and Nest thermostat. System works amazingly well and have very few complaints. The only complaint is that I wish it was ckmpatiable with Apple HomeKit.
reviews.author: Cain

reviews.title: "Great replacement for security system"
reviews.text: I got 2 of the out door camaras to keep an eye in my home wile im awey.Love how fast the camara sensors alert you and the video quality is amazing i strongly recommend Nest prodocts.I got nest cuz of the price difference on a security system in comparison with nest prodocts i will be saveing more money in the long run.
reviews.author: Stu437

reviews.text: I love this Camera the wide angle lens .I love the way you can setup your zone .You hear the birds chirping and singing it's Almost  therapeutic all I am saying it was a great investment. Just like everything doyour research and when all that is done you will find that this camera will be one in your final  selection
reviews.author: Scotty

reviews.title: "Great Nest Look and Quality"
reviews.text: This is the forth Nest product. Installation took me some time finding the best spot. Connection was quick and easy. Subscribed to Nest Aware right after the one month trial period - cost is very reasonable. Now driveway, front/back door  are under Nest surveillance 24 hours/day.  Looking forward to my next Nest product.
reviews.author: Julie S.

reviews.title: "Easy to Use and Install"
reviews.text: I have multiple Nest Cam outdoor cameras.  They perform very well.  The install was easy except you must extend AC power.  I ran my power through the attic and back fed the camera power cables through the soffit to plug into power outlets I installed.  The connection to WiFi and the Nest system was very simple and easy.
reviews.author: RJS474

reviews.title: "Feeling very secure."
reviews.text: We have a home security system but have wanted to increase security with resent break kind and robberies in our quiet neighborhood. Our son's girlfriend recently installed the Nest Cam Outdoor and caught attempted intruders while she was home! I feel much better knowing i can see our house 24/7 from anywhere. Thank you.
reviews.author: Susan M

reviews.title: "Beach house outdoor camera"
reviews.text: The camera's work great and have good night vision. I've set up two to watch the entrance doors on my beach house. They pick up any movement (people, animals) and notify me. I have seen people looking in doors, using our water hose, animals walking around, etc. I am very happy with the quality and ease of installation.
reviews.author: AGuess

reviews.title: "Sharp Looking Cameria"
reviews.text: I have had more fun with camera.  I know who is at my front door and in my driveway.  I give me the feeling of being safe and unwanted characters will stay away.  If some salesman come you can talk to him without opening the door and tell him your not interested.  No arguments.  I liked it so much I bought another one.
reviews.author: Vickie

reviews.title: "Best outdoor camera"
reviews.text: After trying a few outdoor WiFi cams and getting frustrated more and more with each purchase, I finally bit the bullet and bought 2 Nest cams. Best decision ever. Everything was included, screws wires and instruction. Had both cams up and runnin* in less than 30 minutes. No issues, no problems. These guys have it down.
reviews.author: M4bus

reviews.title: "Look no further..."
reviews.text: This is a great camera at a good price. In comparison to Ring cameras, the video quality is excellent, and the latency is low. The app is very easy to use and it's very nice being able to get an overview of all of your cameras, door locks, and thermostats around the house on one screen. I highly recommend this camera.
reviews.author: Derek R.

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: One of the easiest set ups of an electronic device I have ever performed. Incredible picture quality, both day and night. Nest Aware is great for documenting anything strange that may be happening around your home. The fact that you can access it from any connected device makes this an extremely user friendly product.
reviews.author: QMIX1073

reviews.title: "Great way to protect your home!"
reviews.text: I've had some experience with traffic management video systems but never thought about how handy a home video security system could be. Nest has managed to convince me that with a small investment of money and time anyone can have a sophisticated home security system that they can monitor anywhere they go.Bravo Nest!
reviews.author: Big2208

reviews.title: "EST is best"
reviews.text: I have a total of 5 Nest products (4 outdoor cameras and smoke detector) and they are all top quality products.  I have tried cheaper brands of cameras but they have all fallen way short of the performance I get from these cameras.  You pay a bit more for Nest products but you get a so much better product performance.
reviews.author: Retired John

reviews.title: "Police Office"
reviews.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor security camera offers sharp an outstanding 1080p video, terrific night vision, and motion detection alerts. Also has a stylish weatherproof enclosure. Absolutely love the Nest Cam and would highly recommend it to other friends and family. I plan on purchasing another one for the back of my home.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Finally peace of mind."
reviews.text: Everyone knows anything worth having is worth protecting and sometimes you're not home to do so.The Nest allows you the flexibility of monitoring your property and your loved ones at anytime from anywhere.With customizable options I feel like I'm never unconnected from my home and it all adds up to peace of mind.
reviews.author: Cisco

reviews.text: Easy to install without experience as long as you have an outlet accessible. Not super happy that you have to get the subscription to have facial recognition but this camera still works great. Overall really happy I purchased. Keep in mind it has to be in range of WiFi ,something to consider with an outdoor camera.
reviews.author: Matt Roxb

reviews.title: "Great little piece of tech."
reviews.text: I bought a 2 pack of these cameras and I am very pleased with the quality of these little cameras. The field of view is great, and I was able to install them on my own very easily.  The alerts come quickly when something comes into their field of view. This is a great addition to help with the security of my home.
reviews.author: Jeff S.

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: It is great the way they package their products. Every thing is neat and orderly and super easy to follow instructions. Personally I feel like the better the packaging more than likely the better the product. If they care enough to specially package the screws and clips, they care enough to make a quality product.
reviews.author: Hm1234

reviews.title: "Don't look any further, your search and here"
reviews.text: Don't look any further, your search and here. Compared to other camera systems out there, nest with Nest aware allows you to continuously monitor your footage 24/7 instead of saving clips up on motion detection. It's hard to put a price on peace of mind, and this gives me a peace of mind to know my family is safe.
reviews.author: AdamF

reviews.title: "Great camera"
