reviews.text: The camera setup is simple. You can put them up any where on any surface. Just need a strong WiFi signal. I got them to protect the house in the neighborhood we live in with minor break ins to protect the family. The nest aware let's me know when the camera spots someone/movement. Highly recommend for your family.
reviews.author: Dave Bell

reviews.title: "Excellent product"
reviews.text: If you want to know that your home is secure while away, this is perfect!  You also know whenever anyone is in your yard or coming towards your door so you don't need to open the door to strangers.  This information is available while at home or away on trips!  I own three cameras and they make me feel very safe!
reviews.author: Rowland55

reviews.title: "Home security"
reviews.text: My husband and I bought 4 outdoor cameras. We have nasty neighbors and we are selling our house to relocate the cameras we're everything we needed there is a camera on every angle of the house and I'll be able to monitor from the new state we are moving to thank you Nest Cam you just made this move so much easier
reviews.author: Joannie Musselman

reviews.title: "Top Notch Quality"
reviews.text: The camera was easy to install and setup for use with the Nest app. The video quality is excellent both in daylight and at night and the alerts and ability to set up activity zones make the camera easily set up for your personal needs. I highly recommend this camera to anyone looking for an outdoor camera system!
reviews.author: BMiller

reviews.title: "Great device"
reviews.text: The house we moved into has a Nest Outdoor camera installed for the entryway.  It only took me moments to get it figured out and activated. The mobile app and monitoring subscription are intuitive and reasonably priced. I think I will add additional cameras and smoke/carbon monoxide detectors in the near future.
reviews.author: Lee from Canton, Ohio

reviews.title: "Our home 2500 miles away"
reviews.text: Love the nest products. Just purchased  another outdoor camera and two nest thermostats. that I can control from 2500 miles away, especially if visiting here in Montana in the winter..We had a false fire alarm a couple of years ago  and I swore I would not be that vulnerable again without a picture in the home.
reviews.author: Bobcat

reviews.title: "Easy to set up , Great picture"
reviews.text: The outdoor camera was easy to set up , it only took me a few minutes . The picture quality is great in daylight and at night . The app notifies my phone as soon as something is detected and I can instantly see who is at the front door . I'm very happy with the product and plan on installing more on my house.
reviews.author: Enjoeneer

reviews.title: "Outdoor camera"
reviews.text: The Nest outdoor camera is it easy to use easy to set up has a very clear picture the app is also easy to use and takes you directly to the time or when there is activity after your first month you have to pay recording services the mount is magnetic and allows you to easily get the shot that you are looking for
reviews.author: Derek WV

reviews.text: The quality of the camera picture day and night are excellent, probably the only complaint I have is having to drill a half inch diameter hole to run the power cable, it would be nice if Nest would come out with a camera that runs on either batteries or rechargeable batteries that does not require running cable.
reviews.author: The Angry Jockey

reviews.title: "Best on the market"
reviews.text: Other cameras may claim to have better specs, but Nest cams are the best on the market cause they are clear, crisp, smooth, and most importantly, their software is by far unrivaled. The easiest and smoothest way to quickly view your cameras, they have the littlest delay of any other, and it's easy to save clips.
reviews.author: David Sharette

reviews.title: "Need a Solar powered version"
reviews.text: I own a number of Nest products for use inside my home but needed a way to monitor my driveway and front access. I purchased the Nest Cam Outdoor because of it's excellent video and easy setup. Finding a way to power the Nest Cam Outdoor can be a challenge. I would like to see a version that was solar powered.
reviews.author: JohnH

reviews.title: "Nest Cam IQ"
reviews.text: I just added Outdoor IQ camera to cover the entry area and it's surroundings. I could not be happier with the results - picture quality, recognize familiar faces and not send an alert. I have total of 6 cameras - 5 of them are non-IQ. I wish Nest can come up with an incentive for replacement to the IQ version.
reviews.author: Julie S.

reviews.title: "Great product!"
reviews.text: I have spent months trying to decide what brand and product to buy for home security. I had been leaning towards Arlo Pro 2 because they have an option for battery only, however, they don't supply electrical wiring for all cameras and overall, cost more. I am so glad I went with Nest. It is a superior product.
reviews.author: Hatz1

reviews.title: "Great Picture!"
reviews.text: I first saw the Nest Cam Outdoor at a friends house. The picture was incredible and the sound was really good. When our apartment complex was having issues with unwanted visitors I immediately thought of getting one. Actually, I got 2 so we could get more than one angle. It's been great and easily accessible.
reviews.author: Odub

reviews.title: "Nice Camera"
reviews.text: This camera is really good.  I use it for home security monitoring my backyard.  I would've given it 5 stars but there is no true two way communication.  You can speak to someone through the camera but in order to hear a response from them you must first unclick the mic & then reclick the mic to respond back.
reviews.author: Will.

reviews.title: "Super quality"
reviews.text: Nest cameras are easy to setup and have excellent quality and control on the features with nest aware. I have 4 exterior cameras (2 IQ) and waiting for the nest door bell. Continuous recording feature with nest and their cameras capability to motion detect at far distances influenced most my buying decision.
reviews.author: Qureshi

reviews.title: "Peace of Mind is all good"
reviews.text: We mounted the outdoor Nest Cam up in a corner of our front porch (ceiling outlet), and it spots who goes in and out, or tries to, and when.  We can zoom in and even have a 2 way conversation.  After experience with 2 indoor Nest Cams, we especially value the ability to keep a record of what the camera sees!
reviews.author: Maria

reviews.title: "Security and more"
reviews.text: This is great for keeping my house secure, checking on the dog and seeing the comings and going's of my house especially when we're out of town. I have nest security indoor cameras, outdoor cameras all doors are secure, plus the nest thermostat as well as the front doorbell, and I'm pleased with all of them
reviews.author: Go Blue

reviews.title: "Nest Digital Camera's w/ Night Vision"
reviews.text: These camera's have been outstanding.  I like the wide angle view as well as Night Vision function.  The sensitivity seems to be good and picks up vehicles when they pull into the drive.  Before you purchase, you do need to ensure your WiFi is capable of reaching area's outside the house before you install.
reviews.author: KLowery

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: I use two of these to watch the outside of my house and so far it has been great. The alerts have been great but the one thing i believe needs improvement is the notification of pets vs people. I get far too many alerts for my large dogs moving around in the back yard rather than it being an actual person.
reviews.author: FreeLance

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: In addition to the elegant design of the product, the design of the mounting hardware is very well thought out. The only problem I have with it is the lack of ability to adjust the viewing range. I get some false alarms as I live in a town home and it picks up my neighbor coming in and out of their home.
reviews.author: MCMCM

reviews.title: "Excellent picture and easy install"
reviews.text: The picture quality is excellent and the ability to bring up the feed via phone, smart device, and computer brings added value. The Nest aware is an add-on that brings real value, I chose 5 day cloud at a reasonable price. The installation is easy and if you have outside receptacles it is a great purchase.
reviews.author: Your Neighbor

reviews.title: "Great image for the money"
reviews.text: This is a great device that is well worth the money. The only issue is its not set up for an easy installation if you intend to plug in indoors. Image is great though I do wish I spent the extra on the newer IQ model (they addressed the installation issues on this model and it has an even better picture).
reviews.author: David v

reviews.title: "Reliable and convenient camera"
reviews.text: I love the nest outdoor camera, it's got a very large lens radius making it easy to see everything, it's very easy to set up and the app is very simple and user friendly. No complaints here, except I hope the price comes down just a bit, dont get me wrong it's worth it but it's just still a bit to afford.
reviews.author: Rachel b.

reviews.title: "Car broken into"
reviews.text: My car was broken into on April 13th. From that day I decided that I needed a cam to monitor what is going on in my driveway and alleyway. The out door nest cam has been amazing so far. I have been able to monitor who comes and goes along with my yard works to make sure they are doing their job. Love it!
reviews.author: Michael Pond

reviews.title: "Reliability is Everything"
reviews.text: With all tech gear we wonder how long will it work for us before it begins to give us headaches.  I'm happy to say the Nest outdoor cam is extremely reliable.  Installation is a pinch and the app keeps you notified of any activity.  The Nest does all the work for you in keeping you protected.  I love it.
reviews.author: Eric RM

reviews.title: "Nest products are simple to use and troublefree"
reviews.text: Easy installation (DIY basic level)Stupid simple to set upConnectivity is amazing (Ring products on the other hand...watchout)App is simple and easy to useCost is $50/year (which i'm not fine with but what the heck)Love this product and would highly recommend for your home/office/townhome/condo etc.
reviews.author: Asher

reviews.title: "Very clear"
reviews.text: I got my first for Christmas a year ago.  After setting it up to monitor the driveway I got another for the front yard.  And just got another for the back yard.  We can see when packages arrive and monitor the dogs in the back yard.  Great clarity and large field of view.  So simple to set up and mount.
reviews.author: George002

reviews.title: "Nest Suprising"
reviews.text: Very please with Next- have been reviewing home security production. Spoke with professionals in home large appliances and those in security and knew what i was looking for . Came down to ring or Nest -- chose Nest for quality of product and picrture on the cameras both the doorbell and outside cameras.
reviews.author: Rudi

reviews.title: "Criminal"
reviews.text: I had it installed in my subway Restaurant and one criminal Who came to subway after exiting Attacked my neighbor , and I could Provide clear video  clips to police Of the offender for investigation.ThAt was a nasty attack. I could Get some footage. I wish I had moreCameras to record all around.
reviews.author: Harry  desi

reviews.title: "Awesome!!!"
reviews.text: This product is every bit of amazing as it can be and that's not even enough to explain this camera. The video quality, ease of use, the app, and look of this product is great. I installed it and set it up. It only took a few minutes and BOOM!!! Watch out now, because I'm watching you. Thank you Nest!!!
reviews.author: Xavier T.

reviews.text: This nest camera is the best ever. The video quality and the distance is really great. My car has been being vandalized and the nest camera caught them. It was my neighbor this whole time. Thanks nest I will be purchasing a few more cameras and other products. Also have told everyone how great they are
reviews.author: Ghost

reviews.text: Great Product.  Easy to install.  I had this up and running in under an hour and that is with routing the power wire through a wall so I could plug it in inside.  The video quality is not only excellent but covers a wide area, and picks up motion a long way off.  I would highly recommend this product.
reviews.author: Rob305

reviews.title: "Great product one drawback"
reviews.text: Nest product intergration with Google Home and Amazon Alexa is wonderful. We have all of Nest products in our home. Only drawback I see with the product line is for them to work a subscription to Nest Aware is required.This adds an additional expense on top of an already fairly expensive product line.
reviews.author: nbr1hawgfan

reviews.title: "Excellent option if looking for an outdoor camera"
reviews.text: Nest outdoor is a great product for people who are looking for an outdoor camera that is easy to setup.  The price is somewhat high but you will be getting a quality product.  The only reason I gave 4 stars is because there is room to improve night vision.  Generally speaking, this is a great product.
reviews.author: Neyda

reviews.title: "Another awesome product from Nest."
reviews.text: I recently added the camera to the other Nest products I own (Thermostat E & Protect) and as usual, set up was a breeze. I can't say enough about how well everything works together. The fully featured Nest App makes it simple to monitor activity from anywhere. Well worth the peace of mind it provides.
reviews.author: JB55

reviews.title: "Easy Installation and Set Up"
reviews.text: I was surprised how easy the Nest cameras were to install and set up through the app. I was able to go from box to finish in less than an hour. The picture quality is fantastic. I'm still trying out the available options to maximize the performance but so far the Nest cameras have met my expectations.
reviews.author: RPShoe

reviews.title: "house monitor"
reviews.text: worthwhile as a layer of security, on top of what ever measures you have, as we installed it inside by the front door, so we can see the pets and folks when we are not home, really worthwhile, but scary when you hear a voice and it's not like a phone that rings, when my wife uses it to call me on it.
reviews.author: patch17

reviews.title: "Great Camera!"
reviews.text: Great upgrade over my previous security cameras.  Video quality and two-way audio are amazing.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because of how they designed the cable into camera and the over design of the cable itself.  The IQ Outdoor Camera's solve all of this and are close to perfect.
reviews.author: Chris M.

reviews.title: "My first Nest Camera Outdoor"
reviews.text: After reading many reviews from my neighborhoods, I decided to give a chance myself. I ordered my first nest camera and it was really easy to install and to downloaded the app. Since the first time, everything worked really awesome. I am so happy with my decision and I highly recommend Nest Camera!!!
reviews.author: Apleekiss

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: We had a competitors camera for about a year before purchasing Nest. Our old camera (GaurdIlla) kept losing the WiFi connection and it was VERY difficult to get it connected again. The picture, interface, connectivity and ease of installation makes us wish we would have bought Nest a long time ago.
reviews.author: The Angry Jockey

reviews.title: "Terrific camera for the price"
reviews.text: I have purchased two outdoor Nest cameras and couldn't be happier.  The video quality is above average, the night vision works well and they are extremely reliable.  Setting up zones adds another level of custom alerts as well.  They are definitely worth the money and I feel more secure having them.
reviews.author: Eddierod001

reviews.title: "Good Product, Hidden Cost"
reviews.text: I installed it as my security needs increased. Setup was easy, interface was intuitive, and skipping on a NAS made it cheaper. I would warn new buyers of the added cost of Nest Aware, the product you start with includes a trial to the far superior 'Premium' account. When it runs out you'll miss it.
reviews.author: Satisfied Dude

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: We purchased 3 Outdoor and 3 indoor Nest Cameras. Very Pleased by the performance and quality of videos and alerts. The app is great and the notifications helpful, but numerous. Looking forward to future enhancements of software that can tell the difference between people and our 2 dogs and 2 cats.
reviews.author: Kmaltais

reviews.title: "Great upgrade to my system"
reviews.text: I upgraded to the Nest system because of recommendation and expirernce of a family member. The fact they record constantly and the ease of installation was important. I have had these for a few weeks now and I am still learning about all the features. But so far I am very pleased with the decision.
reviews.author: Vwstu

reviews.title: "Great Camera for Home Use"
reviews.text: I recently purchased two Nest Outdoor cams and one Indoor cam and I am very pleased with the build quality, image quality, and the app interface. Very easy to set up and use, and the HomeAway feature is very nice. Hardwired to AC power is the way to go, never have to worry about changing batteries.
reviews.author: B-MAN

reviews.title: "NEST"
reviews.text: look you have looked around you see the reviews and you know what this product is about its about safety its about your family and piece of mind. Ive used different cameras this one is the one ive settled on its not perfect but then again which product is?. Sure is pricey but honestly its worth it.
reviews.author: cadillo

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor"
reviews.text: My son purchased two cameras and after setting them up and showing me how it worked I was impressed. A few weeks later my home property was vandalized. I am so happy with the outdoor nest as a deterrent and Visio capturing and recording all events for a small fee. You can't go wrong with NEST!!!!!
reviews.author: N4CER7168

reviews.title: "Amazing Camera"
reviews.text: This outdoor security camera is simple to set up. Comes with all the necessary hardware to install it and it is all high quality stuff. I have multiple nest outdoor cameras and have no problems with any of them. Installation is a breeze with the included hardware as well as set up in the nest app.
reviews.author: Colin g

reviews.text: These camera are great.  I have 2 outside and 3 inside.  My father is bed bound so we use the cameras to make sure he is ok.  I almost stepped on a snake in his room and used the camera to see how the snake got in.  The cameras are very reliable and are of very high quality.  I use them everyday.
reviews.author: Bzach

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: Excellent video quality, streams video and audio best I have seen. Very happy with the reliability and dependable system. I am using three cameras and will add a fourth. Very easy install and setup. This system is showing me things I have not seen with my old systems, very happy with this system.
reviews.author: Cadcom

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: I love my new Nest Outdoor camera!!! I installed two cameras at my home to deter some very intrusive, nosy neighbors from coming onto my property and it worked like a charm.  The cameras were easy to set up and install and I was quite pleased with the video quality of the cameras.  Good Job Nest!
reviews.author: Nicole Marie

reviews.title: "Amazing tool for securing your home"
reviews.text: I have 4 of these wonderful camera set up around my home, and two on my in-laws home.  This allows my family the ability to be safe and watch over our aging parents.  The possibility of these devices in our age of tech is nothing short of amazing. I highly recommend there cameras for any home.
reviews.author: stephen h

reviews.title: "Very good for Rio de Janeiro, Brazil"
reviews.text: I live on a city with a lot of violence although my neighborhood is quite peaceful. Nevertheless, my daughter who lives in Mn, US is always worried about my safety. So, she gave me this camera and I bought another one to cover my backyard and front door. My daughter and I are feeling better now
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Love my Nest Cam outdoor"
reviews.text: I simply love this camera. I love how easy it is to set up and move from one area to another when needed. Actually own three and if I need a specific area to be watched, I simply move my camera. Love that it's magnetic too!  Can't go wrong with Nest products and customer service is exceptional.
reviews.author: CIndy C

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: Another quality Nest product.  Simple installation and user friendly interface within the Nest App.  The interface of the app with the other Nest products I have installed provide peace of mind remotely from anywhere.  The ability to allow other family members access to the app is key as well.
reviews.author: HaciendaRanch

reviews.text: Purchased for a second home I wanted to protect and view from out of town. This product is perfect. Easy to install and excellent quality. I tied this into our google wifi and works wonderfully. Also have the nest thermostat and now installing the Nest dead bolt for the door. Can't be happier.
reviews.author: LCBrevard

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor"
reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to the ease of use of this product.  I compare it to the same quality and ease of use as Apple products.  Installation was a breeze.  Luckily I had outdoor outlets in the area for the cameras. The 24/7 continuous recording is what differentiates this product as well.
reviews.author: Dmgk

reviews.title: "Nice Camera!"
reviews.text: I'd recommend this camera and may even purchase another.  It was very easy to set up.  The picture quality was better than expected for both day and night.  I have an internet connection with average speeds up to 300mbps download/30mbps upload, and the motion alerts come in within 3-5 seconds.
reviews.author: WZRDbeard6

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: My Nest Cam Outdoor has given me much peace of mind. I can keep an eye on my animals while I am away or at work. The night vision is amazing! I recommend Nest Aware in order to save recordings. I was able to present a very clear film to the police after some vandalism occurred on my property.
reviews.author: Trace

reviews.title: "Satisfied NEST customer"
reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying the Nest Cam outdoor, but I bought it and liked it so much that I bought a second one. The video quality, the sound, and appearance of the Nest Cam outdoor is absolutely wonderful! I would recommend Nest to everyone who needs security around their home or business.
reviews.author: Kentucky Resident

reviews.title: "Love my Nest Cam!"
reviews.text: We are so please that we decided to finally get our Nest Cam. We have not been disappointed! The quality is perfect and the sense of security it brings is wonderful!  I would highly recommend Nest Cam for anyone who is looking for an inexpensive and fast, easy way to bring that security home!
reviews.author: Bren and family

reviews.title: "Nice addition"
reviews.text: We recently added two Nest Outdoor cameras to our family of Nest products. It been a great way to keep an eye on the let's when in the yard as well as on packages when they are left on our porch. They were easy to install, look great, and work well with our existing Nest and Google products.
reviews.author: Autumn

reviews.title: "My cam outdoor"
reviews.text: My cam can perform with clarity and assurance that can provide me the protection and security we need in this day and age of changes in our society.  I highly recommend nest products including the Nest thermostat.  It saves us money and we can monitor our settings from anywhere in the U . S.
reviews.author: Circle A Ranch

reviews.title: "Well Done, Nest!"
reviews.text: Fabulous fit and finish, well thought out design, simple and straightforward installation, and easy to use app and interface. Too, the Support organization was extremely prompt and expedient in sending a replacement to a part I misplaced. An outstanding product *and* organization behind it.
reviews.author: DonB

reviews.title: "Great outdoor camera"
reviews.text: Super easy to set up, great alerts on my phone every time there is motion. Works very good day and night, only concern, you need to have excellent Wi-Fi in the area where it will be set up to use the maximum video settings to enable you to read license plates of cars that use your driveway.
reviews.author: Dmgk

reviews.title: "Easy to install and hook up."
reviews.text: Between unboxing and seeing the picture on the app took about 1-1.5 hours. Almost all of that time was getting my ladder and tools out. Hookup is very simple and connecting with he app worked great. It is a pay service if you want it to record, but you can get a constant live feed for free.
reviews.author: Dynomike75

reviews.title: "Best out there!"
reviews.text: We have most all the Nest products including nest cams, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, and the thermostats. Nest creates great products. We have 3 outdoor cams and we really like the notifications we receive on our phones based on our alert set-up. We plan to purchase other Nest products.
reviews.author: Tom K

reviews.title: "Awesome Security Camera"
reviews.text: If you're looking for a camera that is super easy to use and set up, look no farther! Decide where you want it, make sure you have a good wifi signal, plug it in and you're pretty much done. Image quality is awesome as well as audio... I'm impressed with mine and will be adding another soon
reviews.author: Florida Firefighter

reviews.title: "Nest does it again, great outdoor cam."
reviews.text: I have been growing my security surveillance system and the outdoor cam is a great addition.  I have installed seven Nest products to date.  The ease of set up and integration with the Nest App are easy and painless.  Set up takes only minutes and Nest products just work, plain and simple.
reviews.author: K McG

reviews.title: "Easy to install and effective!"
reviews.text: This is my 4th nest outdoor camera and probably not my last.  I love how easy they are to connect to and install.  You get a high quality, clear picture with sound.  Upon review of the footage I can select clips to email myself and save for future reference.  Highly recommend this product!
reviews.author: Nikki

reviews.title: "Excellent product"
reviews.text: The Nest outdoor camera has performed beyond my expectations. Great product and easy to use and install. I have 4 Nest products 2 Co/smoke detectors, 1 thermostat, and now the outdoor camera. They all work excellent and great together. Nest is definitely my favorite home company by far.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Nice addition"
reviews.text: We recently added two Nest Outdoor cameras to our family of Nest products. It been a great way to keep an eye on the let's when in the yard as well as on packages when they are left on our porch. They were easy to install, look great, and work well with our existing Nest and Google products.
reviews.author: Autumn

reviews.title: "My cam outdoor"
reviews.text: My cam can perform with clarity and assurance that can provide me the protection and security we need in this day and age of changes in our society.  I highly recommend nest products including the Nest thermostat.  It saves us money and we can monitor our settings from anywhere in the U . S.
reviews.author: Circle A Ranch

reviews.title: "Well Done, Nest!"
reviews.text: Fabulous fit and finish, well thought out design, simple and straightforward installation, and easy to use app and interface. Too, the Support organization was extremely prompt and expedient in sending a replacement to a part I misplaced. An outstanding product *and* organization behind it.

reviews.text: Super easy to set up, great alerts on my phone every time there is motion. Works very good day and night, only concern, you need to have excellent Wi-Fi in the area where it will be set up to use the maximum video settings to enable you to read license plates of cars that use your driveway.

reviews.text: Between unboxing and seeing the picture on the app took about 1-1.5 hours. Almost all of that time was getting my ladder and tools out. Hookup is very simple and connecting with he app worked great. It is a pay service if you want it to record, but you can get a constant live feed for free.

reviews.title: "Best out there!"
reviews.text: We have most all the Nest products including nest cams, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, and the thermostats. Nest creates great products. We have 3 outdoor cams and we really like the notifications we receive on our phones based on our alert set-up. We plan to purchase other Nest products.

reviews.text: If you're looking for a camera that is super easy to use and set up, look no farther! Decide where you want it, make sure you have a good wifi signal, plug it in and you're pretty much done. Image quality is awesome as well as audio... I'm impressed with mine and will be adding another soon
reviews.author: Florida Firefighter

reviews.title: "Nest does it again, great outdoor cam."
reviews.text: I have been growing my security surveillance system and the outdoor cam is a great addition.  I have installed seven Nest products to date.  The ease of set up and integration with the Nest App are easy and painless.  Set up takes only minutes and Nest products just work, plain and simple.
reviews.author: K McG

reviews.title: "Easy to install and effective!"
reviews.text: This is my 4th nest outdoor camera and probably not my last.  I love how easy they are to connect to and install.  You get a high quality, clear picture with sound.  Upon review of the footage I can select clips to email myself and save for future reference.  Highly recommend this product!
reviews.author: Nikki

reviews.title: "Excellent product"
reviews.text: The Nest outdoor camera has performed beyond my expectations. Great product and easy to use and install. I have 4 Nest products 2 Co/smoke detectors, 1 thermostat, and now the outdoor camera. They all work excellent and great together. Nest is definitely my favorite home company by far.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Mr"
reviews.text: Easy setup but streams constantly so if your internet is slow or you have limits this might not work for you. Pictures pretty good and the alerts of “motion detected” are great but with our internet there is a lag time. We live in the middle of nowhere so our internet isn't the greatest.
reviews.author: Mr. Lou

reviews.title: "Nest oitdoor camera"
reviews.text: Great camera for the money, very easy installation due to the magnetic mointing brackets. Great picture, easy to use app, easy install. I'm going to definitely purchase more to add to my system. We have the nest thermostat in our home as well which was super easy to install. Thanks Nest.
reviews.author: Hank D

reviews.title: "Awesome products"
reviews.text: I purchased these cameras for my residence. It was an outstanding investment, i have a peace of mind about all things going on and around my home. The installation was easy and the daily use is awesome. I have referred 3 friends and all of them have also had nothing but positive results.
reviews.author: Derrick R

reviews.title: "Too easy"
reviews.text: Most user friendly piece of technology I've ever put hands on.  From the impressive packaging to the camera itself, it's obvious that nest put a lot of thought into this to make sure the consumer's experience was pain free and delightful.  Wonderful product, you will not be disappointed.
reviews.author: NestyNate

reviews.title: "Can't live without Neat"
reviews.text: I have  Nest IQ and Two Nest Outdoor Cams and they are the best most dependable simple maintainenece free things I have ever had the highest quality out performs all others in everything it does I'm so happy with them feel safer than ever and secure I cannot imagine living with out them.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Incredible"
reviews.text: It recorded so good that u will be spechlees, in fact the audio recorder its so clear and wide open that u hear everything.... the only thing that i would say to fix its that it send wrong notifications instead of animal its shows u person wish is wrong. But overall the Cam is amazing.
reviews.author: El Maestro

reviews.title: "Complete Package"
reviews.text: Beside an easy connection to the app; the package is complete.  The best part about the package - I did not have to go to the hardware store!  Everything I needed was included.  Also, the cords are extra long so I did not need any extension.  A nice looking camera with a great picture!
reviews.author: SteelerBill

reviews.text: All of the Nest products are rock solid as hardware and software. I have several cameras, tow thermostats and 3 smoke detector/CO2 monitors. They all perform flawlessly and can hang onto a weak wifi signal very well. There is not other camera that can do this and I have tried them all!
reviews.author: Nesleink

reviews.title: "LOVE"
reviews.text: I absolutely love these cameras! The ease of installation and navigation on the app. I can monitor my entire house inside and out when I am away and say "Hi!" To the dogs mid day while I'm at work. These are great cameras for so many applications!!! Great stuff, keep up the good work!!
reviews.author: Kristine

reviews.title: "Best camera system I've purchased"
reviews.text: The Nest security camera with night vision is perfect. The video quality is better than I imagined. These cameras have an amazing field of view, crisp video feedback, and the night vision is an excellent feature. Would recommend to anyone who is looking for a reliable security camera.
reviews.author: Erik

reviews.title: "Much better than I expected"
reviews.text: The optical quality is amazing, for both day and night vision.  The camera alerts consistently, although there is about a 4 second delay between the event and the alert.  We had to upgrade our wifi to support the camera, but with help from Nest Tech Support everything is working well.
reviews.author: Karen L

reviews.title: "Does exactly what I need"
reviews.text: Bought this camera to monitor a garage that is not on my home property. Camera worked perfect. Setup was fast and easy. Only thing I haven't got an answer to yet is what happens when I don't buy the Nest Aware subscription. Not sure how far back the camera will save video without it.
reviews.author: Hm1234

reviews.title: "Great camera!"
reviews.text: I have had my outdoor cam for a few years now and it is holding up great. The video quality is good and looking back on cam footage is quick and painless with the nest app. Set-up is fairly straightforward as well. If you're on the fence about purchasing one, just go ahead and do it!
reviews.author: D Long

reviews.title: "Great Outdoor camera"
reviews.text: Best cam I have owned so far.  Excellent picture, wide field of view, amazing night vision, easy to set up and use. I would not hesitate to purchase any of the nest products even if there are cheaper products out there.  You get what you pay for and it is well worth getting the best.
reviews.author: Steve F

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor cams watching my back"
reviews.text: I bought a nest iq 4k and a pair of outdoor cams.   After a couple of weeks here are my impressions. All work great. Iq has much better outbound audio.  Iq auto zoom works well for my use.  Nice products.   Pricey but quality made.  Great use of magnets make it easy to aim precisely.
reviews.author: Mr. Technology

reviews.title: "Nest Products"
reviews.text: I have several Nest products including two Nest Cam Outdoor Cameras.   They are exceptionalproducts with great clarity.  Hooking up to electric and elimination of batteries is great in most cases but can be a problem running  current and hiding the wires.  Overall a great product.
reviews.author: C.A. Johnson

reviews.text: i have 5 Nest outdoor cameras, they are easy to set up and are easy to view with the Nest App. i also have a Nest thermostat, I highly recommend these products, they have made my new home more energy effecient and safe. i also use the cameras for monitoring my construction projects.
reviews.author: Steve Lincolnshire

reviews.text: This is our first outdoor cam and we are thrilled with the product and the ease of installation.  If you are interested in keeping track of what is going on at home while you're away, there is no reason for not getting at least one of these cameras today!  You won't be disappointed.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Best camera"
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend the nest outdoor camera. The video quality is amazing day and night! Definitely worth the price. The fact that your able to speak through the built in speaker and also go back to videos to see if you missed anything is amazing. You won't be disappointed!
reviews.author: PhilTheNerve

reviews.title: "Great video quality and field of view"
reviews.text: Despite doing the research beforehand, was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the video and field of view for this camera.  Took a few weeks to zone "out" areas we did not need an alert for but the camera captures "EVERYTHING."  Very easy to install.  All around a great product.
reviews.author: Don from Navarre, FL

reviews.title: "My Home Nest"
reviews.text: I'm really excited on having my Nest outdoor cameras and Nest door bell, feel really safe and protected. Can really see what's going on whether I'm home or at work can monitor it from my iPhone. Wouldn't change it for anything or other company. Thank you so much, keeps family safe.
reviews.author: Patriots

reviews.title: "Great Outdoor Cam with Simple Setup"
reviews.text: - Easy to use and set up. The Outdoor Cam looks great and functions even better. If you don't need 4K resolution, this is a good choice. If you want even sharper video and don't mind paying for it, I would recommend buying a 2 pack of Nest IQ Outdoor Cams to get the bundle price.
reviews.author: Gma15174-1

reviews.title: "The Best Camera Ever!!!"
reviews.text: I recently purchased the Nest Cam Outdoor and I put it in my living room for a wider view. I think it's by far the best purchase ever. The alerts come in really quickly, the app loads in no time at all. When I purchase my house I will use all Nest products to keep my house secure.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Great Product!"
reviews.text: I bought this product and installed it my self in under a half hour. Very easy installation. I also have it set up to my google assistant. It is great to check on my house at any time anywhere. I highly recommend this product for anyone looking to get more security in their house.
reviews.author: Kayoh

reviews.title: "Great outdoor camera"
reviews.text: Upgraded from a different connected camera. Nest us so much better overall. App is great, loads fast, better video quality...I can see my life camera feed within seconds. Old camera system took a lot longer to show and on multiple occasions never loaded. Needed better reliability.
reviews.author: Mr. Technology

reviews.title: "Highly recommend"
reviews.text: Upgraded from another brand security camera. The Nest Camera far exceeded our expectations. The picture is crystal clear, sound quality is precise. Love the ability to be able to zoom in to see small details if/when needed. Installation was a breeze. Highly recommend the Nest!!
reviews.author: #lovemynest

reviews.title: "Great!"
reviews.text: Second Nest product and couldn't be happier. The quality of the product and service are top notch. Wish the cord had an a length option, where it could be longer or shorter, but a minor, minor thing in the long run. So appreciate the security it provides to my home wherever I am.
reviews.author: Katx89

reviews.title: "Cam"
reviews.text: Love love my nest cam!I have caught my little dog running away.. my packages being literally dropped or thrown off trucks! My teenagers coming & going! Has really made my life a little simpler.. being my built in detective!! Thank you Nest!! Can't do it all!!A hard working Mom!
reviews.author: Holly strong

reviews.title: "Great!"
reviews.text: Easy to install. Works great as expected. Looks great as well. Wish it had a backup battery in case power goes out but not a huge deal. I prefer the 10 star scale over the 5 star. I'd give it an 8.5/10 because it's excelent for what I need and for what I expected but not perfect.
reviews.author: PhilTheNerve

reviews.title: "My Nest Cam Experience"
reviews.text: The effectiveness of this product is fabulous, and I would encourage its use to anyone, its ease of use, ease of setup, and ease of mind are self explanatory. I have owned it and have no regrets whatever, the pricing coupled with its effectiveness as a product are second to none.
reviews.author: Tom63

reviews.title: "Nest could very well be named "Best""
reviews.text: We have had NestCams for years now and they are the best!  We tired a different brand that was no good.  Nest Cams can be set up very easily.  They are easy to monitor.   (These things are not so easy with other camera systems that we have tried, and know that other people use.)
reviews.author: MandDinCO

reviews.title: "How did we ever get by without it?"
reviews.text: Stolen packages/deliveries prompted me install the outdoor camera. A number of neighbors have done the same in our Neighborhood Watch program to help cut back on crime. The camera is affordable, easy to install and the real time access to interactive home security is unbeatable.
reviews.author: techzsue

reviews.title: "Never Disappointed With Nest Products"
reviews.text: We purchased our Nest Home Alarm System and Nest Outdoor Camera last December.  We received 2-free Google Mini's with the purchase, and LOVED all of these items.  The price, quality, modernness, sleek design, and performance cannot be matched with any other item, in my opinion.
reviews.author: RN - Maine

reviews.title: "Eliminates any doubts"
reviews.text: Prior to owning my Nest outdoor cam, I would wonder if that package was delivered, what time did my daughter come home, did it rain and I should turn off the sprinkler system. With this camera installed, I feel like I am in the know and can control what is happening at my home.
reviews.author: Duke BD

reviews.title: "Nest lets you feel secure when you're away"
reviews.text: Since receiving the Nest cam as a birthday gift, I feel so much safer when away from home. Although I live in a generally safe neighborhood, it is also remote and off the road.Nest lets me know when anyone is there, whether they belong there or not. A real comforting feeling.
reviews.author: John on the Lake

reviews.text: I set up this Nest Cameras Outdoor in my home and it was the easiest product to install. Great quality videos, can monitor my home whenever out of town. Notifications on Activities Zone excellent!  Great product, will recommend it to anyone! Planning to buy more for my Rental.
reviews.author: Darkone1029

reviews.title: "Property Manager"
reviews.text: I love the clarity of this camera and the fact that even if the subject is not in sight you can still hear them. I thought this product was completely wireless so looking for something for areas that do not have a power access. Other than that I am very happy with the purchase
reviews.author: Southington

reviews.title: "Nest cam outdoors"
reviews.text: This camera really is superb.  The wide angle lens shows incredible amounts of area with clarity.  The software supporting program is easy to use and see events noticed by the camera.  Installation was a breeze even for someone in their late 60s.  Only positive review from me
reviews.author: Dr J

reviews.title: "its almost perfect"
reviews.text: Purchased two to compliment my existing system from a national firm.  These are better in many ways all of are listed in the ads for the product.  The only improvement I would like to see is the delay reduced from the time someone is detected until I can see them on my phone.
reviews.author: Fred 48

reviews.title: "A great outdoor video camera."
reviews.text: Hits all points. Great style, ease and flexible install. Excellent performance, comprehensive feature set geared to make it a better video camera for fun, security and social application. Easy to install with great support documents. Not the cheapest but well worth the price.
reviews.author: Steve Jean

reviews.title: "Great Product Easy to Install"
reviews.text: Purchased a two pack since I had two areas that I wanted to monitor. One side of our home has no windows and has always been a safety concern. The other allows me to see the back of our home. The video quality is excellent as is the audio. The installation was quick and easy.
reviews.author: Bob P.

reviews.title: "Great Camera For The Value"
reviews.text: The camera is easy to set up and works as advertised. Day time picture quality is outstanding. Night vision is just ok. It never fails to alert when anything is moving. It is easy to monitor on pc, tablet and smart phone. I also subscribed to the two week monitoring service.
reviews.author: LakeGaston

reviews.title: "All nest equipment"
reviews.text: I was introduced to nest by my employer. We are a nest certified company in Charlotte.  I started with the thermostat and C.O. dectection.  And Now have 4 cameras on top of that . The site is easy navigate and the equipment is easy to install and use . We love our Nest home.
reviews.author: Faw510

reviews.title: "Excellent"
reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in terms of ease of installation and use. My one complaint is the ability to zoom in on a face or car 15-20 feet away is very blurry otherwise great product. The Nest aware is awesome! Love how you can scroll through the day to specific events.
reviews.author: ZisforZ

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor camera"
reviews.text: I received this as a gift and honestly wasn't expecting much but now that I have it, I couldn't imagine living without it! I absolutely love it! It is incredibly easy to set up and the app is user friendly and simple to navigate. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
reviews.author: Burnsie

reviews.title: "Love my Nest Cams"
reviews.text: I've had my indoor Nest Cam for a couple years and I've been very happy with everything about, so I decided to try Nest Cam outside. So far it's been just as good as my indoor Nest Cam. I'm installing my 2nd outdoor Nest Cam this week and considering buying a third outdoor.
reviews.author: Raskie

reviews.title: "This camera is useful!"
reviews.text: The camera is easy to setup and takes only about 10 mins to up. I like that we can see who is at the door and when packages arrive. The video playback feature is helpful, especially when you are expecting someone and you're far from the front door. This camera is worth it.
reviews.author: Rudi

reviews.title: "Works well, but needs to be near your router"
reviews.text: Good product overall.  The app for the IPad could be improved to show the recording history better.  Notifications work well.  Will need to purchase a WiFi repeater to stop the messages that the camera is offline for 2 seconds every few hours then comes back on right away.
reviews.author: JJD2

reviews.title: "Solid product"
reviews.text: This was an addition to my other in home Nest products. My only suggestion to Nest is to improve the quality of the night vision as it's a bit grainy. I've seen other cameras with better night vision quality but chose this one to complete my Nest ecosystem and ease of use.
reviews.author: CelesteK

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: Purchased two of the Nest Cam Outdoors two months ago to monitor our home while we were on vacation. The installation was fairly simple and the app is also easy to use. The added bonus of the cams is that we can also monitor the dog during the day since she lives outside.
reviews.author: Lynne from CA

reviews.title: "Exactly what I wanted and more"
reviews.text: This camera far exceeded my expectations. Have had some mischief going on near my house out in the country. People doing burnouts in my road in front of my house at late hours and have been keyed and egged. Now I can have a peice of mind to find out who is doing this!
reviews.author: Ciaran R

reviews.title: "Excellent product with only a few minor complaints"
reviews.text: Easy setup, excellent image/audio quality and very reliable. It uses a magnetic mount and they recommend using an outdoor plug, which makes is susceptible to theft. The magnetic mount doesn't articulate downwards making it difficult to place at a higher vantage point.
reviews.author: Jay T.

reviews.title: "A breeze"
reviews.text: We are enjoying the ease of watching while we are away from home. Setup was a breeze and now looking for additional items to add to the system. Overall we are very satified and will be upgrading our WiFi in the near future to enhance the performance  of the products.
reviews.author: Doug S.

reviews.title: "Great camera!"
reviews.text: This is an amazing camera!  Great picture and great features.  Super easy to install.  Super long cord.  Just on its own, it is able to capture my entire backyard.  Performs way better than any hardwire camera I have owned.  A bit pricy, but you get what you pay for!
reviews.author: B@rkRuff@lo

reviews.title: "Ease of installation"
reviews.text: Installation was pretty easy. Login and software was way easier than I anticipated.  Apps for device monitoring easy to install. Alerts come through reliably.  The most difficult part it aiming the cam to exactly the right direction.  A couple of tweaks fixes that.
reviews.author: AL D.

reviews.title: "Internal memory"
reviews.text: Camera is good overall. Almost nothing to dislikeI just wish the loudspeaker was louder and that there was a way of continuous recording even with a power or internet outage . At least for 30 mins. Alot can happen in a 10 minute time frame while there is an outage
reviews.author: Rob305

reviews.title: "Best Product"
reviews.text: Nest outside security camera was the best and easiest to set up. And easiest to view videos with notification on your iPhone. Even the five-year-old kid could set this up. I am very pleased to have a nest camera, thermostat, and smoke detector with a gas detector .
reviews.author: Jonn S

reviews.title: "It just works"
reviews.text: I was astonished at how easy it was to set up my two cameras. They connected to my wi-fi just moments after having them out of the box. Not many moments later they were installed and in use. I'm so glad I chose this product and glad for the peace of mind it brings.
reviews.author: kc-btf

reviews.title: "Rick M"
reviews.text: When I opened the box I was very impressed with the quality and appearance of the outdoor camera.  Installation and set up was very easy.  The video quality is very good and the motion detection feature is fantastic.  I am very pleased with the Nest Outdoor Camera.
reviews.author: Rowland55

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: I have 4 nest cameras that I put up to replace cheaper junkier cameras. The Nest was very easy to install look great and work even better. The picture quality is excellent, the audio works great and the app on my phone connects right to the cameras with no issues.
reviews.author: The Angry Jockey

reviews.title: "Peace of mind"
reviews.text: If only I had purchased these cameras earlier. It was a fast and easy installation.  Knowing I can make my family feel safer in our home is paramount.  I love that I know what is going on every minute, even when I am not home, and the picture quality is fantastic.
reviews.author: TrueOkie

reviews.title: "Great Camera's"
reviews.text: Love these camera.  So easy to install.  Visibility in each area is great. Love that I can hear & talk to my dogs. I am a 65 yr old woman & I installed them by myself with ease.  I really like that I was able to set up  one camera that goes off when I come home.
reviews.author: Nest Cameras

reviews.title: "Replaced old/outdated Uniden's - no regrets!"
reviews.text: LOVE these new camera's.  We have (still up) two Uniden non-HD cameras.  One of these has replaced BOTH old Uniden's.  The wide-angle viewing is excellent.  The clarity is awesome.  I run a Netgear NightHawk X10 Router and have had no issues with disconnects.  That being said, I invested in a second camera for my back yard.  Again, replacing a Uniden camera - just one though.  I was pleasantly surprised when I realized the viewing range covers my entire back yard and not just half, like with the old camera!Being able to have video store online, in the cloud, is a great option for security purposes.  Being able to create videos is another great feature.You won't be sorry for purchasing one, or two..... :-)We view ours from our smartphones, iPhone 8Plus and Samsung 8Plus, iPads, PC's and Alexa.   With Alexa, we can view the camera feeds on our 65" TV, with the Nest feature.  (pretty cool Amazon!)Thanks for finally making an ourdoor security camera that is finally affordable, has great pictures and easy to use/view!
reviews.author: RedRebelChick

reviews.title: "Outdoor Cameras"
reviews.text: The cameras are great! Definitely recommend. I just wish that when you set up a zone to monitor, it just monitors what's INSIDE that zone and that's it. I set mine up to just monitor my front yard and it notifyme of every dang car that drives by. Very annoying.
reviews.author: Para

reviews.title: "Mr"
reviews.text: I have been using Nest since 2016 and it has made monitoring away from home fantastic. The video is high quality and the sound is great too. It does take WiFi to run so make sure you get you a WiFi extender. I give Nest 5 stars they have made a reliable camera.
reviews.author: AKAK

reviews.title: "Great Camera!"
reviews.text: This camera is very user friendly and offers more options than competitors. I would recommend going with this brand over the others such as blink or ring. I prefer Nest over them hands down. I have had experience with the others and they don't compare to Nest.
reviews.author: RWhite

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: Cameras work great and set up was simple and quick.  Video quality is very good and monitoring via internet, browser or app,  works great.  My rating would be 5 star if the cord were configured so it didn't require a fairly large hole to run it into the house.
reviews.author: beachy

reviews.title: "Gail"
reviews.text: I have had my nest outdoor camera for about 2 weeks now and it was easy to install (I didn't do it) but I watched and it looked easy. I have been monitoring the back of my house and it shows everything. I'm so impressed with it. I would recommend it to anyone.
reviews.author: C.A. Johnson

reviews.title: "Piece of Mind!"
reviews.text: Great video quality. Easy to install. Intuitive, easy to use app. Great recording service NestAware (a must have).  Only had it a few months and its already helped the neighborhood (instrumental in an ongoing investigation). Definitely adding at least 1 more.
reviews.author: b1one

reviews.text: Camera was easy to install, enclosed instructions were not to detailed but the online instructions were enough to accomplish the installation with no problems. camera has a great image night and day with pan and zoom. I am planning on installing another soon.
reviews.author: LeviSue

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor cam"
reviews.text: This is our first experience with a nest product and so far, it is an excellent camera. The video quality is much better than expected. The installation and setup was very easy. The features are working perfectly and our home security is not an issue anymore.
reviews.author: Jen A.

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted something to keep an eye on my kids and watch people as they come and go.  Nest Cam Outdoor has helped me in many situations related to this.  Set up was easy and using with the app is a breeze.  I highly recommend this product.
reviews.author: Ryan E

reviews.title: "GREAT PRODUCT"
reviews.text: The fact that this works perfect with a smart home,  google assistant and alexa is a plus, easy to install and monitor, beats a paid subscription to companies that offer home monitoring for a ridiculous fee.  would recommend it to anyone in the market for it.
reviews.author: C.A. Johnson

reviews.title: "Better than before"
reviews.text: I had a couple of cameras I had installed not too long ago but the system itself was not as user friendly as I wanted. Upgraded to these and am loving the sense of security and ease at which I can tell what is going on when I'm not home. Easy to install too!
reviews.author: Phil

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: Extremely easy to install and activate. Love the magnetic mount, it makes infinite adjustments and makes them easy.  Installation was intuitive and done in just a few minutes. Video is crustal clear and the notifications let you know when something happens.
reviews.author: R.W.

reviews.title: "Great product for the price"
reviews.text: Product was easy to install and setup.Has been great being able to keep an eye on the business while I am away as well as when I am there. Just the peace of mind alone from having access to see what is happening around the office and warehouse is worth it.
reviews.author: BigNiet

reviews.title: "Help protect elderly parents"
reviews.text: We installed 3 outdoor cameras to monitor our elderly in-laws. In less than a month, we have needed to call a neighbor to help them get up after he fell outside after freezing drizzle. They live 70 miles away and refuse to move closer or to a nursing home.
reviews.author: Julie H

reviews.title: "Love Our Nest Cameras"
reviews.text: During the past two years we have purchased six Nest cameras (2 indoor and 4 outdoor).  We love the sense of security that they provide us when we are away from home.  They are easy to install and have many functions that allow us to control notifications.
reviews.author: Always Watching

reviews.title: "Great purchase"
reviews.text: I spent a lot of time going back and forth on what to buy.  Nest is the apple of of their industry.  Simple elegant and easy to use. I love that it records 24 hours a day. The app makes it very easy to stay connected  and know what's going on at your home.
reviews.author: A pena

reviews.title: "Very good value"
reviews.text: I purchased this as a more affordable option than the IQ. I have several nest cameras and bought this to monitor our backyard and door. So far I am just as pleased with this camera as my others. I love nest products and having everything in a single app.
reviews.author: Joseph M

reviews.title: "very nice camera, a little pricey but well worth i"
reviews.text: Purchased a Swann system and it was garbage. Returned it and bought 2 nest cameras and they are amazing. The night vision is ok but not great. The microphone is about the same. But as far as picture quality and movement sensoring its awesome. Will buy more
reviews.author: troy

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: Recently purchased the Nest Cam Outdoor as an added security feature for our home. Super easy install and set up. Excellent video quality and a user friendly app. This purchase inspired me to purchase a Nest Thermostat as well. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.author: Steve P

reviews.title: "Already want Another"
reviews.text: The best thing I can say about this product is that I wished I would have bought the 2 pack!  Hoping Nest will set up a discount for us that bought one and want to add  another...(hint hint) !Love this camera and I am primarily using it as a game camera!
reviews.author: Ken E

reviews.title: "Mr. R in Naperville"
reviews.text: We did some checking of reviews of other cameras before deciding on this purchase. The reviews were all very positive and now I know why. It really is easy to install and use. The picture quality is really good any time of the day. We highly recommend it.
reviews.author: Jonn S

reviews.title: "Mountain life from the city"
reviews.text: We purchased a mountain home which one day we plan to retire to, but for now the nest cam lets us enjoy the wildlife while we can't be there.  Love the Nest, look at it everyday, it's a nice feeling knowing all is well when you can't be there in person...
reviews.author: B King

reviews.title: "My third eye!"
reviews.text: I absolutely love the Nest outdoor cam, It's like having a security guard on duty 24-7....not sure how I got by for so long without it! You will not believe the things that happen when you are not watching, but you will believe them when you are watching!
reviews.author: CRB Michigan

reviews.title: "awesome cam"
reviews.text: I love the nest cam, I have it outdoors on my patio and I love everything about it. I can see all clearly, I can her sounds clearly, wind, rain, birds etc. I also like that the nest aware shows if it is sounds, motion or a person. I couldn't ask for more.
reviews.author: Pops45

reviews.title: "Love it, getting another one"
reviews.text: As with the indoor Nest cams (we have 9), setup was easy and picture quality is amazing. Haven't had any issues with weather. I would highly recommend it. The alerts are fantastic, wish we could afford subscriptions for all our cameras, we have for some.
reviews.author: Sophia

reviews.title: "You have found what you're looking for!"
reviews.text: Nest cams are a breeze to set up and use! I love my outdoor cam because it works in all types of weather 365 days a year. I leave my house everyday to go to work knowing it's safely protected by Nest. Don't look any further this product is truly amazing!
reviews.author: Rob305

reviews.title: "The switch"
reviews.text: Going from Ring to the Nest. Picture quality it much clearer. 24/7 monitoring versus 30 sec of footage of a event that happen. Seamless integration with other Nest products. Would recommend to try before purchasing a product that doesn't quit do the job.
reviews.author: Roland F.

reviews.title: "Always on cameras"
reviews.text: Ring is movement detecting and doesnt capture everything but Nest is always on.  I only dont like the fact that the wiring isnt adjustable and there is piece of the wiring that is thick, so you have to make a big hole in your house to feed it to power.
reviews.author: John

reviews.title: "Phenomenal Camera"
reviews.text: I love my Nest Outdoor Camera ! It lets me keep an eye on my house, packages being delivered & keep an eye on who comes and goes to my elderly neighbors house ! My only complaint is the 2 way speaker on the camera isnt nearly as loud as it "should" be !
reviews.author: Coty

reviews.title: "Simple and Easy"
reviews.text: The camera works great. Only took about 10 min to install and set up. I put one on my front porch and liked it so much I instaled an indoor one in my child's room. I dont think there is a better DIY camera on the market. I highly recommend this product.
reviews.author: RClater

reviews.title: "Nice Nest Camera"
reviews.text: After purchasing a nest thermostat and the success we have had, no other brand was going to work when needing an outdoor camera. It was easy to find, easy to order, easy to set-up, easy to use the app, and the picture and sound are better than expected.
reviews.author: L D A

reviews.title: "Nest cam"
reviews.text: I purchased a nest cam outdoor to cover my back porch.  My son has one and when he was visiting from PA. He showed me his operated through is cell phone.  The picture was very clear and he talked to his cat.  Installation was very easy and works great.
reviews.author: Pywhaler

reviews.title: "Love the Nest Outdoor Cameras!"
reviews.text: We purchased Nest outdoor cameras for home security. The video quality and range exceeded our expectations. We have over an acre in our backyard and can see it clearly through the camera. Very impressive and blends in with the white trim on our house.
reviews.author: Susan

reviews.title: "Used in baby's room"
reviews.text: I use it in the baby's room. It let's me know he's awake before he cries because it picks up on his movements and alerts me on my Apple watch. This is the same camera I used for his sister when she was just a baby too over two years ago. Game changer.
reviews.author: Cassidy Winter

reviews.title: "Excellent product for outdoor security!"
reviews.text: Would highly recommend all Nest products, including Nest Outdoor Cam to all my friends and family. Very easy to install and works great with the app anywhere you are. Exceptional video/audio as well as fit/finish quality! Great investment all around!
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Amazing camera!"
reviews.text: The camera is amazing.  The setup was simple.  The very well thought out app, has everything that we needed and more.  The live stream, only lags behind by about 1 second, which could be our internet upload speed.  Even the packaging is high quality.
reviews.author: Craig L

reviews.title: "We love them!"
reviews.text: We have a total of 7 Nest cam - Cameras. 2 outdoor and 5 indoor. I cannot tell you how happy we are with them. Subscription is affordable and these little buggers are reliable. Most brilliant product on the market to me. We will always be Nest fans.
reviews.author: LCBrevard

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: The camera is easy to install and set up. It does require a outlet for power. It will send push notifications to your phone when activated. You can turn those on or off. The Nest aware is very useful for extended clip to see if anything is going on.
reviews.author: Glstrak

reviews.title: "Excellent"
reviews.text: This is an amazing product with an even better optional service to go along with it. I was blown away at the quality of the camera and the software! I couldn't be happier with my purchase and i am looking forward to trying other nest products soon.
reviews.author: CTTraveler

reviews.title: "Out door camera"
reviews.text: The camera is excellent all around easy to install excellent instruction but what I don't like is the size of hole you have to drill to put it on the outside the size of at least a quarter so I installed it on the inside but it's a excellent camera
reviews.author: ROBERT B

reviews.text: Exceptional video quality in HD mode. Night vision quality is well above my expectations. Just make sure your chosen location has a solid WiFi signal before installing. Nest was good about including the small bits and pieces needed for installing.
reviews.author: TrueOkie

reviews.title: "I can see you..."
reviews.text: Thank you for creating such great cameras.  It has given us peace of mind being able to keep an eye on our home.  We have a special needs kitty, and it's nice to see that he's doing well, when we can't be there.  Again...Thank you very much!  :):)
reviews.author: Christine28

reviews.title: "Excellent outdoor camera!"
reviews.text: We love this camera. We purchased two. They are easy to set up and use. Love being able to keep an eye on our home even when we are out of town. Love the notifications from nest aware so I always know who is stopping by my home. Highly recommend.
reviews.author: CFordham

reviews.title: "Satisfaction"
reviews.text: I have nest thermostats, Nest smoke alarm, Nest indoor and indoor cameras,and purchase the Nest guard to be installed soon.I most likely will be getting rid of my present security co.  I will have my nest guard monitored from your monitoring co.
reviews.author: LornaW

reviews.title: "Excellent Product"
reviews.text: I bought the Nest Cam to monitor the activity in the front of my house. I was extremely impressed with the ease of installation. Between the app and the well designed hardware it's simple to install even for someone like me that isn't very handy.
reviews.author: Aliaba

reviews.text: It was very easy to setup ourselves. It has a excellent pictures to it and also detects if anything moves outside of my home. I feel so much better with these cameras up. It alerts you on your phone or your tablet if someone is around your home.
reviews.author: Eric F in TX

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor cameras"
reviews.text: I was very happy with my purchase of the outdoor Nest cameras. They were easy to install and to connect to my home wifi. The viewing range and the night vision are extraordinary and the notifications easy to set. I highly recommend this product
reviews.author: SS

reviews.title: "Picture Quality is Amazing!!"
reviews.text: This is a great camera, I would give it 5 starts if it had a battery backup which would last a minimum of 15-45 mins.  This way if someone tries to cut the power or unplug the camera it would still catch a short period of time after the event.
reviews.author: nhayden

reviews.title: "New Camera"
reviews.text: Just installed the new Nest outdoor camera. Picture quality is awesome. Software setup for the app was very easy. Installation average difficulty. Would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to keep an eye on the outside of their home.
reviews.author: Mr fixit

reviews.text: We love this system. We have two  homes. One is residential and the other is a beach house. We can see the coming and going at the beach house when we are not there and the Nest May have prevented a break in last summer when we were not there.
reviews.author: Rosey

reviews.title: "Great camera!"
reviews.text: I travel for work and want to make sure that my family and home are safe while I'm gone. The Nest outdoor cam is a great addition to our smart home setup. The quality of video is top notch. For sure a must have when it comes to home monitoring
reviews.author: Mr Jones

reviews.title: "Security, attractiveness and ease of use"
reviews.text: The nest cam outdoor cameras is attractive and easy to use for surveillance and monitoring.  The build quality is noticeably superior to other equivalent cameras. The home security integration with other nest and compatible devices is a plus.
reviews.author: Jen A.

reviews.title: "Loving my Nest"
reviews.text: I love my nest outdoor camera also my nest thermostat they both go rear with my Google home assistant.  I cant wait to add more nest products like the nest door bell and lock.  The set up was easy and the use of the apps are simple and great.
reviews.author: Ani C.

reviews.title: "Easy security"
reviews.text: We have two, one in the front yard and one in the backyard.  They are great because the are easy to install, easy to use and provide a clear picture.  24\7 recording is a very good feature, only downfall is the recurring cost for the service.
reviews.author: C.A. Johnson

reviews.title: "Easy to Install - Picture could be better"
reviews.text: This was one of the easiest installations of a technology product you'll find.  The adjustments are remarkably simple after installation.One of the features is the wide angle view but some of the edges of the pictures are a little concave.
reviews.author: sailinfool

reviews.title: "Not just for security anymore"
reviews.text: Living in a tiny town security isn't the biggest issues with us.  However when trash cans get upset, dogs manic from barking, it is good to go back on the history to find that instead of bullies with bats we had two grizzlies with appetites.
reviews.author: Kathy Blackfoot

reviews.title: "Quality product"
reviews.text: Easy to setup and use. Provides opportunity to watch your home when gone. Alerts are configurable and accurate. I do think it is expensive as I also have a Wainsview camera that is very similar but does not offer the ease to record activity.
reviews.author: Hockeygram

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor camera"
reviews.text: I've really enjoyed my new camera. I can see my family coming and going safely. The video quality is excellent. I also like to keep tack of items being delivered as well as contracted workers. I feel like I'm better protecting my family.
reviews.author: PapaBear

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor - Excellent Product"
reviews.text: Would highly recommend this Security Outdoor Camera for all homes. Also see this as a affordable and dependable for all people. Small, weather protective, great appearance and Excellent Customer Support. You will be happy with your decision.
reviews.author: Eddierod001

reviews.title: "Easy to use and great quality outdoor camera"
reviews.text: I love these cameras! They're easy to use, easy to setup, and provide high quality video and playback. This is our 5th Nest product in our home, and we're very happy to have all our security related products consolidated to one app/provider.
reviews.author: Drew D.

reviews.title: "Nest cam works great"
reviews.text: We installed the nest cam because of community car break-ins. This was very easy to install and works great. Will surely recommend this product.
reviews.author: dja82810

reviews.title: "We Did It!"
reviews.text: Easy to set up for us novice folks to setup. Camera details are amazingly great both day and night. So glad we decided to get this brand and hope it last a long time. Very pleased with the camera and the subscription is very affordable too.
reviews.author: Jdoswoman

reviews.title: "Outdoor protection"
reviews.text: I am very happy with the ease of installation and extremely pleased with the quality of the video. The pricing on the product is a great value. The accuracy is super...to the point I am alerted every time a  squirrel comes down my sidewalk.
reviews.author: UffDa by Golly

reviews.title: "New"
reviews.text: Just bought last week. A little pricey for app based camera. Was surprised to learn about having to sign up for subscription to be able to see video history. Was very easy to set up and connect to NEST app. Overall happy with camera so far.
reviews.author: Shrs

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: Bought 2 outdoor cameras for my house . Easy to set up and install. I can see who's coming and going from anywhere I am and I can talk to people who show up on my porch. I feel safer being able to keep an eye on my house when I'm not home.
reviews.author: Katherine

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Cam"
reviews.text: Sleek design.  Easy to Mount.  Video and Audio Quality is good but a little delayed.  Notifies you when it senses activity and keeps a brief history with snapshots of you do not obtain the Nest Aware service.  Good value add for security!
reviews.author: Justin Case

reviews.title: "Amazing"
reviews.text: Cameras work great!Pros: 24/7 recording, access to history anytime if you subscribe to Nest Aware. Cons: need a standard outlet to plug it in to. Best application is where right on the other side of the wall is an outlet. Like a garage.
reviews.author: Eric F in TX

reviews.title: "Maggie H."
reviews.text: Great camera!  Easy to set up, clear pictures and notifications are accurate.  And for the monthly extended fee...better than a security system and I can do my own monitoring and call the police if necessary...no false alarms or tickets!
reviews.author: Maggie H.

reviews.title: "Best outdoor security"
reviews.text: I recently purchased a Nest camera to back up my Ring and it is amazing! Great picture quality and the Nest let's you know whether it's a person or just motion when viewing. I am definitely going to buy another one for my backyard now.
reviews.author: Shelly

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor*****"
reviews.text: Pros: Excellent video quality, good sound quality, good night vision, easy to set-up, weatherproof , highly recommended.Cons: Need to have outside outlets to your home or business for power. The price is a little high for the product.
reviews.author: Warm and toasty

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: We purchased this product to monitor our front yard and driveway. Once we determined the placement of the camera, it took less than two hours to install. It has a great picture and also distinguishes between people and other movements.
reviews.author: Eric F in TX

reviews.title: "Paid for itself in the first week"
reviews.text: Installed the NEST Outdoor and within the first week we caught someone breaking into the cars in our neighborhood. Two days later he came back again and this time the police were waiting. Footage was used as evidence. Love this camera!
reviews.author: DRdon123

reviews.title: "Solid Product"
reviews.text: Always on with real time alerts. Solid picture quality, day or night. Cons: The plug has a dongle that unnecessarily increases the size of the hole you may need to drill through your wall. There's no way to hardwire it out of the box.
reviews.author: DerekZ

reviews.title: "Sleek, Reliable and Easy"
reviews.text: I own about (12) nest cameras, several of this model. They all work really great, in 3 years, I have had only one fail and Nest swapped it out no problem. The ONLY drawback to this product is that it does not work with Apple Home Kit.
reviews.author: Jimmy38

reviews.title: "South Texas Coastline cam"
reviews.text: Great camera! Wish it had older style power and BNC connectors so you could change out older cameras with this great new technology! Nest aware is awesome but i would pay more for unlimited alerts instead of just one every 30 minutes.
reviews.author: Hm1234

reviews.title: "Easy and effective"
reviews.text: Very easy to setup, I was surprised on how fast me and my wife install 2 of these camaras in my House. I'm not a great DYI person, yet with the app and support page I was able to successfully set it up. If I can do it, you can do it!
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Exceeded my expectations."
reviews.text: This was my very first camera set up in my home. Debated and researched for a quite a while. Have owned for years now and am still very happy with this product. Feel comfortable relying on Nest to help keep my home and family secure.
reviews.author: mRydman92

reviews.text: Nest cameras are very easy to set up and use. You don't have to buy the subscription for it unless you want to save the videos. You can view it real time and it saves 5 hrs worth of time. Very good cameras with clear crisp viewing.
reviews.author: Lilxplrer

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: So far so good! This camera has worked great for its intended purpose and is good at telling a person from other motions. Time will tell on the weather proof side and hope to give a review on that as We can get some trenchal rains.
reviews.author: Ciaran R

reviews.title: "Remote wildlife viewing"
reviews.text: We installed the outdoor nest to capture wildlife activity at our lake home. We have been delighted with the view we have, the ability to create clips and listening to some of the animals. The camera was also super easy to install.
reviews.author: Eric F in TX

reviews.title: "Super easy to set up"
reviews.text: This camera along with the security system from Nest was incredibly easy to set up and the app is easy to use. I need a program that really respects the fact I'm an IT dummy and walks me through set up. This was everything I needed
reviews.author: Easy

reviews.title: "It's a great product!"
