reviews.text: The setup was remarkably simple and the audio and video quality is great. It paid for itself the day after it was installed when it alerted me to a potential thief who was moving something in our yard toward his truck. Neatly done!
reviews.author: AL D.

reviews.text: Very sleek in design that just looks good. Easy to install with everything you need to do a clean install. Quality of picture, video and sound are very impressive and when tied to the app 24/7 surveillance no matter where you are.
reviews.author: RJS474

reviews.title: "Much better than I expected"
reviews.text: My husband and I are very technologically backward and were amazed at how easy this camera was to set up. The video quality on my phone is very clear, I did not expect this quality of video.  I would highly recommend this product.
reviews.author: Great Grammy

reviews.title: "Excellent"
reviews.text: It took less than an hour to install the NEST camera, and I am technologically challenged. The instructions gave step by step directions for installation that were easy to follow. Video quality is good and the App is easy to use.
reviews.author: R E L

reviews.title: "These systems are well thought out!!"
reviews.text: I am not the most tech savey person. But the nest produces I have installed “outside/inside cameras and thermostat” is so simple it's scary. And they work as expected. The quality's seem top notch and I would recommend to anyone.
reviews.author: Songdog

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Cameras"
reviews.text: Excellent cameras.  Resolution is good, easy to install and provide good surveillance.  I went back and forth between these and Arlo but finally decided I didn't want to hassle with taking the Arlo cameras down to recharge them.
reviews.author: mac

reviews.title: "Delighted"
reviews.text: Extremely happy to have purchased this camera. I realize the purchase price maybe a bit much but it is well worth it. I have their  thermostat and I'm saving for other nest products. There is no doubt they have quality products.
reviews.author: Happy customer

reviews.title: "Great camera"
reviews.text: The picture on this camera is great and I love getting an alert and a photo when it detects someone.  Hearing what's happening outside is an added bonus.  I actually even use it to speak to my husband when he's up in the garage.
reviews.author: Mmcdowell

reviews.title: "Nest Cam"
reviews.text: We just love the Nest Cam Outdoor! Installed it a few days ago (with ease) and have been very pleased with the quality of the images. The app is fantastic....easy to use and very functional. Will recommend to friends and family!
reviews.author: AndyT

reviews.title: "Control , Piece of Mind  & Savings"
reviews.text: excellent pictures night & day,notifications both email & text, easy setup & access to make changes. I'm out of town for a few days and can see what I need to see. Paired well with other products. I Will add more Nest products.
reviews.author: Hedley

reviews.title: "Great product, easy to use"
reviews.text: This nest camera is one of the best. Easy to install and connected even easier to my Nest App. Already survived a flash flood and thunderstorm last night. Only complaint I have is having to purchase ANOTHER annual subscription.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor camera"
reviews.text: Excellent item, simple to set up and connect to your system My con is the camera must be mounted with the power cord at the bottom of the unit.  Camera should have ability to rotate cord and still have a  level viewing field.
reviews.author: Phenomenon101

reviews.title: "Easy setup"
reviews.text: This was the easiest camera to set up. The app is great and walks you througg the process. Also, the camera does a great job of distinguishing people from other moving objects. I love this camera and will most likely buy more.
reviews.author: Darkone1029

reviews.title: "Excellent video"
reviews.text: Video is super clear. Love the notifications.  Actually caught “hired help” not doing what was billed and had video evidence to back up.  Sister in law and father in law have since purchased one after seeing how nice ours was.
reviews.author: David D2

reviews.title: "Awesome camera"
reviews.text: We already have the Nest Doorbell and Nest thermostat and wanted to add a security camera to the backyard. We thought, why not a Nest Outdoor Camera. Glad we did!! Easy install and awesome performance! I highly recommend it!!
reviews.author: Andyman

reviews.title: "Very simple"
reviews.text: Love my Nest outdoor camera. I feel more secure knowing it's there. The picture quality is crystal clear, and the night vision is clear as daylight. Set up was simple. I had it up and running within 30 minutes of the install
reviews.author: Casey8877

reviews.title: "Less time to install than expected"
reviews.text: I installed two cameras in about two hours total. One camera in the front yard required the use of an extension ladder to reach an external outlet under my second story eaves, or the installation would have been even faster.
reviews.author: Brett B.

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: Great product great visual view. I highly suggest the 24 seven app to go with the camera. Easy installation you just have to commit to go through a wall if needed for electrical. But overall  I highly recommend this product.
reviews.author: Robyn N

reviews.title: "Above expectations"
reviews.text: I have been pleasantly surprised by this product and use it all of the time.  The video quality is really good.  It quickly picks up activity and sends alerts.  It's great to get alerts at work when people come to the house.
reviews.author: RS Weide

reviews.title: "Easy setup"
reviews.text: Very satisfied with the NEST camera, easy to install, very clear video.  Would have given 5 stars but the Nest Aware supscrition is expensive and the Nest app is very busy and hard to figure out how to review an video clip.
reviews.author: Deepster

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: I am happy that I bought two of these cameras.  They were easily installable and a breeze to set up. I would not recommend 1080p if you want to look at something in the distance. Besides that, the camera is a great product.
reviews.author: Mikeb

reviews.title: "Awesome"
reviews.text: The ease and setup is beyond what I was expecting.  Please keep working with Apple and not put all of your eggs in the Google/Amazon basket.  It does no one any good.  Well, only those that have gone blindly into the abyss.
reviews.author: Partsman04

reviews.title: "See what is going on when away"
reviews.text: I got Nest outdoor cam because of packages missing from front porch.  I also like being able to see who is at door.  I added Nest Aware, thermostat, indoor cam and another outdoor cam at back door - I have a Nest Cam House.
reviews.author: Rowland55

reviews.title: "Peace of Mind"
reviews.text: We added 2 outdoor nestcams to our existing 4 indoor cams. I'm able to watch my front porch and also keep an eye on my pool area. The cameras were SUPER easy to set up and even easier to view remotely.  Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Duane

reviews.title: "Easy product to understand, setup and use!"
reviews.text: I purchased this product in the morning and by lunch I had the base, 2 cameras and 3 door detects installed and working.  The app is a breeze to use and I am very pleased with this product, it delivers....plain and simple.
reviews.author: MatthewFL

reviews.title: "Perfect Cam"
reviews.text: So far, I love this camera.When it sends you alerts it records everything.The night vision is perfect and clear.The camera separates activity movements from a humans movements.So far it's perfect for security purposes.
reviews.author: Vanna

reviews.title: "Great Outdoor Monitor"
reviews.text: We've really liked having this camera outside of our home. Installation was trickier than I had expected, since we had to drill through the outside of the house. Otherwise, a great experience and would recommend to others!
reviews.author: AnnaEp

reviews.title: "Exceptional Quality!"
reviews.text: The Nest Cam outdoor provides excellent build quality and crystal clear 1080p video at a reasonable price.  Nest Aware app integrates perfectly with cameras for a desirable home security system with very low monthly fees.
reviews.author: Chris K

reviews.title: "Great Cameras"
reviews.text: These are great, functional, and very easy to use. I originally had a set of Samsung cameras that I replaced with these. App is easy to use. Alerts are perfect and just what I needed. Footage is easy to look back through.
reviews.author: TMonster

reviews.title: "Spy network"
reviews.text: This is work of art. The camera itself has nice resolution. Phone App is very functional and works perfectly so far. The company just need more ways to have it installed, though aftermarket equipment is available online.
reviews.author: JimmiJo

reviews.title: "Working great"
reviews.text: I have had this product for two years and it works great! My only issue is it sometimes gets confused by clouds and detects motion. This is the best picture i have of the camera mounted above the garage door in the peak.
reviews.author: Fstasme

reviews.title: "Best affordable security"
reviews.text: Our handyman recommended Nest to us. We decided to purchase it was easily installed, easy to scan with the App to our phone. Our neighbor saw it and immediately purchased the Nest too.  Excellent video coverage. Love it
reviews.author: B. Brooks

reviews.title: "Nest cam"
reviews.text: I had NET GEAR ARLO cameras and the didn't work when it got cold out or batteries would not charge in the units and I could not continuously live steam so I switched everything to the nest cameras. I am very happy I did
reviews.author: RickSt

reviews.title: "I love knowing what's happening"
reviews.text: As a working dad its amazing for me to know whats going on at home when I am at work, Nest gives me that comfort. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to stay connected to their home and keep an eye on their family.
reviews.author: SebastianO

reviews.title: "Very happy with my purchase"
reviews.text: The ease of setup, hookup and starting to get notifications was impressive! The video and audio quality is more than I expected, and I am very happy with my purchase. I will be buying at least one more for my backyard.
reviews.author: Pam O.

reviews.title: "Easy to setup and simple to use"
reviews.text: I bought the nest outdoor cam for surveillance on my second home due to thefts and vagrants. It was easy to setup and simple to use.I've had it for two months and it has worked without fail , giving me a peace of mind.
reviews.author: Clifford

reviews.title: "New outdoor Cam"
reviews.text: Really like this new camera, I have it installed at the front door, this gives me the ability to speak to someone at the door. The video quality is wonderful and the installation is even easier than the other cameras.
reviews.author: P. Fiacco

reviews.title: "Safe and secure"
reviews.text: We purchased our Outdoor Nest for 2 reasons. 1. To protect our vacation home.2. To keep an eye out on my elderly father who lives next to us. It gives us peace of mind knowing Dad is safe and our house is protected.
reviews.author: Gweega

reviews.title: "Super easy setup and reliable camera"
reviews.text: I love so many things about this camera, it is super easy to setup, the app is very friendly, and the microphone feature is something that I always use.Would be better if they produce the camera in different colors
reviews.author: Ralzate

reviews.title: "Love it"
reviews.text: Looks great, records and notifies both video, audio, and let's me know when there's a person pretty well instead of a bird or tree away. I like the nest setup and have the protect and thermostat as well. Great system
reviews.author: Channing

reviews.title: "Nest camera"
reviews.text: Have purchased other cameras. Too complicated and take too long to install. The Logitech cameras were good, but not reliable. Love the nest ease of installation and reliability, can't find a better bang for the buck.
reviews.author: Jeff HinVa

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: I've bought several of these cameras for myself and my daughter.  Well worth the money.  Provides a sense of security and verifies when service persons are/or said they arrived.  So glad I purchased the Nest Cameras.
reviews.author: Granny

reviews.title: "The key to your family's safety"
reviews.text: it's a great feeling to wake up and come home with having peace of mind. I know who did and didn't enter my smart home just by checking my notifications. In a busy world this is a smart tool for your families safety.
reviews.author: kati3kat

reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I was using an Arlo before & got tired of replacing batteries ALL THE TIME, especially when it rarely caught anything going on at my property! Rarely even caught me coming & going from the house!
reviews.author: Aislinn

reviews.title: "A diy for sure!"
reviews.text: When I first purchased, I didn't realize I could accomplish installation without professional help. My pricey electrician was busy, so I opened up box and read easy instructions. Within an hour I was up and running!
reviews.author: J.J.Ridgway

reviews.title: "great product"
reviews.text: I bought the nest cam outdoor AFTER a break in and wish i had got it just a little bit sooner...don't put it off until tomorrow. Get one now!Easy to set up and easy to use...well worth the money and peace of mind.
reviews.author: Jake O

reviews.title: "Security Cameras"
reviews.text: Feel this product can help protect my residence . The thermostat I have now works great after trying all others. Hoping this camera system works just as good. Good price for well looking camera. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
reviews.author: Gilbert

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: The outdoor cam is a great product that's easy to use and easy to install. I have recommended this same product to others who have purchased it and love it as well. Hopefully adding another camera to my house soon!
reviews.author: crystalb

reviews.title: "Great Cameras"
reviews.text: I currently own the Nest doorbell and 2 Nest Outside cameras, all cameras have a great range of colors and HD definition views, my only issue will be the video distortion the further away you get from the cameras.
reviews.author: Rowland55

reviews.title: "Best camera ever"
reviews.text: The setup was extremely easy and quality of video is excellent night or day. The range of the wifi is not bad I ended up adding a extender to place closer to the camera this further increased the quality of video.
reviews.author: Saad

reviews.title: "Affordability"
reviews.text: The Nest product line of cameras work well and the ease of setup is simple.  The catch is the more cameras you purchase the greater the fee to stay protected.  You don't get that knowledge until your trial ends...
reviews.author: Sirroland

reviews.title: "Extremely well made and easy to use"
reviews.text: Nest Cam Outdoor is very well made. It's is very easy to install and adjust.  The app is very easy to use and greatly extends the functionality and customization of the camera as well. Well worth the investment!
reviews.author: Jeffrey S

reviews.title: "Good for outdoor use"
reviews.text: I use the outdoor camera to keep track of  who is in my backyard carport where I keep my motorcycles and is a back door to the house. It is an excellent view camera and blends well with the surrounding background.
reviews.author: RobinM

reviews.title: "BARN CAM"
reviews.text: LOVE THIS CAMERA WE PURCHASED AND PUT IT IN OUR BARN TO KEEP AN EYE ON OUR MARES THAT WILL BE FOALING. LOVE THAT WE CAN SEE THEM FROM ANYWHERE ON OUR PHONES. VERY EASY TO INSTALL.  WOULD LIKE TO SEE A LOWER PRICE
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.text: Easier than expected to install, strong WI-FI connection. Good picture quality and the ability to pan the area, did not know this feature was available until I installed it. Overall very pleased with my purchase.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Awesome Home security"
reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give 5 stars, occasionally glitches and delays in communication. This may be due to my WiFi, but still frustrating when trying to speak over the camera. Otherwise, it's well worth having.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Security Cameras"
reviews.text: Feel this product can help protect my residence . The thermostat I have now works great after trying all others. Hoping this camera system works just as good. Good price for well looking camera. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
reviews.author: Gilbert

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: The outdoor cam is a great product that's easy to use and easy to install. I have recommended this same product to others who have purchased it and love it as well. Hopefully adding another camera to my house soon!
reviews.author: crystalb

reviews.title: "Great Cameras"
reviews.text: I currently own the Nest doorbell and 2 Nest Outside cameras, all cameras have a great range of colors and HD definition views, my only issue will be the video distortion the further away you get from the cameras.
reviews.author: Rowland55

reviews.title: "Best camera ever"
reviews.text: The setup was extremely easy and quality of video is excellent night or day. The range of the wifi is not bad I ended up adding a extender to place closer to the camera this further increased the quality of video.
reviews.author: Saad

reviews.title: "Affordability"
reviews.text: The Nest product line of cameras work well and the ease of setup is simple.  The catch is the more cameras you purchase the greater the fee to stay protected.  You don't get that knowledge until your trial ends...
reviews.author: Sirroland

reviews.title: "Extremely well made and easy to use"
reviews.text: Nest Cam Outdoor is very well made. It's is very easy to install and adjust.  The app is very easy to use and greatly extends the functionality and customization of the camera as well. Well worth the investment!
reviews.author: Jeffrey S

reviews.title: "Good for outdoor use"
reviews.text: I use the outdoor camera to keep track of  who is in my backyard carport where I keep my motorcycles and is a back door to the house. It is an excellent view camera and blends well with the surrounding background.
reviews.author: RobinM

reviews.title: "BARN CAM"
reviews.text: LOVE THIS CAMERA WE PURCHASED AND PUT IT IN OUR BARN TO KEEP AN EYE ON OUR MARES THAT WILL BE FOALING. LOVE THAT WE CAN SEE THEM FROM ANYWHERE ON OUR PHONES. VERY EASY TO INSTALL.  WOULD LIKE TO SEE A LOWER PRICE
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.text: Easier than expected to install, strong WI-FI connection. Good picture quality and the ability to pan the area, did not know this feature was available until I installed it. Overall very pleased with my purchase.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Awesome Home security"
reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give 5 stars, occasionally glitches and delays in communication. This may be due to my WiFi, but still frustrating when trying to speak over the camera. Otherwise, it's well worth having.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Awesome camera"
reviews.text: Replaced my canary camera with the nest outdoor camera and what a difference from video quality to time line view and how quick you can acces video review and live feed, night and day compare to canary camera.
reviews.author: Tread lightly

reviews.title: "Outdoor Camera system"
reviews.text: Great picture quality. May need gaming modem to stream continuously without buffering or weak wifi signal for cameras far away from the router. Make sure that the gaming modem is compatable with nest cameras.
reviews.author: DB222

reviews.title: "Awesome, easy to use security"
reviews.text: Nest cameras are extremely easy to install yourself, set up and use.  The video quality is excellent and for those who desire specific adjustments, there are plenty of options to choose from.  Great job Nest!
reviews.author: Aliaba

reviews.title: "Easy to install and great picture"
reviews.text: Get one. You won't be sorry. The picture is so clear I can watch the neighbors cats across the street. The sound quality is awesome too. Sometimes I pull up the app from work just to listen to the birds sing.
reviews.author: E Bry

reviews.title: "Best Live Video/Audio Camera Ever"
reviews.text: Have a few indoor Nest Cameras, but just got the outdoor.  So amazing, would recommend this to everyone who wants a watch on their outdoor areas.  Live video and audio so clear and perfect.  Technology rules!
reviews.author: Chicago

reviews.title: "Great products"
reviews.text: The nest cam outdoor is a great product. It help identify a tree coming down on my neigh ors house while everyone was away.  The only item I would say is a short coming is the night vision is not  very clear.
reviews.author: PhilTheNerve

reviews.title: "Excellent camera"
reviews.text: This camera was better than expected. The features are amazing... Great picture and video, with the ability to talk... Highly recommend! I love the alerts that notify me of movement or sound.. truly amazing!
reviews.author: Pawneepower

reviews.title: "Simple and effective outdoor camera"
reviews.text: I needed an outdoor camera that would run on power - not a battery.  The Nest camera was easy to install, easy to use, and easy to review the footage.  It works so well I bought two more for other locations.
reviews.author: Michelle Mc

reviews.text: Once again I am impressed by another Google product. I have 2 nest thermostats a nest protect and a nest camera and all are superb products. Everything from the packaging to the actual device is exceptional.
reviews.author: Sharlene

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: Exactly what we need, video, voice and night vision worked perfectly.  We only had a few times it confused motion with person, but we still get alerts and overall a great product with excellent intelligence
reviews.author: Frank

reviews.title: "Joe"
reviews.text: I have had and do have other manufactures products and this is the best.  Easy setup, quality video/pic, wide field of view, recognition quality, fast notifications, quick response to app,  and quality app!
reviews.author: Miguel1407

reviews.title: "Easy set up and excellent app support"
reviews.text: I installed this in under 20 minutes.  I use it at the side door to each who is coming and going and when packages are delivered.  The app is great and send alerts when the camera notices movement or sound.
reviews.author: Mikeinnj

reviews.title: "Best outdoor camera ever"
reviews.text: I would highly recommend this producer I have one and it works great. I also have comparable products and beats product is superior in both biod and electronic service and low light and quality departments.
reviews.author: AL D.

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: Great security camera. Love being able to see things when I'm away. Even though you need to pay for a Nest Aware subscription for the camera to work in any meaningful way, it's worth it for the convenience.
reviews.author: Trace

reviews.title: "Great product!"
reviews.text: This is simple to install, has great video quality, allows user to hear and speak to others, is supported by an amazing smartphone app, and finally has multiple plans available to record video in the cloud.
reviews.author: Matthew R

reviews.title: "Best outdoor camera ever"
reviews.text: I would highly recommend this producer I have one and it works great. I also have comparable products and beats product is superior in both biod and electronic service and low light and quality departments.
reviews.author: AL D.

reviews.title: "Love Nest"
reviews.text: We moved into a new home and wanted to feel secure. We decided on Nest and so happy with our choice. The outdoor cameras are fantastic and allow us to view everything that's happening from around the world!
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Amazing"
reviews.text: I use this every day to track packages, to make sure my kids get on the bus ok, to monitor the weather, and to ensure my house is safe and protected. I love this camera! Amazing quality for the price paid!
reviews.author: MrBar

reviews.title: "Owner"
reviews.text: Easy to install, simple instructions. The cameras work better than I expected. They have been up and working about a week now, so far no problems. I am very happy with the cameras and the Nest App. 5 stars
reviews.author: J.W.

reviews.title: "Excellence"
reviews.text: My Nest outdoor camera is everything that I would expect out of a camera and more it's very reliable and dependable and has Beautiful sound and video quality and I would recommend this product to everybody
reviews.author: Badseed

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor camera"
reviews.text: The camera itself was very easy to install. It is seamless and blends in well with the house.The camera view is very wide and clear.It's very easy to zoom in on the pictureand the sound is very clear.
reviews.author: Crystal

reviews.title: "Terrific outdoor camera"
reviews.text: I love the camera. The view is perfect. I have it on the outside balcony shooting toward a parking area and my front courtyard. It detects everything even my Yorkies. Nest employees are extremely helpful.
reviews.author: Sister13

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor"
reviews.text: I love this camera. I use it on my back yard to monitor my yard and my boat on the dock and it is amazing. We love the quality day and night and the notifications! I will buy more of these in the future!
reviews.author: Lourdes

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I am happy with the purchase of two. Lastly, the design was terrible. In order to run the cord from the exterior it takes a huge hole that needs to be drilled on the exterior.
reviews.author: D Luna

reviews.title: "Awesome Camera"
reviews.text: Great for seeing who's at the house when we are away.  Had plenty of alerts for wildlife that come around the house with great footage.  Helps me feel better when I'm not home knowing my families secure.
reviews.author: Alaska

reviews.title: "Quality is fabulous"
reviews.text: I love my nest product I also installed a camera for my mom and due to sharing I am able to keep an eye on their outdoor surroundings. Mine gives me piece of mind and I love being able to save clippings.
reviews.author: marulee

reviews.title: "Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: Love it, great to check on pets and the house when I am out of town or at work. The time lapse feature is great! The part I like is being able to select zones to be notified on movement in certain areas.
reviews.author: Cooper465

reviews.title: "Peace of Mind"
reviews.text: Installed the Nest system in my home with additional cameras outside.  Video is very clear along with sound.  Sensors are sensitive.  Cameras pick up everything.  Love this system.  Well worth the money.
reviews.author: Jski285

reviews.title: "Great security camera"
reviews.text: I have arlo and ring doorbell and the picture on this is much better, I also prefer the app to either one of those, I recommend this camera and to also get the nest thermostat they work in the same app.
reviews.author: Steven896s

reviews.text: I first was  impressed with the packing of the cams.  Very neat and well organized.   It came with very clear instructions to set up and mount the cams.   It took less than one hour to set up both cams.
reviews.author: Aliaba

reviews.title: "Very Nice Camera"
reviews.text: Lots to choose from out there regarding cameras.  NEST has really put a lot of thought and time into the design of this product.  Great support and well packaged.  Easy of use and reliability excellent.
reviews.author: Julio Cesar

reviews.text: BEST camera on the market. It has a very clear picture and the app is easy to maneuver through. You can look back at any activity or sound that the camera caught. You can also zoom in if you would like.
reviews.author: Colin g

reviews.title: "Nest Cam Outdoor is a plus"
reviews.text: I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking to monitor things around the home. It is easy to install and the clarity of the camera is very good. I couldn't be happier with the choice we made.
reviews.author: Janet & Mike

reviews.title: "Home away function won't work"
reviews.text: I love everything about this Nest, except one vital feature simply wont work.  The home away feature won't eork.  Tried everything.  Have to manually activate camera when I leave.  Very time consuming.
reviews.author: Lisa. C

reviews.title: "Much Easier to Set Up and Use than Old System"
reviews.text: I replaced a system using a DVR and viewing the video with a somewhat complicater IP address and app setup.  I've installed 2 nest cams, and setup and access via the app and website has been very easy.
reviews.author: gNeal

reviews.title: "Nest Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: The nest camera was wonderfully packaged, was clear in it's instructions of how to set up with wi-fi,  and was exceptionally easy to install.  We are considering purchasing one more for the back yard.
reviews.author: Dave W

reviews.title: "Awesome"
reviews.text: Great security system. I love how you can have multiple zones that the camera can pick up. Well worth the money. Everyone claims it's the best on the market. I have zero complaints and easy to install
reviews.author: Mark68

reviews.title: "Great value"
reviews.text: I researched and reviewed several brands before selecting Nest. I made the right choice. Easy to set up and operate. Great connection to me cell phone. I use it to monitor livestock and it is perfect.
reviews.author: Tracy S

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: Just bought one of these to tie into my other nest products and provide more security for my home. Set up was quick and simple and works fantastic. I will be getting one for the back of my house soon.
reviews.author: Russ B

reviews.title: "Best Product Ever"
reviews.text: This has been the best experience ever! I can see when my family arrive home! I also get to see when my mail n package get dropped off! But the best thing to do is talk on the camera when I'm at work!
reviews.author: JimmiJo

reviews.title: "Super cute"
reviews.text: This performs as expected.  Easy to install and nice vid quality.  Cordless would be amazing!  And less conspicuous—more neutral color and smaller.  Only complaint is it's so visible from the street.
reviews.author: Nice camera!

reviews.title: "Quality product"
reviews.text: Setup was easier than expected.  Quality of installation materials and product is excellent.  Images are clearly high definition as advertised.No negatives as of a couple of days after installation.
reviews.author: LCBrevard

reviews.title: "Awesome cameras"
reviews.text: Yes I purchase these cameras about a year ago and I love them the picture quality is very clear and clean sound quality is very awesome the look and style of the cameras hey minor in touch to My Home
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Awesome camera!!!"
reviews.text: Everybody I have shown my cameras to have really been impressed my the picture quality. I put cameras on my mother in laws house and her neighbors house. Thankyou nest for putting out great products.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Great video and easy set up"
reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Make sure you have an outlet nearby. Cables were lo g so I was able to run mine through wall and plug into a garage outlet. Alerts are fast. Video quality is great. Love product.
reviews.author: Jch65

reviews.title: "Excellent camera"
reviews.text: I bought this camera and I couldn't be happier. I had ADT and this nest camera is way better. Better quality. Better notifications. All around better product. I just went out and bought another one.
reviews.author: Mr. Technology

reviews.title: "Great camera!"
reviews.text: We love our Nest Outdoor Camera!  It has great video clarity and the connectivity has been perfect.  It was so easy to install and set up, and we are considering adding more cameras to our property.
reviews.author: BJRaz

reviews.title: "Great product and packeging"
reviews.text: My latest nest product and as all the others it was a joy to open the box and see the care how the product was packed. It reflects the quality of the product and the company. And yes it works great.
reviews.author: Flower Guy

reviews.title: "Nest cam outdoor"
reviews.text: I've had this camera for a while now and it's great. I feel better leaving my house knowing I can see my house at any time. I can see when my kids get home. Also it records everything. Just love it.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Nest cam outdoor"
reviews.text: I've had this camera for a while now and it's great. I feel better leaving my house knowing I can see my house at any time. I can see when my kids get home. Also it records everything. Just love it.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Sleek Camera"
reviews.text: The camera works great, and easy to install. Do not activate the free trial for the cloud if you haven't installed and prepared it. I wasn't able to enjoy the free trial, but I purchased it anyway.
reviews.author: G Diva

reviews.title: "Outdoor Camera"
reviews.text: Great video and sound. I really like the ability of the camera to know a person has been detected and send an email. I can quickly take a look to make sure the person is expected or someone I know.
reviews.author: VicW

reviews.title: "Great over Holidays!"
reviews.text: The Nest Cam allowed us to easily monitor when we had packages delivered even when we were away on a trip.  This allowed us to call a neighbor to bring it in from the elements.  Love Nest products!
reviews.author: Taylor43

reviews.title: "Easy to install, outstanding product"
reviews.text: Took less than 15 minutes to install and program, easy and simple.  I have installed one in the front yard, as well as one in the back yard.   I couldn't be happier with the quality of the product.
reviews.author: JB

reviews.title: "Wonderful outdoor camera!!"
reviews.text: Grest outdoor camera for my home security system. Perfect HDTV video and excellent sound. The app integration takes the NEST products to the next level. I get notifications immediately and love it.
reviews.author: WilliamC

reviews.title: "Nest outdoor"
reviews.text: Sleek design, picture quality is great, night vision is impressive, easy to set up.  Highly recommend. Nest is a little pricey, but it's a good quality product.  Very happy with my nest purchases.
reviews.author: Keith S

reviews.title: "My home security"
reviews.text: I love my Nest outdoor cameras!  I get alerts on motion, person, person talking, movement!  I feel secure while away from home. The picture quality is excellent!  I highly recommend these cameras!
reviews.author: Angel H.

reviews.title: "Excellent Outdoor Camera"

reviews.author: Julia C

reviews.title: "Awesome Outdoor Camera"

reviews.author: Chris85

reviews.text: Great product if you have a camera just get this it will keep your home safe ... it looks stylish and pleasant the video quality is amazing and the app lets you know everything that moves outside
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.author: Jersey Grandma

reviews.title: "Great Camera"
reviews.text: I have purchased two NEST Outdoor Cameras in the past month.  One each for different sections of my home property.  Set up and installation of the cameras was very easy.  The instructions were easy to read and follow.  I recommend planning out your installation location paying specific attention to power supply availability and viewing area due to obstacles.  I drilled 1 inch holes through my stucco walls and placed a one inch PVC pipe through the hole.  I then ran the electrical cable for the camera through the PVC pipe.  The power cable fit perfectly.  I then plugged the cameras into indoor electrical outlets.  I love the magnet mounting system for this camera.  It makes for a sturdy mount and makes it easy to adjust the camera angles.Video quality for me has been great; day or night.  The camera has a very good night time capability.  I monitor the video feed from my main home computer and two Smart phones.  I have found it easy to go back and watch previous video feeds and make video clips when needed.  The 130 degree viewing area allows me to see a large section of my property from this stationary camera.Overall I am very happy with my purchase of the NEST cameras.  I would highly recommend them.

questions.question: "Does units have there own wifi?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The unit can connect using your home wifi network.

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor would connect to our Nest servers using your home WiFi connection.

questions.question: "can u you use other (cell phone) devices to detect activities from this security camera?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, you can view the fee through a mobile app.

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: You can receive sound and motion notifications to any phone you have the Nest app installed on and logged into the Nest account with your Nest Cam. Details about notifications here: https://nest.com/support/article/How-to-set-up-notifications-for-your-Nest-products

questions.question: "Does this canera record the footage to be played back later?"
questions.author: matt

answers.author: Bruhle
answers.text: As long as you never stop paying the folks at Nest every month. Otherwise, you'll need to be a full time security guard and stare at the live footage to see whos breaking ibto your house...

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: With a Nest Aware subscription the live footage can be recorded. More details here: https://nest.com/support/article/What-do-I-get-with-Nest-Aware-for-Nest-Cam

questions.question: "Do these cameras work properly in extreme heat (up to 120°F)?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: This model has a temperature range of -4°-104°F.

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor is rated for an operating temperature of –4° to 104°F.

questions.question: "What come in the box? I dont have a place for the magnet to be placed. Are there any other mounts?"
questions.author: Jeremy

answers.author: Tool
answers.text: I think it comes with a round metal mounting plate that is screwd into the mounting surface and the magnent attaches to that plate. I'm not sure, but why have a magnet since most homes are wood or brick.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, the cameras do not include other mounting options.

questions.question: "What happens if someone just cuts the power wire? do you get an alert to your phone that the camera has lost power?"
questions.author: mchap

answers.author: worm
answers.text: Yes, you get an alert anytime the camera is unplugged and therefore offline.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, but if installed at the recommended height it can only be disabled with the use of a ladder and you would have their photo.

questions.question: "What is the nest aware and what is the cost?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: You can learn more about Nest Aware and how much it costs in the articles below: https://nest.com/support/article/What-do-I-get-with-Nest-Aware-for-Nest-Cam https://nest.com/support/article/How-to-purchase-Nest-Aware

questions.question: "Does this connect to alexa?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: You can learn how our products work with Alexa in the following article: https://nest.com/support/article/Nest-and-Amazon-Alexa

questions.question: "Does the 24/7 recording with Nest Aware record both sound and video 24/7?"
questions.author: Jim

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: It sure does! You can learn more about what you get with Nest Aware in the following article: https://nest.com/support/article/What-do-I-get-with-Nest-Aware-for-Nest-Cam

questions.question: "Can I set this up so everyone and anyone can simply click a link and look in at traffic and weather conditions in front of my house."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: You can choose to share a public link through your account for others to view this through a browser. Details here: https://nest.com/support/article/How-do-I-make-my-Nest-Cam-video-public-or-private

questions.question: "does nest outdoor camera have back up battery if power outage to continue in service without power?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cam does not have a back up battery, and must remain plugged into an outlet for 24/7 operation.

questions.question: "Do you have to have WiFi to use this camera or can you use your phone to use it?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor does require a Wi-Fi connection to connect to our servers. Details here: https://nest.com/support/article/Nest-Cam-technical-system-requirements-and-specifications

questions.question: "do i have to have wifi for this camera?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor does require Wi-Fi to stream through our servers, and to your own Nest account. Details here: https://nest.com/support/article/Nest-Cam-technical-system-requirements-and-specifications

questions.question: "If you are running the power wire thru a wall, what is the MINIMUM size hole needed?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: Details on the tools you might need can be found here: https://nest.com/support/article/How-to-mount-your-Nest-Cam-Outdoor#whatyoullneed

questions.question: "Can you get alerts on multiple phones?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: You can receive motion and sound alerts to any devices logged into the account, and there's no limit for how many devices you can have logged into an account.

questions.question: "can these be split up for two homes?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cams work independently, so they can be set up on different accounts with different Wi-Fi information without any issues. Details here: https://nest.com/support/article/Managing-multiple-homes-and-Nest-products-with-one-Nest-Account

questions.question: "I already have Xfinity home from Comcast for inside but am thinking of adding outside cameras on the front/rear porch...they compatible? View on home?"
questions.author: fish

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: At this time, the Nest Cam does not work with Xfinity.

questions.question: "Can these cameras be HARD-WIRED for added security?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cams are designed to be plugged into an available power outlet, we do not recommend hard wiring these, however you can run the cable through a wall and into your home.

questions.question: "When you get a alert to your phone, can you use your phone to record it?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: If you have a Nest Aware subscription, you can record footage 24/7. Details on Nest Aware can be found here: https://nest.com/support/article/What-do-I-get-with-Nest-Aware-for-Nest-Cam

questions.question: "I have limited internet access. How much bandwidth does this consumer (per camera, per month, in MB)?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: We'd be more than happy to assist you with this. The bandwidth requirements for the Nest Cam Indoor are this: -At 720p, each camera requires 200 to 500 Kbps of upload bandwidth while streaming video. -At 1080p, each camera requires 450 to 1200 Kbps of upload bandwidth while streaming video. -Cameras will use more bandwidth to stream video when there is more motion in the scene. -If you subscribe to Nest Aware, your camera streams all video to the cloud for secure offsite storage. At 720p, each camera could use 60GB to 160GB of upload bandwidth per month. At 1080p, each camera could use 140GB to 380GB of upload bandwidth per month.

questions.question: "Can you record for viewing later"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: Nest Cams have an optional subscription service called Nest Aware which would allow you to store recorded footage from the Nest Cams. Details here: https://nest.com/support/article/What-do-I-get-with-Nest-Aware-for-Nest-Cam

questions.question: "I have a porch light, can the power cord be cut and direct wired into the power circuit?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: We do not suggest cutting the power cable to re wire into another power source.

questions.question: "If you have an electrical outage and the electricity comes back on will it affect the operation of camera"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: If the power and WiFi goes down in the home. The Nest Cam wouldn't be able to power on during this time. Once the power and WiFi come back up in the home, the Nest Cam is designed to power back on and reconnect to the WiFi automatically.

questions.question: "It says 2 cameras but under the discriptions where it says “supports” or (something similar) it says 1. What does that mean?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: This is the Nest Cam Outdoor 2 pack which includes two Nest Cam Outdoors and all necessary mounting and power equipment.

questions.question: "Can i install the camera upside down? ie: cable on the top.. instead of the cable coming from the bottom?"
questions.author: Tool

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor does have the ability to rotate the image 180 degrees within the Nest app, so you can install these upside down and be able to reverse the image allowing you to see everything right side up. Details here: https://nest.com/support/article/My-Nest-Cam-is-mounted-on-the-ceiling-so-the-video-is-upside-down-What-can-I-do-so-it-s-right-side-up

questions.question: "Do you have to pay a monthly service to use the cameras. It makes no sense to have to pay another fee when I can look at my iPod to screen."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: A Nest Aware subscription isn't required to be able to receive motion and sound alerts or view the live stream of the Nest Cam 24/7. In order to have saved video history of the footage captured, a Nest Aware subscription would be needed. Details here: https://nest.com/support/article/What-do-I-get-with-Nest-Aware-for-Nest-Cam

questions.question: "How far aware from the house, or otherwise from WiFi connect, can the camera go? I'd like to install a system in my barn where th horses are."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The range would be dependent on the router itself. Some routers can push their signal further while others are more limited. If your routers signal isn't able to reach the location you need, we'd suggest using a WiFi extender to get the coverage you're after.

questions.question: "How many Nest security cameras can work together? or is each one a separate charge?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: Each Nest Cam would require its own Nest Aware subscription if you want multiple Nest Cams to have video history available. With that said, the Nest Aware subscription price would be full price for the first subscription and all additional subscriptions would be at a discounted rate. For example, if you were to purchase the 5-day Nest Aware, the first subscription would be $5 a month and additional subscriptions would be $3.

questions.question: "How long is the power plug?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor comes with a 25 foot power cable.

questions.question: "Does this system require a paid subscription, to review camera activity?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: In order to have video history available, a Nest Aware subscription would be needed. With Nest Aware you're able to record 24/7 to see everything thats happened throughout the day instead of activating and recording only when motion is detected. Our Nest Aware pricing begins at $5 a month for the first Nest Aware subscription, and $3 a month for additional subscriptions added to the same home.

questions.question: "will this camera pick up and send notifications for animals such as coyotes and stray dogs as well?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Cam Outdoor does have the ability to pick up motion from animals and alert you when detected.

questions.question: "How useful is this camera without the seller provided storage? Does it work with my own server?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Nest Support
answers.text: The Nest Aware won't work with your own personal server as it is saved to the cloud. You can still use the Nest Cam(s) without a subscription, but you would miss out on a few features: https://nest.com/support/article/What-do-I-get-with-Nest-Aware-for-Nest-Cam

questions.question: "Up to what distance does a camera show a clear picture"

answers.text: How far away a Nest Cam Outdoor can see depends on the environment where the Nest Cam Outdoor is installed.

answers.author: Larry
answers.text: Yes. Anyone who can log on to your account will be able to see images from the camera. My wife and I both use the mobile app to see images from our cameras.

questions.question: "Can I use this camera from inside pointed through a window to view a parking space approx. 25ft. away?"
questions.author: Imhawaiian

answers.author: bryan
answers.text: i use the regular nest cam for pretty much that same purpose and works great. only problem is the night vision IR reflects on the window, so i leave it in daytime mode since there is enough ambient light outside to still see good

questions.question: "If the camera is outside, how does the Wi Fi connection work?"
questions.author: larry

answers.author: Joe
answers.text: Same way your wifi connection works when your camera is inside. Although, the signal strength may be lowered due to the walls weakening the signal. However, the Nest outdoor has redesigned wifi antennas to compensate.
